K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dka' thub spyad pa'i sems kyis bdag la bdag brtags na rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275a-14: 'di lta ste; nyin re zhing til 'bru re las mi za bar de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'bras nas sran ma'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275a-17: sran ma dkar po'i bar du de dang 'dra bar zhag bdun bdun gyi bar du 'brum bu re las mi za ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275a-18: nyin re zhing 'brum bu re za ba na 'di snyam du dka' ba spyod pa 'di ni phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-0: @275b phan pa'i don du mi 'gyur yang de ltar spyod na phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba mi byed pa lta ci smos snyam sems te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-1: phan pa'i don du mi 'gyur ba'ang nyams su len zhing bzod pa byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-2: phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas na gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-3: da ltar zhag de snyed kyi bar du dka' ba spyod pa na lus kyi sha dang pags pa nyams shing rid pa ni ku ba brngas ma thag pa nyi ma la bzhag pa dang mtshungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-4: mig rkong ba ni khron pa'i skar ma dang mtshungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-5: sha kun zad de rtsa dang chu ba 'ba' zhig snang ba ni rtsva khyim zhig pa dang mtshungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-6: sgal tshigs mngon par snang ba ni thag gu mdud pa bor ba dang mtshungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-7: 'dug 'dug pa'i gnas ni rta'i rmig rjes dang mtshungs te; 'dug pa'i tshe ni kha bub tu 'gyel /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-8: langs pa'i tshe ni gan rkyal du 'gyel te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-9: de ltar phan pa'i don med pa'i sdug bsngal myong yang byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi byed do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:275b-10: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdug bsngal gzhom zhing bde ba sbyin pa'i phyir phyi nang gi zang zing thams cad gtong ba nas lus dang srog gi bar du rtsva dang 'dra bar yongs su gtong bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-0: gang gde ltar lus dang srog la mi 'phangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag la bdag phyir mi ldog pa'i sems gdon mi za bar @276a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-2: nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis lus kyis snang ba'i mar me 'dzugs pa ni lus la ras kyis dkris nas mar gyis byugs te me gtong bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-4: byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe de ltar sdug bsngal chen po myong ba na bdag gi sems la smad pa'i phyir 'di skad ces smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-5: sdug bsngal 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal brgya stong gi char yang mi phod na khyod kyi bskal pa tshad med pa brgya stong gi bar du phan pa'i don med pa'i sdug bsngal chen po'ang bzod la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-6: sdug bsngal chung ngu 'di tsam la mi bzod na sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar yid la byed pa na lus kyis kyang sdug bsngal ba mi tshor la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-8: sems kyang phyir mi ldog cing mi g-yo mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-9: byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe na bdag ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276a-10: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe na nyon mongs pa dang bcas te yongs su ma bcad kyang chos 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis lus kyi yan lag mgo bo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-1: khrag gis sems can la sbyin par byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-2: lcags kyi gzer bus lus la 'dzugs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-4: me la mchong ba'ang byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe de lta bu'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong yang gal te sems phyir mi ldog cing mi g-yo mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' de ni gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing; nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir shin tu che ba'i byol song gi lus su skye ba'i smon lam 'debs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-9: khrag gis sems can la sbyin par byed la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-10: sems can dag gis len pa'i tshe na de dag la byams shing snying rje'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe dbugs kyang rgyu bar mi byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-11: shi ba ltar byas nas gang sha len pa de dag las bsad par ma gyur tam snyam the tshom za ba'i sems kyang med par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-12: byang chub sems dpas de ltar byol song gi skye gnas su skyes kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi las nam du'ang mi byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:276b-15: byang chub sems dpas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems thob pas nam du'ang ngan song gsum gyi las mi byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-2: gnas ngan len gyi 'bras bu rdul phra mo tsam nges par myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'ang smon lam chen po'i shugs kyis sems can gyi phyir de dag myong bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-5: nad pa zhig yi dvags kyis brlams nas mngon par bltar mi snang yang rig sngags kyi mthus mngon par snang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-12: bar 'ga' ni rgod pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi ngan song gsum gyi las kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dred mo'i lus su gyur pa na rtag tu sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-14: bar 'ga' ni bya ka byi sha la'i lus su gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-15: sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-16: sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ku ta la'i lus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277a-26: de ltar byol song gi lus mang po myong ba na nam du'ang byol song gi skye gnas kyi las ma byas kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-0: rtag tu byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa gzhan la chos @277b ston te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-1: de dag byol song gi lus las myur du thar par bya ba'i phyir chos thos par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe de ltar byol song gi lus myong yang gnas ngan len gyi las mi byed pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-3: de bas na gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu ge byung ba'i tshe sems can dag zas kyis nyen pa mthong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-5: rus sbal dang nya'i lus che khyad dpag tshad grangs med pa'i lus su skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-7: sems can thams cad kyis bdag gi lus kyi sha gcod cing za ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-8: bcad pa'i 'phro nas phyir yang skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-9: bdag gi sha zos pa'i rkyen gyis bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-10: thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-11: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di skad du /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-12: gang bdag gi sha zos pa'i rkyen gyis bkres shing skom pa dang bral bar gyur ba de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus su srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar bkres pa dang skom pa'i skyon thams cad dang myur du bral bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:277b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar sdug bsngal myong ba na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-0: sems phyir mi ldog pa ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @278a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-1: byang chub thob par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-2: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas nad kyi bskal pa byung ba'i tshe /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-3: nad kyis gzir ba mthong na 'di snyam du sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-4: ji ltar sman gyi sdong po'i rgyal po la nad pa gang rtsa ba'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-11: gang blangs kyang rung; ;nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-12: nad pa gang gis skad thos sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-14: sha dang khrag zos pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-15: rkang dang klad pa'i bar zos pa thams cad kyi nad byang bar gyur cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-16: sems can gyis bdag gi sha zos nas ngan sems ma bskyed par bu'i sha la za ba dang 'dra bar sems shing bdag gi nad sos par byas nas chos bstan par gyur pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-17: de dag gi thos nas dad cing gzungs su bzung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-18: gzhan la'ang ston par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-19: rigs kyi bu; de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-20: lus kyis sdug bsngal myong yang sems phyir mi ldog cing mi g-yo mi 'gyur ba ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278a-21: nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-0: gal te sems can dag yi dvags kyis brlams te nad du @278b gyur na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-1: byang chub sems dpas mthong ma thag tu 'di skad ces smon lam 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-2: bdag kyang yi dvags kyi lus su gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-5: 'khor mang po'i lus su gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-6: de dag gi thos ma thag tu nad 'tsho bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-8: nyon mongs pa dang bcas mod kyi sems la mi 'go'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-10: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'bras bu la mi re'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-12: bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nan tan byed pa na 'di skad ces smon lam 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-13: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sems can re re la sbyin pa bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-14: sems can re res kyang bdag gi sbyin pa blangs nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-15: bdag nyid kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-16: dka' ba spyod cing sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-17: sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshe yang byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:278b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid de lta bur gyur pa na byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni @279a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor ba la nyes pa'i skyon shin tu mang ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la ni yon tan chen po yod par shes mod kyi sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba la gnas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-5: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba la sems phyir mi ldog pas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskul nas snying rje ba dang byams pa'i sems skyed pa ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-8: bya ba'i drin 'dod pa'ang ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-9: rtag tu gzhan la bya ba'i drin sbyin par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-10: de ltar bya ba'i drin byin yang lan la re ba'i sems med pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-12: sems can dag ni bdag la phan pa'i don du dka' ba spyod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan la phan pa'i don du dka' ba spyod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-14: de ni bdag la phan pa'ang yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-15: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-16: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang bcas kyang dgra dang gnyen kyi sems gzhig pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mang pa myong bar mnyam pa'i sems la nan tan byed pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279a-17: de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-0: gzhan yang byang chub @279b sems dpas gal te sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems can dag mthong na spyo ba'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-3: gal te na btang snyoms su 'jog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-4: gang rang bzhin gyis khro ba la ni tshig 'jam po smra ba'ang ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-5: gang nga rgyal can la ni nga rgyal chen po'ang mngon par ston mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-6: yang dag par na sems la ni nga rgyal med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-7: de ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa zang zing dang longs spyod med pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-9: slong ba mang yang zhen pa'i sems med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-10: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan shes pas sems can gyi phyir gang sangs rgyas med pa'i gnas su mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i lus len pa ni dmus long ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-13: zha bo lta bu'i lus myong bar byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-14: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can gyi nyes pa'i skyon ci dang ci yod pa shin tu rtogs pas rnam par bsgral ba'i phyir de dag dang mthun par spyod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-16: de ltar yid mthun par spyod kyang nyes pa'i dri mas mi gos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:279b-17: de ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-1: chub sems dpas sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-3: lam la nan tan byed pa'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-4: nyon mongs pa spong ba'ang med; byang chub la nan tan byed pa'ang med mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-5: byang chub kyi spyod pa'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-6: byang chub kyi spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-8: sdug bsngal bcom pa'ang med par shes shing rtog mod kyi 'on kyang sems can gyi phyir sdug bsngal yang bcom /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-9: byang chub kyi spyad pa'ang spyod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-10: de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-13: byang chub sems dpas lus nang gi tha ma dga' ldan gnam du skyes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-15: dga' ldan gnam ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas mchog yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-16: gnam gyi rim pa 'og ma'i lha ni bag med par spyod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-17: gnam kyi rim pa gong ma'i lha rnams ni dbang po rtul bas na dga' ldan gnam gyi lha ni mchog ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-19: tshul khrims spyod pas ni gnam gong ma dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-22: tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni dga' ldan gnam gyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280a-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni srid pa la yongs su smod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-0: srid pa bcom nas dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i las mi @280b byed kyang dga' ldan gnam gyi lhar skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-2: byang chub sems dpas gal te srid pa gzhan du skyes kyang sems can gyi don byed par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-3: yang dag par 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba'i sems med kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-4: de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gnam gyi lhar skyes pa ni dngos po 'di gsum gyis mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par 'tsho ba'i tshe dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-12: grags pa la re ba med kyang gzhan pas mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mos pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis kyang mchog tu 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-14: de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dngos po gsum gyis lha rnams las mchog tu gyur kyang lha'i sras po rnams byang chub sems dpa' de la zhe sdang gi sems dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-17: nga rgyal gyi sems mi skye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-18: rtag tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-19: byang chub sems dpa' yang lha rnams la nga rgyal mi byed pas bsam gyis khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:280b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'tsho ba'i tshe las ma byas kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-0: lha de dag gi nang na @281a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-1: tshe'i tshad mthar phyin pas 'tsho ba'i tshe mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-2: gzugs byad kyi las ma byas kyang gzugs byad dam pa'i lus su gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-3: 'od zer kun tu gsal bas gzugs mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i pho brang na gnas kyang 'dod pa lnga la ma chags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-5: chos kyi bya ba 'ba' zhig byed pas grags pa phyogs bcur grags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-6: de bas na grags pa mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-7: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gnam nas babs pa nas chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-10: byang chub sems dpa' gnam las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-11: babs pa na 'dod pa'i khams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-12: gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi lha thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te bskyal nas skad chen po phyung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-13: byang chub sems dpa' la shin tu bstod pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-14: de dag gi kha'i dbugs kyi shugs kyis sa'ang g-yos par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi'i nang na khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-16: mi'i nang na khyu mchog gi rgyal po ni klu'i rgyal po zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281a-17: klu'i rgyal po thog ma mngal du 'jug pa na klu'i rgyal po kha cig sa'i 'og na gnas pa la la ni 'jigs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-0: la la ni dga' bas sa chen po rnam @281b pa drug tu g-yos par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-1: de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngal du 'jug pa'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-5: pha dang ma yongs su gtsang zhing cis kyang ma gos par shes pa ni brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gi sgra'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-6: nor bu rin po che sngon po lta bur shes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-7: de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-13: rgya mtsho chen po la ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-16: zab cing gting ring ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-17: gcig tu lan tshva'i ro bro ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-18: dpres gyi mtshams las mi 'da' ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-19: rin po che mang ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-20: sems can mang po'i gnas su gyur pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-21: ro zhag tu mi gnas pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-22: 'bab chu thams cad dang sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin kyang mi 'phel mi 'grib pa dang brgyad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-24: rim gyis gzhol ba la dngos po rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-26: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi shugs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:281b-29: mi 'phel mi 'grib pa'i bar la'ang rnam pa gsum gsum yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-0: de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde la'ang @282a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa brgyad yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-6: tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-8: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-9: lan gcig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-10: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'i bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di las bstan cing gsungs pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-15: chos 'di dag ni rim gyis gzhol ba zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-16: de bas na mdo sde 'di ni rim gyis gzhol ba zhes bya ba yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-17: zab cing gting ring ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ma skyes pa mi 'gog pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-19: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-21: sbyin pa byas pa'ang med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-22: de bas na rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-26: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282a-27: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gzugs ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-1: rnam par shes pa ma yin pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-2: rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan pa ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-4: gsol ba'i rgyu byas pa'i rgyu ma yin pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'ang nyon mongs pa'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-8: nyon mongs pa med kyang rtag pa zhes mi bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-9: de bas na zab pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-10: gzhan yang shin tu zab pa ni mdo sde 'di las bar ni bdag yod ces 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-11: bar bar ni bdag med ces kyang 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-13: bar bar ni mi rtag ces 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-14: bar bar ni yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-15: bar bar ni yongs su ma dag ba'o zhes 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-17: bar bar ni sdug bsngal ba'o /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-19: bar bar ni stong ba'o zhes 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-20: bar bar ni stong pa ma yin no zhes 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-21: bar bar ni thams cad yod do zhes 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-22: bar bar ni thams cad med do zhes 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-23: bar bar ni theg pa gsum du 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-24: bar bar ni theg pa gcig tu 'chad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-25: bar bar ni phung po lnga nyid sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-26: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-28: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-29: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:282b-30: don dam pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-2: sems can thams cad la spyi bo'i ye shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-6: chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-7: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod mod kyi nges par ma gsungs pas na zab pa zhes bya ba yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-8: thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la mthun par sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-9: theg pa gcig par mthun pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-10: rnam par grol bar gcig par mthun pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-13: zil mngar gcig par mthun pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-14: thams cad kyis rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-17: yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur bas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:283a-18: ro gcig pa zhes bya ba yin /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-5: tshe dang ldan pa thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bag bya ba shin tu bsams te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-6: ci nas kyang dge sbyong goo ta ma de brdzun du smra bar 'gyur bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-7: de'i tshe sdug bsngal 'gyur gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-8: kha zas mi za bar byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-9: thog ma zhag gcig nas zhag drug gi bar du ci'ang ma zos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-10: zhag bdun tshang nas bu ram zos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-11: bu ram zos nas chu grang mo 'thungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-12: chu grang mo 'thungs ma thag tu lto ba na ste shi bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-13: shi nas slob pa gcig pa rnams kyis ro yeng por bteg nas dur khrod du bskyal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-14: skyugs pa za ba'i yi dvags su gyur nas ro'i drung du sdod do; ;dge slong legs pa'i skar mas de lta bur gyur pa thos nas dur khrod du ro gang na ba der song ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-15: der phyin pa dang sdug bsngal 'gyur gyi lus de yi dvags skyugs pa za ba'i lus su gyur nas ro'i drung na dgur bor 'dug pa mthong ngo ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-16: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-17: bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-18: legs pa'i skar mas smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-24: bdag lto ba na ste shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:292b-25: 'o na khyod kyi ro 'dir sus bskyal smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-4: ci glen pa khyod dur khrod yin par mi shes sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-5: 'o na khyod kyi lus ji lta bu zhig thob /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-7: bdag ni skyugs pa za ba'i lus su gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-8: legs pa'i skar ma khyod legs par nyon cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dge bar gsung ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-11: dus la bab par gsung ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas de ltar bden par gsung ba la khyod kyis de'i tshe na ci'i phyir yid mi ches /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-16: sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pas bden par gsung ba la yid mi ches na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-17: de'ang kho bo'i lus 'di 'dra ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-18: de'i tshe legs pa'i skar ma de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-19: nga gang na bar 'ongs nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-21: gcer bu pa sdug bsngal 'gyur tshe 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-22: ngas de la glen pa dgra bcom pa ni skye ba'i gnas med na ci'i phyir sdug bsngal 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-23: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-26: gcer bu pa sdug bsngal 'gyur pa yang dag par sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar ma skyes gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293a-27: skyugs pa za ba'i yi dvags su gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-0: sangs rgyas @293b bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so cog ni gnyis su med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la gnyis su yod do zhes bya ba'i gnas med do zhes bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-2: legs pa'i skar mas gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe na de skad ces gsungs mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-4: bdag ni de la yid ches pa ma mchis so zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-6: nga ni rtag tu dge slong legs pa'i skar ma la dam pa'i chos bstan na yid ches shing gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems 'di tsam yang ma skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-8: dge slong legs pa'i skar ma mdo sde bcu gnyis klog cing 'don te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-9: bsam gtan bzhi thob mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-10: chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam mam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-12: 'bru gcig tsam gyi don yang mi shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-13: sdig pa mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas bsam gtan bzhi'ang nyams par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-14: bsam gtan nyams pas ngan par lta ba bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-15: 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-17: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-18: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni mtshan lta ba'i cho ga la shin tu mkhas pas gzhan gyi sems shes par gyur to zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-19: ngas de'i tshe na legs pa'i skar ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:293b-20: ngas chos bstan cing gsungs pa ni thog mar yang dge /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-2: rnam par dag pa'o zhes bstan kyang dge slong legs pa'i skar ma des /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-3: nga la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas; bdag la chos bstan mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-4: bdag ni yang dag par na rgyu dang 'bras bu med do zhes zer ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-5: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar dngos po 'di la yid mi ches na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-6: dge slong legs pa'i skar ma nyid da ltar chu bo dga' skyed kyi 'gram na 'dug gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-8: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung dang bcas te legs pa'i skar ma gang na bar gshegs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-9: dge slong legs pa'i skar mas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-10: bcom ldan 'das rgyang nas gshegs pa mthong nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems bskyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-11: mi dge ba'i sems bskyed pas; de nyid du mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar mngon par nub par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-13: dge slong legs pa'i skar ma /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-14: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-15: rin po che'i phung po tshad med par byin mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-18: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa'i phyir chung ngu na chos gcig tsam gyi phan pa'i don yang ma thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-21: mi zhig rgya mtshor zhugs te rin po che'i phung po mang po mthong mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294a-22: le lo'i dbang gis lag tu ma thob pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-0: gzhan @294b yang rgya mtshor zhugs nas rin po che'i phung po mthong mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-1: shi ba'am srin po ma rungs pas bsad pa ltar dge slong legs pa'i skar ma'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-2: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-3: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen srin po ma rungs pa dang 'dra bas bsad par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-5: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du dge slong legs pa'i skar ma ni bag med pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-7: gang sngon yang dbul phongs de la snying brtse ba'i sems yod mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-8: snying brtse ba'i bar du mi chud do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-9: gang sngon longs spyod dang ldan pa zhig phyis longs spyod med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-11: de la ni rab tu'ang snying brtse ba ltar dge slong legs pa'i skar ma'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-12: mdo sde sde bcu gnyis 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-15: bsam gtan bzhi thob pa las nyams pa ni shin tu'ang thugs brtse bar rung bas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-16: dge slong legs pa'i skar ma ni shin tu'ang bag med par ngas gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-17: bag med pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bcad pas nga'i nye gnas su gyur pa mthong ngam thos pa gang yang rung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-18: de la ni shin tu snying brtse ba'i sems ma bskyed pa med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:294b-19: ji ltar sngon longs spyod dang ldan pa las phyis longs spyod med par mthong ba la snying rtse ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-0: nga ni lo du ma'i bar du legs pa'i skar ma dang @295a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-2: des nga la rtag tu mi dge ba'i sems bskyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-3: mi dge ba'i sems bskyed pas ngan par lta ba'i sems ma btang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-5: ngas thog ma nas legs pa'i skar ma de la dge ba'i rtsa ba sbu'i nyag ma tsam yod par ma gzigs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-6: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pa'i log sred can yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-7: sems can dmyal bar bskal pa'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-11: byas pa'i las kyang med par smra bas de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pa'i log sred can yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-12: bskal pa'i bar du sems can dmyal bar gnas so zhes lung bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-16: mi zhig ngan skyugs kyi dong du lhung ba las bshes gnyen gcig gis dbyung bar bsams nas lag pas bsnyabs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-17: skra las zin na phyis 'byin to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-18: gal te skra las ma zin te ci'ang mi snang na dbyung ba'i sems kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba ltar nga yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295a-19: legs pa'i skar ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad tsam ci yod pa btsal te yongs su bsgral ba byas na dus thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsdu'i nyag ma tsam yang med pas sems can dmyal ba las bsgral bar ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung @295b gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i slad du legs pa'i skar ma mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes lung bstan /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-4: dge slong legs pa'i skar ma la bshes gnyen dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-6: de dag thams cad legs pa'i skar ma ni dgra bcom pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-7: byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par 'dzin pas de dag gi ngan par lta ba'i sems gzhig pa'i phyir legs pa'i skar ma ni bag med pas sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes lung bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-8: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yang dag par gnyis su med par shes par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-10: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar lung bstan pa las sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba'i gnas med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-11: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa la gnyis su yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-14: dper na moonggal ya na yul dbus 'gyur 'chang na 'dug pa'i tshe yul mi thams cad la da ste zhag bdun na char pa 'bab po zhes lung bstan pa las phyis char ba ma bab bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-15: phyis ba sbrum pa zhig la be'u dkar ru 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan pa las be'u khra'u zhig byung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:295b-16: bu khye'u zhig 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan pa las phyis bu mo zhig byung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-1: legs pa'i skar ma ni rtag tu sems can tshad med pa snyed la thams cad kyi thams cad du dge ba dang sdig pa'i 'bras bu med do zhes smra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-2: de'i tshe na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bcad pas ba spu'i nyag ma tsam yang ma lus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-4: ngas sngon dge slong legs pa'i skar ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba med par mkhyen mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-5: 'on kyang lo nyi shu tshang bar lhan cig tu gnas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-6: thun mong du spyad par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-7: gal te ngas yongs su spangs te g-yas g-yon du ma bsnyen na legs pa'i skar ma des sems can tshad med pa snyed sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la gzud par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-8: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs mnga' ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-11: log sred can la ci'i slad du dge ba'i chos ma mchis pa zhes bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-14: log sred can ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-15: sems can thams cad la dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga yod na log sred can ni yongs su bcad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-16: don de lta bas na grog sbur tsam bsad na'ang kha na ma tho ba thob par 'gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296a-17: log sred can ni bsad kyang kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-0: log sred can la dge ba'i chos ma mchis pa'i slad du log sred @296b can zhes bgyi'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-6: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba la rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-9: da ltar gyi mchis pas log sred can gyis ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i chos ma bcad na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-10: ci'i slad du dge ba'i chos bcad de log sred can zhes bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-13: bcad pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-14: da ltar gyi bgags pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-15: da ltar gyi sgrib pas ma 'ongs pa'i bsgribs pa'o; ;log sred can dag bcad pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pa'o zhes ngas gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-19: mi zhig ngan skyugs kyi dong du lhung nas skra nyag ma gcig tsam las mi snang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-20: skra nyag ma gcig tsam ma nub mod kyi skra nyag ma gcig tsam gyis lus mi theg go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-21: log sred can dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-22: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba yod mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-23: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar mi 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-24: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sgrol bar 'gyur yang da ltar gyi dus su ci byar yang med pas sgrol du mi rung ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-25: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis sgrol bar yang 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:296b-26: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-1: yin; da ltar gyi ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-2: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni bcad du med do /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-4: sa bon rul pa las myu du mi skye ba ltar log sred can yang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-7: log sred can dag sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma bcad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-8: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin nyid dge ba lags na ci'i slad du dge ba thams cad bcad do zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-11: sems can gang da ltar gyi dus su sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang ldan na de la ni log sred can zhes mi bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-12: ji ltar 'jig rten na sems can la bdag ces bya ba yod pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-13: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin te rtag pa yin na ni dus gsum la ma gtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-14: ji ste dus gsum la gtogs na mi rtag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-15: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mthong bar 'gyur bas sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod de zhes gsungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-16: de bas na sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas cung zad cig mthong bar gyur to; ;byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297a-18: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rtag pa lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-0: nam mkha' dang 'dra na ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs @297b pas ma 'ongs pa'o zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas gal te log sred can dag la dge ba'i chos ma mchis zhes gsungs pa ni log sred can gyi slob pa gcig pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-9: ji ste skye na de nyid dge ba ma lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-14: shin tu legs par dris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-15: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-18: da ltar yang ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-19: sems can thams cad la'ang lus rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-23: sems can gyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag pa'i las kyis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur bas na sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma 'ongs pa'o zhes ngas gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-25: ngas ni so so'i skye bo'i phyir dus kha cig tu ni rgyu 'bras bu yin no zhes kyang gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-26: dus kha cig tu ni 'bras bu rgyu yin no zhes gsungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:297b-27: de bas na mdo sde las kha zas ni 'tsho ba yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-0: gzugs mthong ba la reg pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang 'dra bar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lus yongs su dag par @298a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-1: 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar don de lta bu lags na ci'i slad du sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mchis so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-7: sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni da ltar gyi dus na med kyang med ces byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-9: nam mkha' yang da ltar med mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-10: med ces byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-11: sems can thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-12: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rtag pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-14: de bas na ngas mdo sde 'di las sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni nang na ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-15: phyi rol na ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-16: nam mkha' ltar nang na ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-17: phyi rol na ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-18: gal te nam mkha' la nang dang phyi rol yod na nam mkha' la gcig pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-19: rtag pa zhes byar mi rung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-20: gnas thams cad na yod do zhes byar yang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-21: nam mkha' ni nang na ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-22: phyi rol na'ang ma yin mod kyi /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-24: sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298a-25: khyod smra ba ltar log sred can la dge ba'i chos yod do zhes bya ba don de lta ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-1: log sred can la lus kyi las dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-7: shes pa'i las la sogs pa las thams cad kyang log pa'i las so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-9: rgyu dang 'bras bu la mi re ba'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-13: aa u ra ni myu gu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-18: 'bras bu'i bar du kha ba ltar log sred can gyi mi dge ba'i las kyang de dang 'dra'o //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-21: de bas na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rab dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-23: tha ma shin tu rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-24: sems can gang ni dbang po 'bring las tha mar 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-25: sems can gang ni 'bring las rab tu 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-26: sems can gang ni rab las 'bring du 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-27: sems can gang ni 'bring las tha mar 'gyur ba shin tu rtogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-28: de bas na sems can gyi dbang po la nges pa med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-29: nges pa med pas kha cig dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad nas phyir skye bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-30: gal te sems can gyi dbang po nges na thog ma nas kyang bcad pa med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-31: bcad nas kyang phyir skye bar mi 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:298b-32: log sred can dag bskal pa gcig gi bar du sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes gsung par mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-1: bu; de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med do zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po rnams la mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-5: dge slong legs pa'i skar mas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad par mkhyen na ci'i slad du rab tu byung bar gnang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-8: nga sngon rab tu byung ba ni nga'i nu bo dga' bo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-11: sras sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad nga'i rjes su rab tu byung zhing lam la nan tan byed par gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-12: gal te ngas legs pa'i skar ma rab tu ma phyung na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-13: rgyal po'i thabs thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-14: mthu dang dbang du ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'jig par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-15: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ngas rab tu phyung nas lam la nan tan byed par gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-17: dge slong legs pa'i skar ma gal te rab tu ma byung na'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-18: skye ba tshad med pa'i bar du phan pa dang bde ba'i don du mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-19: da rab tu byung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299a-20: tshul khrims srungs zhing rgan rabs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-0: yon tan can la bsnyen bkur byed cing @299b bsam gtan dang po sgom pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du sgom par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-1: de'ang dge ba'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-2: de ltar dge ba'i rgyu de las dge ba'i chos skye bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-3: dge ba'i chos skyes pa na byang chub la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-4: byang chub la nan tan byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-5: de bas na dge slong legs pa'i skar ma rab tu byung bar gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-7: gal te ngas dge slong legs pa'i skar ma rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims srung du ma gnang na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa pa stobs bcu bcu dang ldan no zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-10: sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-11: mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-12: gang zag de chos gnyis po dang ldan na'ang ring po mi thogs par dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-13: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par ngas rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-15: sems can de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi bsten /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-16: dam pa'i chos nyan par mi byed /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-19: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag de da ltar gyi dus sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-20: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gal te gzhon nu'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:299b-22: rgas pa'i tshe dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:300a-5: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:300a-9: grong khyer dang mi ring ba na chu mig zhim po yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa zhig yod na gang skom zhing tsha bas gdungs pa dag chu mig gi dngor 'gro bar gzas na de la mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni skom pas gdungs pa de nges par chu mig gi dngor phyin par the tshom med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:300a-11: lam gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:300a-16: phyag sder gyi steng du bzhag pa'i sa mang zhes bka' stsal to //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:300b-9: ngan par lta ba'i lam la nan tan byed de /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:304b-4: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis gang zhe na /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:304b-13: sdug bsngal tshad med pa rnams so; ;kun 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:304b-14: nyon mongs pa tshad med pa rnams so //
