K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-6: 'dres pa'i yang 'dres pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni las byed pa na'ang 'dres la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-7: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-8: mi dkar mi gnag pa'i yang mi dkar mi gnag pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni zag pa med pa'i las zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-11: sngar ni zag pa ma mchis pa la 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang ma mchis zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-12: de ni ci'i slad du mi dkar mi gnag pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchis zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-15: don de la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-16: 'bras bu yin la rnam par smin pa'ang yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:396b-17: 'bras bu 'ba' zhig ste rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-0: nag po'i yang nag po'i 'bras bu @397a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-1: rnam par smin pa ni 'bras bu zhes kyang bya la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-2: rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-3: de la nag po'i rgyu las skye ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-4: rgyur 'gyur par byed pas rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-5: 'dres pa dang rnam par dag pa'ang de bzhin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-6: zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu las skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-7: gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur bas rnam par smin pa zhes mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-8: de bas na 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-9: rnam par smin pa zhes mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-12: zag pa ma mchis pa'i las de chos nag po ma lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-13: ci'i slad du dkar po zhes mi bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-16: rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir dkar po zhes mi bya'o /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-17: nag po'i gnyen po yin pas dkar po zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-18: ngas skabs 'dir ni 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba la nag po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-20: zag pa med pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa mi myong bas dkar po zhes mi bya'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-22: de ltar las de'i nges par rnam par smin pa myong ba'i gnas yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-24: mi dge ba bcu byas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397a-25: nges par sems can dmyal ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-0: byol @397b song gi skye gnas dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-5: mi dge ba bcu'i las la rab dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-8: rab byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba'i lus myong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-9: 'bring byas pa ni byol song gi lus myong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-10: tha ma byas pa ni yi dvags kyi lus myong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-11: mi'i las kyi nang du dge ba bcu la'ang rnam pa bzhi ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-16: de la tha ma ni byang gi sgra mi snyan du skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-17: 'bring ni shar gyi lus 'phags gling du skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-18: rab ni nub kyi ba lang spyod du skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-19: rab kyi'ang rab ni dzam bu'i gling du skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-20: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtogs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-21: 'di snyam du bdag gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de ji ltar gcad par bya snyam bsams nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-22: yang 'di snyam du las de'i rgyu dang rkyen ni ma rig pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-24: gal te bdag gis ma rig pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-25: reg pa yongs su bcad na las kyi 'bras bu de dag 'gog cing mi skye bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-26: de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ma rig pa dang reg pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad bsgom ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-27: de ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:397b-29: de ltar na sems can gyi gdug pa'i lus la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-0: sman gyi rgyal po dam pa @398a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-1: yod pa ni ji ltar ri kha ba can la rtsva gdug pa yod du zin kyang sman dam pa'ang yod pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-4: mkhas pa shes rab can gyi las dang nyon mongs pa rtogs nas rim gyis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gnyis la brtag go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-5: de ltar de gnyis kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-6: de ltar sdug bsngal bar shes nas skye ba len pa thams cad yongs su spong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-7: mkhas pa shes rab can ni gzhan yang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-8: las kyi rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-9: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las kyang las skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-10: las kyi rgyu las sdug bsngal skye la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-11: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-12: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-13: srid pa'i rgyu las sdug bsngal skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-14: srid pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-15: srid pa'i rgyu las las skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-16: las kyi rgyu las nyon mongs pa skye la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-17: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las sdug bsngal skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-18: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las kyang sdug bsngal skye bar rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398a-20: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtogs pa ni las kyi sdug bsngal rtogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-0: ji ltar gong ma dang 'dra bar rtog pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen bcu @398b gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-1: gal te gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis de la de ltar rtog na de ni las gsar mi byed cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-2: las rnying bcom pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-4: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sems can dmyal ba'i gcig nas sems can dmyal ba brgya sum cu rtsa drug gi bar gyi sems can dmyal ba re re'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa brtags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-5: kun kyang nyon mongs pa'i las kyis bskyed pa yin par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-6: de ltar sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rtogs nas rim gyis yi dvags dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-7: byol song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal brtag go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-8: de ltar rtogs nas yang mi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-9: lha'i sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa rnams rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-10: de ltar sdug bsngal mang po de dag kun kyang nyon mongs pa'i las las skye ba yin par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-12: mtho ris kyi lha la sdug bsngal chen pos gzir ba'i dngos po med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-13: lus mnyen zhing 'jam yang ltas lnga mngon du byung ba'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong ba ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-16: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal thams cad nyon mongs pa'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar shin tu rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:398b-19: rdza ma so ma btang ba ni shin tu'ang chag sla'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-1: gyi lus blangs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-2: lus de ni sdug bsngal mang po'i snod yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-6: 'bras bu'i shing shin tu rgyas pa ni bya mang pos ma rung bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-8: rtsva skam po mang du spungs kyang me chung ngus 'tshig par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar sems can gyi lus myong ba'ang sdug bsngal gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-10: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sdug bsngal rnam pa brgyad ni 'phags pa'i spyod pa ltar rtogs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-11: gang zag des ni sdug bsngal yongs su chod par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-13: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sdug bsngal brgyad shin tu rtogs nas rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la rtog go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-14: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-17: ma rig pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-20: lus dang zang zing 'tshol ba gnyis ka la'ang sdug bsngal ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-21: de bas na sred pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-22: ma rig pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-25: ma rig pa las gzhan yang rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-28: de la nang gis lus su 'gyur bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399a-29: phyi rol gyis ni skye zhing 'phel bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-0: gzhan yang nang gis lus @399b su 'gyur bar byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-1: phyi rol ni las kyi 'bras bur 'gyur bar byed pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-2: nang gi sred pa bcad na las chod par 'gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-3: phyi rol gyi sred pa bcad pas 'bras bu chod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-4: de la nang gi sred pas ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sdug bsngal skye bar byed la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-5: phyi rol gyi sred pas ni da ltar gyi dus kyi sdug bsngal skye bar byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-6: de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis sred pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-7: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rtogs nas rim gyis sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-8: sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni len pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-9: sred pa'i 'bras bu la len pa zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-10: len pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis phyi nang la sred par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-11: sred pa de'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-12: rigs kyi bu; mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-13: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa yin par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-15: len pa'i dngos po gnyis bcad na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-17: sdug bsngal mang po myong bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-18: de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can ni srid pa'i sdug bsngal bcad pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam brgyad la nan tan byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-20: gang zhig de ltar shin tu rtogs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:399b-21: de ni ngas tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-0: de ni sems can gyi gdug pa'i lus la sman dam @400a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-1: pa'i rgyal po yod pa zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-2: ji ltar ri kha ba can la dug yod du zin kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-3: sman dam [?] 'ang yod pa bzhin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-6: ji ltar na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-9: chos thams cad ces bya ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-12: chos thams cad ces bgyi ba'i don ma nges pa lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-13: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-14: de bzhin gshegs pas bar bar ni dge ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-15: mi dge ba lags zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-16: bar bar ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la rjes su rtogs pa lags so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-17: bar bar ni skye mched bcu gnyis lags so zhes gsungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-18: bar bar ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-19: bar bar ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis lags so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-20: bar bar ni sems can lags so zhes gsungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-21: bar bar ni yang dag par blta ba dang ngan par lta ba lags so zhes gsungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-22: bar bar ni mdo sde bcu gnyis lags so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400a-23: bar bar ni bden pa gnyis lags so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-0: nga'ang 'dir yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa ni chos thams @400b cad do zhes gsungs na gang dag la sogs pa la chos thams cad ces bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-5: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter zhes bya'o /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-7: rgya mtsho ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pa dang 'dra bar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-8: tshig gi don thams cad kyi dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-11: ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni sman mang po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pa dang 'dra bar mdo sde 'di'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi 'byung gnas yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-15: nam mkha' ni dngos po thams cad kyi gnas yin pa ltar mdo sde 'di'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-16: dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-19: rlung drag po ni sus kyang bcing mi nus pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'di la nan tan byed pa thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:400b-20: nyon mongs pa'i mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'ching mi nus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-0: rdo rje la cis kyang mi tshugs pa ltar mod sde 'di'ang de dang 'dra bar mu [?] stegs can ngan par lta ba mang du yod kyang rnam par gzhig @401a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-4: gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma ni sus kyang bgrang mi nus pa ltar mdo sde 'di'i don yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-5: sus kyang bgrang mi nus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-7: mdo sde 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan du 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-8: brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gi rgyal mtshan dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-10: mdo sde 'di ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i tshong dpon lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-11: ji ltar ded dpon chen pos tshong dpon mang po ded de rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-13: mdo sde 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba'i 'od du 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-14: ji ltar 'jig rten na nyi ma dang zla bas mun pa sel bar byed pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-16: mdo sde 'di ni nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can gyi sman bzang por 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-17: ji ltar ri bsung can la sman gyi rgyal po 'byung bas nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-19: mdo sde 'di ni log sred can thams cad kyi 'khar bar 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-20: dper na mi nyam chung ba thams cad de'i rkyen gyis krags pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-22: mdo sde 'di ni sdig pa ma rungs pa thams cad kyi zam par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401a-23: ji ltar 'jig rten na zam pas thams cad sgrol ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-1: mdo sde 'di ni srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i bsil grib tu 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-3: bla gab kyis shin tu tsha ba'i nyi ma sgrib pa dang 'dra'o rigs kyi bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-4: mdo sde 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po chen po ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-5: nyon mongs pa'i bdud ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-6: ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal pos ri dvags thams cad thul ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-8: mdo sde 'di ni rig pa'i sngags chen mo ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-9: nyon mongs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten na sngags mkhan gyis gdon med par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-11: mdo sde 'di ni bla na med pa'i ba mo'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-13: 'khor ba'i 'bras bu thams cad bcom pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-14: ji ltar 'jig rten na ba mo'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-15: ser bas 'bras bu thams cad bcom pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-17: mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims kyi mig nyams pa'i sman bzang po lta bur 'gyur te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-18: 'jig rten na sman aanydz'a na zhes bya ba mig na ba thams cad la phan par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-20: mdo sde 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:401b-21: ji ltar 'jig rten nas dngos po thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-0: mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims nyams pa'i sems can gyi me long gsal bar @402a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-2: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi me long gsal bas gzugs thams cad snang ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-4: mdo sde 'di ni khrel ba dang 'dzem pa med pa'i gos su 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-5: ji ltar 'jig rten na gos kyis lus sgrib cing g-yog pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-7: mdo sde 'di ni dge ba'i chos kyis dbul ba rnams kyi nor rin po cher 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-8: ji ltar lha bkra shis mas dbul pa thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-10: mdo sde 'di ni chos kyis skom pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bdud rtsi'i chur 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-11: ji ltar yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus skom pa thams cad ngoms par byed pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-13: mdo sde 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi khrir 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-14: ji ltar 'jig rten na gang zag dag bde ba'i khri la phrad pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-16: mdo sde 'di ni sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' nas sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi rgyan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-22: bdug spos rnam par dag pa'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i theg pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402a-23: rab tu bde ba myong bar byed pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-0: ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum @402b gnam gyi shing pa ri tsi tra dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-2: mdo sde 'di ni ye shes kyi mtshon ngar can lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-3: nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-4: 'di ni mtshon rnon po lta bu ste bag chags thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-5: 'di ni shin tu dpa' zhing rtul phod pa lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-6: phas rgol ba'i bdud thams cad bcom pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-7: 'di ni ye shes kyi me lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-9: 'di ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i snying po lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-10: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-11: 'di ni thos pa'i gter lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-12: nyan thos kyi skye gnas yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-13: 'di ni lha thams cad kyi mig lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-14: 'di ni mi thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i lam yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-15: 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas thams cad kyi brten pa'i gnas yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-16: 'di ni yi dvags thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-17: 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i bla na med pa'i mchog yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-18: 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i snod yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-19: 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'das pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-21: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab dang yum yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-23: de bas na mdo sde 'dis ni chos thams cad bsdus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:402b-24: ngas ni sngar gsungs pa ltar mdo sde 'dis chos thams cad bsdus par gsungs mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-1: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes gsungs so ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-2: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-5: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun ma gtogs par /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-6: gzhan gyis nyan thos kyi 'bras bu yang dag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par mi 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-7: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu'ang mi mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-8: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs par spyod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-10: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun phyin ci log gi rang bzhin ma yin pas phyin ci log rnam par 'jig par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-11: ngan par lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pas ngan par lta ba 'jig par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-12: 'jig pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas 'jig pa yongs su 'jig par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-13: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par spyod pa yin pas sems can dag mthar yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403a-16: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni zag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyur yang 'gyur na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-0: de bzhin @403b gshegs pas ci'i slad du zag pa dang bcas pa la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-1: yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'o zhes ma gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-4: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni phyin ci log pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-5: de bas na zag pa dang bcas pa la yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-6: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-8: 'jig rten mchog gi chos zhes bgyi ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-11: zag pa ma mchis pa lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-14: zag pa dang bcas pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-17: zag pa dang bcas pags mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-18: rang bzhin gyis phyin ci log ma lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-19: ci'i slad du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-22: 'jig rten mchog gi chos ni zag pa med pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas zag pa med pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-23: zag pa med pa la phyogs pas phyin ci log ces mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-25: yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rgyun ma chad pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-26: mthar 'jig rten mchog gi chos kyi bar du sems rtse gcig tu zad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:403b-27: de bas na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-3: sems can gyi rnam par shes pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa'ang lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-4: phyin ci log pa ma lags la sems rtse gcig pa'ang ma lags na ci'i slad du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes mi bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-7: sems can gyi rnam par shes pa lnga ni sems rtse gcig pa ma yin yang gang zag pa dang bcas pa yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-8: phyin ci log kyang yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-9: zag pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-10: ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-11: 'du shes la chags pas phyin ci log pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-12: de la ji ltar na ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-13: 'du shes la chags pas phyin ci log ces bya zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-15: mo ma yin pa la pho dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-20: gos kyi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-21: de dag ni phyin ci log ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-23: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun ni rang bzhin gyis phyin ci log pa ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-24: de bas na yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404a-26: byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun las rtsa ba'ang shes /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de ni yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-10: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba shes pa nas mthar phyin pa'i bar du shes pa zhes bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-15: byang chub sems dpa' zhu ba la dngos po rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-17: bdag shes par bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-19: khyod kyis rtogs shing shes kyang sems can tshad med pa snyed ma rtogs mi shes pa dag gi phyir dngos po 'di dag zhu ba legs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-22: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rtsa ba ni mos pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-23: rgyu ni gsal bar reg pa zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-24: bsdu ba ni tshor ba zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-25: bskyed pa ni legs par yid la byed pa zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-26: bdag po ni dran pa zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-27: ded dpon ni ting nge 'dzin ces bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-28: rgyal ba ni shes rab ces bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-29: yang dag pa ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-30: mthar phyin pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:404b-32: shin tu mos pa ni thog ma sems bskyed pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-2: de bas na mos pa ni rtsa ba zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-5: 'jig rten na sdug bsngal thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni sred pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-6: nad thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni kha zas ma zhu ba yin no zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-7: zhal che thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni rtsod pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-8: mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni rdzun yin no zhes bya ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas sngar mdo sde 'di'i nang nas dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni bag byas pa lags so zhes gsungs la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-12: da ni mos pa lags so zhes gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-15: gal te skye ba'i rgyu la bya na ni shin tu mos pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-16: gal te gsal ba'i rgyu la bya na ni bag byed pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-18: 'jig rten pa dag 'bras bu thams cad kyi rgyu ni sa bon yin no zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-19: gzhan yang sa bon ni skye ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-20: sa ni gsal ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don yang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde gzhan las byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu @405b rtsa bdun gyi rtsa ba ni sangs rgyas lags so zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thog ma shes pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi rtsa ba yin no zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-3: gang rang gis rig pa la ni shin tu mos pa rtsa ba yin no zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-6: de la ji ltar na gsal bar rig pa la rgyu zhes bgyi ba lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas bar bar ni gsal ba la shes rab ces kyang gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-10: bar bar ni dad pa zhes kyang gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-12: dad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-13: de bas na reg pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-14: dge ba'i bshes la bsten pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis dam pa'i chos thos par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-16: dam pa'i chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis lus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-18: yid kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-22: yid kyi las yongs su dag pa'i rkyen gyis yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:405b-24: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen gyis yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-0: yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rkyen gyis @406a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-1: bas mtha'i dgon pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-2: bas mtha'i dgon pa la dga' ba'i rkyen gyis shin tu yid la byed par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-3: shin tu yid la byas pas chos bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-4: chos bzhin du gnas pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thob ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa snyed choms par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-6: de ni reg pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-8: tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-9: sems can gyis tshor ba myong ba na dge ba dang sdig pa byed par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-10: de bas na tshor ba la sdud pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-12: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa mang po skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-13: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa choms par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-14: de bas na tshor ba sdud pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-15: shin tu legs par yid la byed pa'i rkyen gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa choms par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-16: de bas na bskyed pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-18: brtson 'grus su nan tan byas na byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-19: gang gis de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhom par bsams na dran pa la rag lus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406a-20: de bas na dran pa ni bdag po zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-0: 'jig rten na tshogs rnam pa bzhi ni dmag dpon gyi yid bzhin du 'gro ba ltar byang @406b chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-1: bdag po dran pa'i rjes su 'gro'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-3: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad rtogs par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-4: de bas na ting nge 'dzin ni ded dpon zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-5: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa'ang shes rab mchog tu 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-6: de bas na shes rab ni rgyal ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-7: de ltar shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa rtogs nas shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-8: ji ltar 'jig rten na tshogs rnam bzhis dgra pham pa'ang dpa' bo gcig gam gnyis tsam la rag lus pa ltar byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-9: shes rab kyi mthus nyon mongs pa bcom pas shes rab kyi rgyal ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-11: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la nan tan byas pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-14: yang dag pa zhes mi bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-15: gang nyon mongs pa bcom nas rnam par grol ba thob pa'i tshe /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-16: don yang dag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-17: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la sems bskyed de nan tan byas pas 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:406b-19: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-0: rnam par grol ba thob mod kyi mthar @407a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-2: gang zhig gis byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun sbyong ba'i dngos po yongs su bcad na de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-3: de bas na mthar phyin pa la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes ngas gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-5: gzhan yang shin tu 'dod pa'i sems ni mos pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-6: shin tu 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-7: de ni reg pa zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas tshor ba zhes kyang bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-10: de ni sdud pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas shin tu yid la byed par 'gyur te bskyed pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-12: chos rnam pa 'di bzhi'i rkyen gyis byang chub skye ba ni mos pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-19: chos rnam pa 'di gsum gyi rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba gnyis thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-20: 'dod pa yongs su bcad pas ni sems rnam par grol la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-21: ma rig pa yongs su bcad pas shes rab rnam par grol te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-22: de ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407a-23: de ltar chos rnam pa 'di brgyad kyis mthar 'bras bu thob par 'gyur bas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-0: mthar phyin pa @407b zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-2: gzhan yang mos pa ni sems bskyed nas rab tu byung ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-3: reg pa ni gsol pa dang bzhi'i las byas pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-5: bzung ba ni tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis nod pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-7: rtsa ba yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-9: yongs su bzung ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-10: bskyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhi la nan tan byed pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-11: bdag po ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-12: lan gcig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-13: ded dpon ni lan gcig phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-14: rgyal ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-15: yang dag pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-16: mthar phyin pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-18: gzhan yang mos pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-19: reg pa ni skye mched drug go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-21: skye ba ni ma rig pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-22: bdag po ni ming dang gzugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-25: yang dag pa ni srid pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-26: mthar phyin pa ni skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-30: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-34: bskyed pa dang gsum la tha dad pa'ang ci mchis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:407b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-0: rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni @408a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-1: thog ma sems bskyed pa la bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-2: rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-3: bskyed pa ni 'dra ba 'gags nas 'dra ba bskyed pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-5: gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni byed pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-6: rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-7: bskyed ba zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yod kyang ma myong ba'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-10: nam myong bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na bskyed pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-12: gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-16: mdo sde 'di las rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam mo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-17: rgyu zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam mo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-18: bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni mi slob pa'i lam mo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-19: gzhan yang rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i rgyu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-20: rgyu zhes bya ba ni thabs yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-21: thabs mkhas pas 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-22: 'bras bu thob pas bskyed pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-23: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis yang gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar mthar phyin pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi na mya ngan las 'das pa de thob par rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408a-27: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-3: dge bsnyen ma gang zhig 'du shes bcu la nan tan byas na des mya ngan las 'das pa thob par rig par bya'o /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-6: mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-7: sdug bsngal bar 'du shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-8: bdag med par 'du shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-9: kha zas spong bar 'du shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-10: 'jig rten thams cad la mi chags par 'du shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-12: nyes pa'i skyon mang bar 'du shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-15: sred pa med par 'du shes pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-21: dge bsnyen ma gang gis 'du shes rnam pa bcu po 'di la nan tan byas na mthar nges par mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-22: de bas na gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa rtogs par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-23: de ni yang dag pa'i dge slong yin pa nas dge bsnyen dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-24: dge bsnyen ma yang dag pa'i bar du yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-25: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:408b-27: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nas dge bsnyen ma'i bar du mi rtag par 'du shes pa la nan tan bgyid pa lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-2: byang chub sems dpa' la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-3: thog ma sems bskyed pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-4: byang chub la nan tan byed pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-5: mi rtag par 'du shes pa la'ang rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-8: thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi rtag pa la 'du shes pa'i tshe na 'di snyam du sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-9: 'jig rten gyi dngos po la'ang rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-12: de ltar nang gi dngos po ni mi rtag la 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-13: bdag gi lus 'di thog ma btsas pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-17: shi ba la sogs pa'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-18: tshad so sor tha dad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-19: de bas na nang gi dngos po ni mi rtag par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-21: gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can dag la brtags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-22: kha cig kha dog dang mdog dang mthu stobs su ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-23: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la thogs pa med par dbang du gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-24: kha cig ni nad kyis gzir nas shin tu rid de mdog dang kha dog tu mi ldan /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-25: mthu dang stobs med pas dbang du ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-26: kha cig ni shin tu longs spyod dang ldan te bang mdzod kyang yongs su gang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-27: kha cig ni dbul phongs pas ci'ang mi bdog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409a-28: kha cig ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par mthong ngo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-0: kha cig @409b ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan par mthong bas de bas na nges par nang gi chos ni mi rtag par rig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-1: gzhan yang phyi rol gyi chos rnams ni sa bon dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-6: 'bras bu'i tshe so sor tha dad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-7: de ltar phyi rol gyi chos kyang kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-8: kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-9: de bas na phyi rol gyi chos thams cad kyang mi rtag par rig go snyam sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-10: de ltar chos thams cad mi rtag par rtogs nas thos pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad la 'di ltar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-11: bdag gis thos na mtho ris kyi lha rnams kyang shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-12: mngon par shes pa dang dbang du ldan yang ltas lnga mngon par byung bas de bas na mi rtag par rig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-13: gzhan yang bskal pa thog ma'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang so so nas yon tan mchog dam pa dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-14: so so'i lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed kyi nyi ma zla ba'i 'od la rag ma lus so zhes thos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-15: mi rtag pa'i mthus 'od kyang nyams nas yon tan yang med par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-16: gzhan yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bu gling bzhi la dbang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:409b-17: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i dbang chen po thob kyang mi rtag pa bcom ma nus so zhes thos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-0: gzhan yang sa chen po 'di la sngon ni sems @410a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-1: can tshad med pa snyed bde bar gnas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-2: shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis stongs med par sman dam pa sna tshogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-4: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-5: 'bras bu la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa las da ni sems can bsod nams chung pas sa chen po 'di'i mthu stobs med par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-6: sa las skyes pa'i rnams kyang ro med cing ya ma brlar gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-7: de bas na phyi nang gi chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-8: de ni mi rtag pa sbom po zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-9: de ltar sbom po rtogs nas mthar gyis phra mo la rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-10: de la phra mo zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyi nang gi chos thams cad nas rdul phra rab kyi bar du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rtag par rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-13: mtshan ma yongs su bcom pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-14: gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs de mi rtag pa ma yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-15: gzugs la khyad par gyi dus rnam pa 'di bcu yod do zhes smra ba mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-21: sha gong gong por gyur pa'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-22: yan lag skyes pa'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-23: bus ba chung ngu'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410a-26: dar la bab pa'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-0: @410b byang chub sems dpa' nur nur po'i tshe na mi rtag pa ma yin par rtog na mer mer nas lang tsho ba'i bar du'ang mi 'gyur la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-1: mi rtag pa ma yin par rtog na rgas par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-2: de ltar dus mang po skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa ma yin na bags kyis skye bar mi rigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-3: dus gcig tu tshad du phyin par skye bar rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-4: de ltar dus gcig tu tshad du phyin par skye ba'i gnas med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-5: de bas na nges par skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa'i mi rtag pa phra mo yod par rig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-6: gzhan yang gang zag kha cig ni sngon dbang po dang mdog tu ldan te; phyis rgud cing nyams pa'ang mthong bas na gang zag de ni skad cig skad cig gis nges par mi rtag par mngon no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-7: gzhan yang chen po bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-8: spyod lam bzhi la rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-9: gzhan yang phyi nang rnam pa gnyis la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rnam pa gnyis gnyis yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-14: gzhan yang de ltar rnam pa bzhi po de skad cig gis mi rtag pa phra mo ma yin na sdug bsngal rnam pa bzhi po'ang gsung ba'i mi rigs so snyam du sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-15: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis de ltar rtog na de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa phra mo la rtog pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:410b-16: phyi nang gi gzugs la ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi chos kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-2: skye mched drug la spyod pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-3: skye mched drug la spyod pa na bar bar ni dga' ba'i sems skye /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-4: bar bar ni zhe sdang gi sems skye /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-5: bar bar ni 'dod pa'i sems skye /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-6: bar bar ni dran pa'i sems skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-7: de ltar tha dad pa'i sems skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-8: gcig tu ma chad pas gzugs kyi chos dang gzugs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag par rig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-10: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig skad cig skad cig la chos thams cad skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-12: mi rtag par mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-14: mkhas pa shes rab can ni de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byas nas rtag pa'i nga rgyal dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-15: rtag pa'i phyin ci log dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-16: phyin ci log gi 'du shes yongs su spong ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-17: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la nan tan byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-18: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'di ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur snyam bsams na sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa'i rgyu las byung bar shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-19: mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-22: shi ba myong bar gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-26: shi ba'i rkyen gyis mi rtag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411a-27: mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis phyi nang gi sdug bsngal mang po myong ba ni bkres pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-6: gshe ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-7: de ltar sdug bsngal mang po myong ba'ang mi rtag pa'i rkyen gyis myong bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-8: gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni lus 'di la mi rtag pa'i snod yin par rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-9: snod sdug bsngal ba yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-10: de ltar snod sdug bsngal ba yin pas bcud kyang de dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal gyi chos yin par rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-13: mkhas pa shes rab can ni skye ba nyid kyang sdug bsngal bar rtog la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-14: 'gog pa'ang sdug bsngal bar rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-15: sdug bsngal gyis skye zhing 'gog pas na mi rtag pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-16: bdag dang bdag gi ba ma yin par mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-17: gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni sdug bsngal nyid mi rtag pa yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-18: mi rtag pa nyid kyang sdug bsngal ba yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-19: de ltar sdug bsngal ba nyid mi rtag pa yin pas na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod ces smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-20: de ltar bdag ma yin pas na mi rtag pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-21: de bzhin du phung po lnga'ang sdug bsngal ba'ang yin la mi rtag pa'ang yin na sems can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod ces smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:411b-22: gzhan yang chos thams cad ni tha dad 'dus pa las skyes kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-0: gcig bu zhig 'dus pa las chos thams cad skyes pa'ang ma @412a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-2: chos gcig kyang thams cad 'dus pa'i 'bras bu ma yin par rtogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-3: 'dus pa thams cad bdag gi rang bzhin yang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-4: gcig pa'i rang bzhin yang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-5: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-6: dngos po'i rang bzhin yang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-7: dbang du gyur pa'i rang bzhin yang med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-8: chos thams cad la gal te rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid de dag yod na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir bdag yod par smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-9: gzhan yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad la chos gcig tsam yang byed pa po med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-10: de ltar chos gcig tsam yang byed pa po med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-11: chos thams cad 'dus pa las byed pa po yang med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-12: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rang skye ba'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-14: 'dus pa las 'gog cing 'dus pa las skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-15: de ltar chos skyes nas sems can gyis phyin ci log pa'i 'du shes bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-17: sems can gyis phyin ci log tu 'du shes pas yang dag pa'i bden pa med na ci'i phyir yang dag par bdag yod do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-18: de bas na mkhas pa shes rab can ni bdag med par rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-19: gzhan yang ci'i rgyu dang ci'i rkyen gyis sems can gyis bdag tu 'dzin snyam du rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-20: bdag de yod pa zhig yin na bdag de gcig tu zad dam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412a-21: mang du yod snyam rtog go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-0: gal te bdag @412b de gcig tu zad na ci'i phyir rgyal rigs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-8: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-13: de bas na bdag ces bya ba ni gcig ma yin par rig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-14: bdag ces bya ba de gal te mang na ci'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi bdag ces bya ba de gcig ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-15: thams cad du khyab la mtha' med do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-16: de bas na gcig dang mang po gnyis ka la bdag med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-17: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar bdag med par rtogs nas rim gyis kha zas yongs su spong bar byed pa'i 'du shes la rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-18: 'di snyam du gal te chos thams cad mi rtag pa'ang yin la sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-19: ci'i phyir kha zas kyi phyir lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba bskyed par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-20: sems can gyis kha zas la chags pa'i phyir lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-21: zang zing thob pa rnams gzhan dang thun mong du gyur kyang sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa myong ba na thun mong du len pa med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-23: mkhas pa shes rab can ni gzhan yang 'di ltar rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:412b-24: sems can thams cad ni kha zas kyi phyir lus dang sems sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-0: de ltar sdug bsngal mang po'i @413a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-1: rkyen gyis kha zas thob par gyur na bdag gis ci'i phyir kha zas de la chags pa'i sems bskyed snyam du bsams nas kha zas la chags pa'i sems skye bar mi byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-2: gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can gyis lus kyi rgyu gang yin pa brtags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-3: de ni kha zas kyi rkyen gyis lus skye zhing 'phel bar rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-4: da bdag gis khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-5: tshul khrims mnos pa'ang lus 'di yongs su gtong bar byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-6: da kha zas la chags na lus 'di ji ltar gtang bar bya snyam rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-7: de ltar brtags nas kha zas len mod kyi 'brog dgon pa'i yi dvags kyis bu'i sha la za ba tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-8: yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed nas de la chags par mi byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-9: de ltar kha zas la skyon mang po yod par rtogs nas mthar gyis reg pa'i kha zas la 'di ltar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-11: ba'i ko ba bshus na srin bu tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su za ba ltar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-12: gzhan yang mthar gyis bsam pa'i zas la 'di ltar rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-14: me'i phung po chen po dang 'dra bar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413a-15: rnam par shes pa'i kha zas la ni mtshon shakti sum brgyas btsugs pa dang 'dra bar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-0: mkhas pa shes rab can ni de ltar kha zas rnam pa bzhi rtogs @413b nas nam du'ang kha zas la chags pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-2: gal te skyes na'ang mi gtsang ba la yongs su rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-4: kha zas la chags pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-5: kha zas thams cad la mi gtsang bar shin tu rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-6: ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang 'dra bar shin tu rtogs nas gal te kha zas bzang po rnyed dam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-7: ngan pa rnyed na'ang len pa'i tshe /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-8: rma'am shu ba ma rungs pa la sman gyis bskus pa dang 'dra bar sems kyi chags pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-9: 'dod pa'i sems nam du'ang mi skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-11: mkhas pa shes rab can gang zhig gis de lta bur rtogs na de ni kha zas kyi 'du shes yongs su spong ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-15: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar kha zas la mi gtsang bar rtog pa na 'on te yang dag par rtog gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-17: gal te yang dag par rtog na rtog pa'i kha zas de ni mi gtsang ba ma lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-18: gal te sgyu ma tsam du bas na chos de yang dag par 'du shes pa lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-21: de ltar 'du shes pa de ni yang dag pa'ang ma yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:413b-23: kha zas la chags pa yongs su spong bar 'gyur bas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-0: @414a *// srin bu ma yin pa la srin bur mthong bas na sgyu ma zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-2: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni sgyu ma yin mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-5: gal te dge slong zhig bsod snyoms la 'gro bar gzas na thog ma nas 'di snyam du sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-6: bdag gis deng kha zas bzang po thob cing ngan pa thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-7: mang du rnyed cing nyung ngur mi 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-8: myur du thob cing thogs par mi 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs na dge slong de ni kha zas la yongs su spong ba'i 'du shes thob pa ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-9: dge ba'i chos spyod pa'ang nyin mtshan du 'gribs shing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-10: mi dge ba'i chos ni skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-12: dge slong gang zhig bsod snyoms la 'gro bar gzas pa na thog ma 'di snyam du gang bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa de dag kha zas kyis chog par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-13: gang bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa de bsod nams tshad med pa thob par gyur cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-14: bdag gis bsod snyoms 'di'ang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i lus 'di gso zhing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414a-15: dge ba'i chos la nan tan byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-0: sbyin bdag gi phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur bar sems pa de ni dge ba'i spyod pa'ang nyin mtshan du skye @414b zhing 'phel la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-1: mi dge ba'i chos kyang khad kyis byang bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-3: dge slong gang zhig de lta bur nan tan byed na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-4: gang zag de ni yul gcig gi sbyin pa len pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-6: mkhas pa shes rab can ni de ltar 'du shes rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas 'jig rten la ma chags pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byed par 'gyur te; yang 'di snyam du 'jig rten thams cad na skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-9: shi ba'i gnas ma yin pa med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-10: bdag gi lus 'di ni gang du'ang ma skyes pa'i gnas med do; ;gal te 'jig rten na gnas gcig tsam yang skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-13: shi ba ma yin pa'i gnas med na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-14: bdag gis ci'i phyir 'jig rten la chags par bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-15: 'jig rten pa thams cad ni gong nas gong du 'phar ba'ang med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-16: phyir mi ldog pa'ang med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-17: de bas na 'jig rten ni nges par mi rtag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-18: de ltar mi rtag pa yin na ci'i phyir mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'jig rten la chags par byed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-19: sems can re res kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sdug bsngal ma myong ba'i gnas med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:414b-20: mtho ris kyi tshangs pa'i lhar skyes pa nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng gi lha'i bar du skyes kyang tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-1: por skyes pa nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi lha'i bar du skyes kyang tshe 'phos ma thag tu byol song gi skye gnas su skyes nas seng ge dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-7: bong bu la sogs par skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-8: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba longs spyod dang dbang du ldan pa'ang bsod nams zad na dbul phongs bar 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-9: kha zas kyis mi 'tsho ba la'ang shin tu brtag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-10: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar shin tu rtogs nas 'jig rten la mi chags pa'i 'du shes skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-11: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis gzhan yang 'di ltar rtog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-12: 'jig rten gyi chos kyis khang khyim dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-20: rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-22: rin po che la sogs pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral ba yin yang dngos po de dag ni rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-23: ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal yongs su spong bar 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-25: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis de ltar rtogs nas 'jig rten gyi dngos po thams cad la chags pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415a-30: gang zag gcig nad tshabs chen pos btab na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-0: rol mo rnam pa sna @415b tshogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-3: phreng ba rnam pa mang po yod kyang de la 'dod pa'am chags pa'i sems mi skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-4: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis rtogs pa'ang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-6: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis 'jig rten thams cad la skyabs su 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-7: rnam par grol ba'i gnas ma yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-8: rab tu zhi ba'i gnas ma yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-9: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas ma yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-14: yongs su dag pa'i chos ma yin par shin tu brtag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-15: gal te bdag gis de ltar 'jig rten la chags par gyur na bdag gis ji lta bur chos de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-17: mi zhig mun pa mi 'dod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-18: snang ba 'tshol ba las phyir mun pa'i nang du 'gro ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-19: mun pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-20: snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-21: gal te bdag gis 'jig rten la chags te mun pa bskyed na 'od snang ba dang yongs su bral bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-22: mun pa ni ma rig pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-23: snang ba ni shes rab bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-24: shes rab dang snang ba'i rgyu ni 'jig rten la ma chags pa'i 'du shes yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-25: 'dod pa ni kun nas bcings pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang bdag ni shes rab kyi snang ba 'dod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:415b-26: 'jig rten gyi chags pa ni mi 'dod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-0: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis shin @416a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-2: de ltar rtogs nas 'jig rten la mi chags pa'i 'du shes dang ldan par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-4: mkhas pa shes rab can ni 'jig rten la ma chags pa'i 'du shes la nan tan byas nas rim gyis shi ba'i 'du shes la nan tan byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-6: rtag tu dgra sdang ba tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su bskor te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-7: skad cig skad cig gis nyams par byed kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-8: skye zhing 'phel bar mi byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-10: chu gzar po ltar mi gnas pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-11: rtsva'i kha na zil pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-12: gsod du khrid pa dag shi ba la nye ba'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-14: lug gshed ma'i drung du khrid pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-15: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-17: ji ltar na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis skad cig skad cig gis 'gog par rtogs pa lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-21: dper na 'phong skyen pa'i mi bzhi zhig lhan cig tu 'dus nas so so nas 'di skad ces bgros so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-22: bdag cag bzhis mda' re re zhig phyogs re re re 'phangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416a-23: cig car 'phangs la cig car sa la ltung bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-0: de la gang zag cig gis 'di snyam du bdag gis skyes bu bzhis 'phangs pa'i mda' sa la ma ltung bar dus gcig tu bdag gi lag gis bzung @416b ngo zhes smra na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-2: gang zag de shin tu myur ba ma yin nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis gsol ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-8: sa la 'gro ba'i yi dvags ni de las kyang myur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-9: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i yi dvags ni sa la 'gro ba'i yi dvags pas kyang myur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-10: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i yi dvags pas kyang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po myur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-11: rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po bas kyang nyi zla'i lha myur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-12: nyi zla'i lha bas kyang shin tu myur ba'i lha myur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-13: shin tu myur ba'i lha pas kyang sems can gyi tshe myur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-15: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba thang cig la sems can gyis 'tsho ba'i tshe skye ba dang 'gog pa bzhi brgya yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-16: gang gis tshe la de ltar rtogs na de ni skad cig skad cig gis 'gog pa rtogs zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-18: mkhas pa shes rab can dag ni 'tsho ba'i srog 'di shi ba'i rgyal bos dbang bar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-19: gal te bdag gis shi ba'i rgyal po yongs su spangs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-21: srog yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-22: gzhan yang mkhas pa shes rab can ni tshe dang srog la chu 'gram g-yang sa'i shing chen po dang 'dra bar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:416b-23: gzhan yang mi zhig nyes pa chen po byas pa gsod du khrid pa las mgon med pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-0: ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge @417a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-2: sbrul gdug pa rlung chen po rdub pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-3: rta shin tu skom pa chu la chags pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-4: yi dvags ma rungs pa shin tu khro ba dang 'dra bar sems can gyi 'chi bdag gi rgyal po'ang de dang 'dra bar rtog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-6: mkhas pa shes rab can gang zhig gis de lta bu'i tshul du shin tu rtogs na de ni shi ba'i 'du shes la nan tan byas pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-8: mkhas pa shes rab can ni gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-9: bdag da rab tu byung nas tshe dang srog zhag bdun las mi thub kyang bdag gis shin tu brtson 'grus bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-11: sems can la phan pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-12: bde ba'i don du chos ston pa ni mkhas pa shes rab can gyis shi ba'i 'du shes la nan tan byed pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-13: nyin zhag bdun lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-19: dus gcig nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba nas skad cig thang cig gi bar du bdag gis byang chub la brtson 'grus su nan tan byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-20: tshul khrims kyi yongs su srung ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417a-21: sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du chos ston pa ni mkhas pa shes rab can gyis shi ba'i 'du shes la nan tan byed pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-0: mkhas pa shes rab @417b can gyis gong du smos pa'i 'du shes rnam pa drug dang ldan pas 'du shes kyi rgyu rnam pa 'di bdun la nan tan byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-3: rtag pa la nan tan byed pa'i 'du shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-4: bde ba la nan tan byed pa'i 'du shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-5: zhe sdang med pa'i 'du shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-6: phrag dog med pa'i 'du shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-9: nga rgyal med pa'i 'du shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-10: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang du gyur pa'i 'du shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-12: dge slong gang zhig 'du shes rnam pa 'di bdun dang ldan pa 'di ni dge slong zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-14: rab tu zhi ba zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-15: yongs su dag pa zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-16: rnam par grol ba zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-17: mkhas pa shes rab can zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-18: yang dag par lta ba zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-20: sman pa'i rgyal po zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-21: ded dpon zhes kyang bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-22: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la shin tu mkhas pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i gsung rnam pa bdun rtog pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-24: yang dag par shes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:417b-26: gsung rnam pa bdun la the tshom du gyur pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-0: gang zag su zhig 'du shes rnam pa drug dang ldan na gang zag de ni 'jig rten gsum la yongs su smod cing 'jig rten gsum yongs su @418a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-1: spong zhing 'jig rten gsum zhi bar byed pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-2: 'jig rten gsum la ma chags pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-3: de ni mkhas pa shes rab can 'du shes rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-4: dge slong gang zhig rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na dge sbyong gi mtshan ma dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sangs rgyas la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-6: 'jig rten bcas la thugs brtse sman pa'i rgyal po ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-7: sku dang shes rab gnyis ka rnam par zhi ba ste //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-8: bdag med pa yi chos la nges par bdag yod pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-9: de bas bla med rgyal la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-10: thog ma'i sems dang mthar phyin gnyis ka rnam brtags na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-11: mthar phyin sems pas thog ma'i sems ni rab dga'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-12: bdag kyang rnam par ma grol ba ni gzhan sgrol te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-13: de bas bdag gi thog ma'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-14: thog ma'i sems ni lha dang mi yi ston par 'gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-15: nyan thos pa dang rang rgyal rnams las shin tu 'phags //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-16: sems bskyed de ni 'jig rten gsum las shin tu 'das //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-17: de bas mchog tu rgyal ba'i bla na med ces bya //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-18: 'jig rten mgon ni bsgrubs pas thob par rab 'gyur te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsol ba med par mgon du gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-0: sangs rgyas 'jig rten @418b gshegs pa ba dang be'u bzhin te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-1: de bas thugs rje chen po'i khyu mchog ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-2: de bzhin gshegs kyi yon tan phyogs bcur kun tu khyab //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-3: ma rabs shes pa med pas bstod par mi 'gyur te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-4: bdag gis thugs rje chen po'i stobs la bstod pa ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-5: lus dang ngag gi lus kyi drin rnams bsab pa'i phyir //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-6: 'jig rten rnams ni bdag la phan pa'i don byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-7: de bzhin gshegs ni 'phrin las de dag ston mdzad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-8: skye bo mang po'i rnam par smin pa yongs bcad de //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-9: de bas bdag dang gzhan don byed la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-10: 'jig rten bcas ni gnyen la phan pa'i don cher byed //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-11: de bzhin gshegs kyis don mdzad pa la byams sdang med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-12: de bzhin gshegs la 'jig rten lta bu'i mtshan nyid med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-13: de bas thugs ni gnyis su med par kun la snyoms //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-14: 'jig rten bcas ni byed pa gzhan la smra ba gzhan //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-15: de bzhin gshegs kyi gsung ba mdzad dang tha dad med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-16: mdzad pa de dag thams cad 'du byed [?] gcod de //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-17: de bas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ni grags par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa yi skyon rnams kun rtogs nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-19: sems can don gyi slad du bzhugs pa'ang mngon par bstan //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-20: 'jig rten 'di na rnam par grol ba yun ring yang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-21: thugs brtse'i slad du 'khor bar bzhugs la dga' bar gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:418b-22: lha yi lus dang mi yi lus su mngon ston kyang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-0: @419a *// thugs rje chen pos rjes su gshegs pa be'u bzhin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-1: de bzhin gshegs ni sems can kun gyi yum lags pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-2: thugs rje chen po'i thugs de nyid ni be'u lta bu //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-3: sems can rnams la dgongs phyir sdug bsngal myong ba mdzad //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-4: thugs rjes dgongs pa'i dus na 'gyod pa'i thugs mi mnga'//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-5: thugs rje sems dang ldan pas sdug bsngal mi tshor te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-6: de bas sdug bsngal yongs su sgrol la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams tshad med kun mdzad kyang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-8: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni rnam par dag /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-9: sems can slad du don mdzad bdag phyir ma yin te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-10: de bas rnam par dag pa'i las la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-11: sangs rgyas sdug bsngal myong yang sdug bsngal mi tshor te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-12: sdug bsngal myong ba mthong na bdag gis myong ba bzhin //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-13: sems can slad du sems can dmyal bar zhugs gyur kyang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-14: sdug bsngal ba dang 'gyod pa'i thugs ni mi skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-15: so so'i skye bo sdug bsngal mang po myong ba yang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis ni thams cad len //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-17: de dag myong nas thugs ni shin tu brten par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-18: de bas bla med byang chub rnams la shin tu brtson //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419a-19: de bzhin gshegs ni ro gcig thugs rje chen po yis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-0: so so'i skye bo @419b kun la sras gcig 'dra bar dgongs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-1: bcom ldan skyabs su 'gyur bar sems can mi shes pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-2: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skur ba 'debs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-3: 'jig rten rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs dang bcas te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-4: de bzhin tshad med nyes pa'i skyon rnams dang yang bcas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-5: kun nas nyon mongs nyes pa'i skyon rnams ci mchis pa //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-6: thog ma thugs bskyed pa yi tshe na thams cad bcom //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bstod gyur te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs gzhan gyis bstod ma nus //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-9: bdag gis deng 'dir chos gcig tsam gyis mngon par bstod //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-10: thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis 'jig rten gshegs pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-11: de bzhin gshegs kyi chos kyi phung po byams pa ste //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-12: byams pa'i thugs kyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-13: de ni bla na med pa'i rnam par grol ba ste //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-14: rnam par grol ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-15: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-16: 'od srung gis yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-17: bam po lnga bcu gcig pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:419b-19: gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-0: gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i rtag tu gnas pa'i gzugs @420a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-5: rnam par shes pa'ang mi rtag pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-6: rnam par shes pa 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i rtag tu gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-8: gzugs ni sdug bsngal ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-9: gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i gzugs bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-13: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-16: stong pa'i gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis stong pa ma yin pa'i gzugs kyi rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-20: rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-23: gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i gzugs yang dag pa'i bdag thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-27: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-29: gzugs yongs su ma dag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420a-30: gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i gzugs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur te /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-10: 'chi ba'i ma yin pa thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-14: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-17: gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i gzugs ma rig pa ma yin pa thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-21: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-23: gzugs ni skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-28: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-30: gzugs phyin ci log bzhi'i rgyur 'gyur ro //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:420b-35: rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-0: gzugs mi dge ba'i chos tshad med pa'i @421a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-3: pho dang mo la sogs pa'i lus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-13: rnam par shes pa'i zas dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-16: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-18: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-21: sgrib pa lnga la sogs pa'i chos ni gzugs las gyur to //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-26: rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-28: gzugs ni 'ching bas rnam par bcings pa'o //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-30: rnam par grol ba'i gzugs bcings pa med pa thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-34: rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421a-36: gzugs ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421b-0: rgyun gyi gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par grol ba'i @421b gzugs rgyun ma yin pa thob par 'gyur te /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421b-21: gzugs 'gags pa'i rkyen gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs rab tu zhi ba thob par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421b-25: rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421b-27: gang zag su zhig de lta bu'i tshul du zhes na de ni dge sbyong zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421b-32: bram ze'i chos dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:421b-34: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma gtogs par logs shig na dge sbyong med /
