K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-2: bram ze'i chos kyang med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-3: mu stegs can thams cad ni brdzun du smra bar zad kyi yang dag pa'i spyod pa med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-4: rnam pa de gnyis ltar tshul 'chos mod kyi rnam pa de gnyis kyi gnas med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-6: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i chos med par ci'i phyir dge sbyong dang bram ze yod do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-7: ngas kyang rtag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-8: khyed kyang rtag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por seng ge'i sgra sgrags shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-9: de'i tshe mu stegs can tshad med pa snyed de skad ces gsungs pa thos nas zhe sdang gi sems bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-10: dge sbyong goo ta mas bdag cag la dge sbyong dang bram ze'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-11: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i chos kyang med do zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-12: bdag cag gi thabs ji ltar bya zhes 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-14: bdag cag gi 'khor la'ang dge sbyong dang dge sbyong gi chos kyang yod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-15: bram ze dang bram ze'i chos kyang yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-16: de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na kun tu rgyu gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-18: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni tshig ni smyon pa dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-19: tha mi dad na yid ches su'ang ci yod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422a-20: 'jig rten na mi smyon pa dag kyang bar 'ga' ni glu len /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-4: gnyen dang dgra'i bye brag kyang mi phyed pa ltar //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-5: dge sbyong goo ta ma'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-6: bar 'ga' ni nga rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khab tu skyes zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-7: bar 'ga' ni mi skyes zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-8: bar 'ga' ni skyes nas gom pa bdun bor zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-9: bar 'ga' ni gar yang ma song zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-10: bar 'ga' ni 'jig rten gyi dngos po dag chung ngu'i tshe na bslabs so zhes smra //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-11: bar 'ga' ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-12: bar 'ga' ni rgyal po'i khab na bde ba'i gnas na longs spyod cing bu'ang btsas so zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-13: bar 'ga' ni de dag thams cad la smad de mi 'dod do zhes kyang smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-14: bar 'ga' ni dka' ba lo drug gi bar du spyod do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-15: bar 'ga' ni mu stegs can gyi dka' ba spyod pa la yongs su smod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-16: bar 'ga' ni au dum ba ra dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-17: aa la la la sogs pa sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos so zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-18: bar 'ga' ni byang chub kyi shing drung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-19: bar 'ga' ni nga byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang ma phyin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-20: ci'ang thob pa med do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-21: bar 'ga' ni nga'i lus 'di nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:422b-22: bar 'ga' ni nga'i lus 'di 'gags pa na mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-1: smra'o cog ni smyon pa dang 'dra na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-2: de la yid ches shing mi dgar yang ci zhig yod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-3: bram ze rnams kyis de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-5: da bdag cag gis mya ngan mi bya ba'i gtol ga la zhig yod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-6: dge slong goo ta ma sngon rab tu byung nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-10: bdag med pa la sogs pa bstan pas bdag cag gi nye gnas rnams kyis thos nas shin tu 'jigs pa skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-11: ji ltar na sems can dag mi rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-14: yongs su ma dag pa yin no zhes de'i tshig la yid ma ches so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-15: da dge sbyong goo ta mas shing s'a la'i tshal 'dir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po la rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-18: yongs su dag pa'i chos yod do zhes bstan pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-19: bdag cag gi nye gnas rnams kyis de skad ces thos nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-21: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i tshig la yid ches par gyur pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-22: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mya ngan chen po skyes par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-23: de'i tshe na gzhan yang bram ze gcig cig de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423a-27: dge sbyong goo ta ma thugs rje dang ldan no zhes bya'i tshig rdzun te yang dag pa ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-0: gal te thugs rje dang @423b ldan na ci'i phyir bdag cag gi slob ma bdag cag gi chos kyis snying rje'i 'bras bu thob pa'ang pha rol gyi rjes su 'gro bar yid bsgyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-1: bdag gis bsam pa dang 'gal bar mdzad pas thugs rje dang ldan pa zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-2: de la gang zhig dge sbyong goo ta ma la 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos so zhes smra na de'ang brdzun du smra ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-3: gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa'o zhes smra na ci'i phyir bdag cag gi rnyed pa la sogs pa 'phrog par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-4: gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di cho rigs che ba yin no zhes smra na'ang brdzun du smra ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-6: gna' nas ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni byi ba chung ngu gsod do zhes ma thos /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-8: gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di cho rigs che ba yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag la sogs pa la yongs su 'tshe bar byed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-9: gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma la mthu chen po dang ldan no zhes smra na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-10: de'ang brdzun du smra ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-12: gna' nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po ni bya khva skegs dang 'thab bo zhes ma thos /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-14: gal te mthu che ba zhig yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag dang rtsod par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:423b-15: gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i thugs dang ldan no zhes smra na de'ang brdzun du smra ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-1: shes de dang ldan na ci'i phyir bdag cag gis bsams pa'i sems mi shes /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-3: bdag gis sdon rgan rabs mkhas pa las 'di skad ces thos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-4: da ste lo brgya 'das na sgyu ma sgyu can zhig 'byung ba ni dge sbyong goo ta ma la bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-5: sgyu ma sgyu can 'di ni ring por mi thogs par shing s'a la'i tshal 'dir med par 'gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-6: khyed la sogs pa mya ngan ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-7: de'i tshe na gzhan yang gcer bu pa de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-9: bdag cag mya ngan byed pa ni bdag gi lus kyi phyir ram /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-12: grags pa'i phyir ma lags kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-13: 'jig rten pa gti mug gi mun pas khebs par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-14: bsod nams kyi zhing dang bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin pa mi shes nas sngon gyi rgan rabs shes pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze ni yongs su spangs nas shin tu na gzhon zhing zhes pa med pa la mchod par gyur pas bdag cag mya ngan byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-15: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni rig sngags la mkhas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-16: rig sngags la mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis lus gcig la lus tshad med pa snyed du sprul zhing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-17: lus tshad med pa snyed las kyang lus gcig tu sprul to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424a-18: lus de nyid kyis skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-1: de'ang bdag gi mthus de'i rig sngags kyi mthu med par byed nus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-2: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i rig sngags kyi mthu med par gyur na bdag cag la sogs pa rnyed pa dang grags pa thob cing shin tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-3: de'i tshe na gzhan yang bram ze zhig 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-5: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa tshad med pa dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-6: de bas na khyed la sogs pa de dang rtsod par ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-7: mu stegs can gyi 'khor rnams kyis de la 'di skad smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-8: glen pa gti mug can khyod ci'i phyir dge sbyong goo ta ma la yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-9: btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas ma'ang shi bar gyur na de la bsod nams dang yon tan du ldan no zhes byar rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-11: pha rol pos gshe'ang phyir mi gshe la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-12: pha rol pos brdegs kyang phyir mi rdeg pas de ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-13: sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-15: rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-16: de bas na bsod nams dang yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan par rig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-17: nga rgyal gyi sems med pas sngar gsong por smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:424b-18: gsung ba'i tshig 'jam zhing nges pas ngag rtsub po med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-0: lang tsho'i dus la bab kyang khro ba dang gtum pa @425a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-2: rgyal po'i yul na nor rdzas shin tu mang yang chags pa med par yongs su btang nas rab tu byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-3: ngar snabs dang 'dra bar spangs pas bdag gis ni dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di yon tan phun sum tshogs pa tshad med pa dang ldan par smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-4: de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-6: skyes bu chen po dge sbyong goo ta ma ni yang dag par khyod smra ba ltar yon tan tshad med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-7: mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa dang ldan pas bdag cag ni de dang 'gran mi phod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-8: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni rang bzhin gyis mnyen zhing des te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-9: dka' ba ni ma spyad kyi rgyal po'i khab tu btsas pas slob pa gang la'ang ma zhugs te tshig 'jam por smrar ni rung gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-12: gtsug lag la sogs pa mi shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-13: dam pa'i chos ni mdo tsam zhig bgros te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-14: dge sbyong goo ta ma bdag cag las rgyal na bdag cag gis de'i g-yog bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-15: bdag cag gis de las rgyal na bdag gi g-yog bya dgos so zhes smras nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-16: de'i tshe mu stegs can tshad med pa snyed lhan cig 'dus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-17: yul dbus 'gyur 'chang du rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i drung du lhags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425a-18: rgyal pos de dag mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-0: khyed @425b rnams ni so so na 'phags pa'i lam la nan tan byed pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-1: khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung nas khyim gyi dngos po dang longs spyod thams cad yongs su spangs te yul mi thams cad kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-2: bsti stang dang rim gro byed pa la yid dang 'ga' bar ma byas na ci'i phyir thams cad 'dus te 'dir lhags par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-4: khyed rnams ni so so'i chos 'dzin cing so so'i tshul khrims kyis rab tu byung ste mthun pa'ang ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-5: so so'i tshul khrims kyis rab tu byung ste lam la nan tan byed pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-6: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis deng 'dir bsam pa gcig tu thams cad 'dus pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-8: lo ma lhags pa la rlung drag pos btab na gcig tu 'dus pa ltar thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-9: kho bo ni rtag tu rab tu byung ba'i mgon dang skyabs byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-10: chung ngu na lus dang srog la'ang phangs par mi byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-11: de'i tshe na mu stegs can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-14: rgyal po chen po ni chos kyi zam pa chen po lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-15: chos chen po'i gdar lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-16: chos chen bo'i srang lta bu yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-17: yon tan thams cad kyi snod yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-18: yon tan thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:425b-19: dam pa'i chos kyi lam lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-1: kyi zhing gshin pa lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-2: yul sa thams cad kyi gzhi lta bu yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-3: yul khams thams cad kyi me long gi snang ba lta bu yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-4: lha thams cad kyi gzugs lta bu yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-5: yul mi thams cad kyi pha ma lta bu yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rin po che'i gter ni rgyal po'i lus yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-8: de ci'i phyir yon tan gyi mdzod ces bya zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-9: rgyal pos zhal che gcod pa na gnyen dang dgra la phye brag mi 'byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-13: rlung dang 'dra ste; de bas na rgyal po ni yon tan gyi gter zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-15: da ltar gyi sems can dag tshe'i tshad thung mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-16: rgyal po'i yon tan ni sngon gyi rgyal po tshe ring ba rab tu bde ba'i dus dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-17: gzhan yang rgyal po spyi bo skyes sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-23: pa pa ai tsa gyu la sogs pa dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar rgyal po chen po yang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-25: rgyal po chen po'i rkyen gyis yul mi thams cad bde skyid par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426a-26: de bas na bdag cag rab tu byung ba thams cad yul 'di na gnas par mos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-0: tshul khrims srung zhing yang dag pa'i lam la nan tan bgyid @426b do; ;rgyal po chen po /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-1: bdag cag gi gzhung las rab tu byung ba'i gang zag gang nas gang du gnas pa'i yul de ni tshul khrims srung zhing yang dag ba'i lam la nan tan byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-2: rgyal po la yang dge ba spyod pa'i skal ba mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-4: 'jig rten na rkun shod byed pa thams cad rgyal pos ma mchis par bgyis te rab tu byung ba thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-5: ma rungs pa chen po dge sbyong goo ta ma 'ba' zhig ma mchis par ma bgyis pas bdag cag ni de la rab tu 'jigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-6: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni cho rigs snyems te lus kyi mdog dang ldan la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-7: sngon sbyin pa byin pa'i rkyen gyis rnyed pa mang du rnyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-8: dngos po de dag la snyems pas nga rgyal chen po skyes la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-9: gzhan yang rig sngags la mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis nga rgyal byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-10: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dka' ba spyod mi nus kyi gos dang mal cha la sogs pa shin tu 'jam pa la sogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-11: de bas na 'jig rten na gang zag ma rungs pa thams cad ni rnyed pa dang grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir de'i 'khor du 'du zhing de'i drung du 'dus nas dka' ba ni spyod mi nus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-12: rig sngags kyi mthus 'od srung dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:426b-14: moong+gal ya na la sogs pa btul nas nga'ang bdag cag gi gnas shing s'a la'i tshal 'dir bdag cag gi nye gnas 'khor du bsdu ba'i phyir rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-3: yongs su dag pa'i lus yod do zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-5: dge sbyong goo ta mas ni sngon mi rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-8: yongs su dag pa med pa ston pa'i tshe na bdag cag gis bzod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-9: da 'di skad du rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-12: yongs su dag pa yod do zhes smra la ni bdag cag mi bzod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-16: dge sbyong goo ta mar gzhung 'dzugs shing rtsod du ci gnang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-19: khyed rnams la su zhig gis bslus na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-20: khyed kyi sems shin tu myos shing 'khrugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-23: spre'u shing khar phyin pa 'dra bar gyur pa 'di bdag gis kyang khrel la //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-24: khas pa shes rab can gyis thos na shin tu snying brtse ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-25: glen pa gti mug can gyis thos na 'phya zhing smod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-26: khyed rnams kyis smra ba ni rab tu byung ba'i tshig ma yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-27: gal te khyed rnams la rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad kyis btab na kho bo la sman bzang po yod de khyed rnams 'tsho bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427a-28: gal te yi dvags kyis brla mas na sman pa 'tsho byed sngags la mkhas pas 'tsho bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-0: khyed rnams ni da ltar @427b lag pa'i sen mos ri rab lhun po 'jig pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-1: rdo rje la sos 'debs par 'dod pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-4: glen pa gti mug can gyis seng ge'i rgal po bkres pa nyal zhing 'dug pa las bslang ba'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-5: sbrul gdug pa'i khar lag pa bcug pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-6: thal bas khebs pa'i me mdag la lag pas reg par 'dod pa dang 'dra bar khyed rnams kyang de ltar de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-10: was seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-11: sbrang bu chung du bya nam mkha' lding dang mgyogs bul 'gran pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-12: ri bong gis rgya mtsho'i gting dpag pa dang 'dra bar khyed rnams kyang da ltar de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-13: gal te khyed kyis dge slong goo ta ma las rgyal bar rmi lam gyis mthong na'ang rmi lam de ni rdzun te yid ches su mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-15: khyed rnams 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-17: phye ma leb me'i phung por song ba dang 'dra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-18: kho bos smras pa bzhin du yang ma smra zhig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-19: khyed kyis kho bo la srang dang 'dra bar mnyam mo zhes bstod pa'i tshig kyang gzhan gyis thos par ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-20: de'i tshe na mu stegs can gyis rgyal po la'ang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:427b-22: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i rig sngags kyis btab bam ci na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-0: 'phags pas smra ba'i tshig la yid mi ches shing the tshom za bar @428a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-3: skyes bu chen po 'di dag la brnyas bar ma byed cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-7: rgya mtsho chen po la lan tshva'i ri bro ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-8: ri ma la ya na la sogs pa sus byas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-9: bdag cag bram ze la sogs pas byas pa ma lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-12: drang srong aa gastyas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du gang+g'a'i klung gi chu rna bar blugs pa ma gsan tam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-13: gzhan yang drang srong goo ta ma rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du brgya byin gyi lus su bsgyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-14: brgya byin gyi lus ni lug ma mo mo mtshan stong dang ldan pa'i lus su bsgyur ba ma gsan tam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-15: rgyal po chen po drang srong gi ltos nyi ma gcig gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu cig char 'thungs te sa chen po'ang skams par gyur pa ma gsan tam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-17: drang srong ba spus lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi mig gsum byas pa ma gsan tam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-19: drang srong aa la las grong khyer aa la ba rdul du byas pa ma gsan tam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428a-21: bram ze'i nang na de lta bu'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams mchis te mngon sum du mchis na rgyal po chen po ci'i phyir na bdag cag la shin tu brnyas par byed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-0: rgyal pos smras @428b pa; kye skyes bu dag /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-1: gal te bdag gi smra ba la yid mi ches te 'gran 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar shing s'a la'i drung na bzhugs kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-2: khyed la sogs pa der song la yid bzhin du dris shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par phye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-4: khyed kyi yid bzhin du lan gsung bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-5: de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra mu stegs can gyi 'khor rnams dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-6: sangs rgyas gang na par lhags nas spyi bos phyag btsal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-7: g-yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-10: mu stegs can 'di dag ni ci dang ci sems pa 'dri zhing rgol lo zhes mchi na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas de dang de'i lan bka' stsal du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-16: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas bram ze sha de shu na zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-18: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba rtag pa'i chos lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-19: bram ze chen po de de bzhin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-23: mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag ces bgyi ba de mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:428b-24: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-0: 'jig rten gyi chos ni sa bon @429a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-4: 'jim pa las rdza mar 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-5: skud pa las gos su 'gyur ba dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-6: goo ta mas rtag tu mi rtag pa la nan tan byas na mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-7: rgyu rtag pa ma lags na 'bras bu rtag pa ces bgyir ga la rung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-9: 'dod chags las rnam par grol na mya ngan las 'da' ba lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-11: gzugs med par 'dod chags pa las rnam par grol na mya ngan las 'da' ba lags so; ;ma rig pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gags na mya ngan las 'da' ba lags so zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-12: 'dod chags nas ma rig pa'i nyon mongs ba'i bar du thams cad kyang mi rtag pa lags pas rgyu mi rtag pa lags na mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa'ang mi rtag pa lags pa'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-14: rtag tu rgyu'i dbang gis lhar skyes la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-15: rgyu'i dbang gis sems can dmyal bar ltung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-16: rgyu las rnam par grol lo zhes gsungs pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-17: de bas na chos thams cad ni rgyu las skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-18: gal te rgyu'i dbang gis rnam par grol bar gyur na rtag ces bgyir rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429a-19: goo ta mas gzugs ni rkyen las skyes pas mi rtag go zhes gsungs la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-0: @429b rnam par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-1: de ltar rnam par grol ba de gal te gzugs lags na ni mi rtag pa lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-5: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhi du mi rtag pa lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-6: gal te phung po lnga'i pha rol na rnam par grol ba zhig mchis na rnam par grol ba de ni nam mkha' lags par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-7: gal te nam mkha' lags na rgyu dang rkyen las skyes zhes bgyir yang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-9: rtag pa dang gcig ces bgyi ba gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-11: gzhan yang rgyu las skyes pa ni sdug bsngal yin no zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-12: gal te sdug bsngal lags na ci'i slad du rnam par grol ba ni bde ba'o zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-13: goo ta mas gzhan yang mi rtag pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-14: sdug bsngal ba ni bdag med pa'o zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-15: gal te mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-16: bdag med pa lags na ni yongs su ma dag pa lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-17: rgyu las skyes pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-20: yongs su ma dag pa lags na ci'i slad du mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-23: yongs su dag pa lags so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:429b-24: goo ta mas gal te rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-0: sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba'ang @430a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-2: bdag dang bdag ma mchis pa'ang lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-3: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa zhes kyang gsungs par gyur na gnyis su gsung bar mi 'gyur ram /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-4: bdag gis sngon rgan rabs mkhas pa blo can dag las gtam du thos na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-5: gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-6: rnam pa gnyis su gsung mi srid do zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-7: da ni goo ta mas rnam pa gnyis su gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-8: gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba nga yin no zhes gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-10: khyod kyis smras pa ltar nga'ang khyod la dri ba dris na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-11: de dang de'i lan yang smra bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-12: bram zes legs so goo ta ma /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-15: khyod kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba de rtag pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-18: bdag gi rang bzhin zhes bgyi ba ni rtag pa lags so; ;bram ze /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-19: rang bzhin des phi nang gi chos thams cad kyi rgyur 'gyur ram /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-27: rang bzhin las chen po skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-28: chen po las nga rgyal skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430a-29: nga rgyal las chos bcu drug po skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-2: shes pa'i dbang po lnga ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-8: lus kyi dbang po lnga ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-13: pho dang mo'i dbang po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-15: chos rnam pa bcu drug po 'di ni gzugs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-19: reg bya'i chos lnga po las skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-20: chos nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di'i rtsa ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-24: zhen pa zhes bgyi ba ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-26: rdul zhes bgyi ba ni zhe sdang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-27: nag po zhes bgyi ba ni ma rig pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-29: chos nyi shu lnga po ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin las skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-31: bram ze chen po la sogs pa'i chos 'di dag rtag pa yin nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-35: bdag gi chos kyi rang bzhin ni rtag pa lags kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-36: chen po la sogs pa'i chos ni thams cad mi rtag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-37: bram ze khyod smra ba lta na khyod kyi chos ni rgyu ni rtag la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-39: nga'i chos ni rgyu ni mi rtag mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-40: 'bras bu ni rtag na de la skyon ci zhig yod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-41: bram ze khyod kyi chos la rgyu rnam pa gnyis yod dam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:430b-44: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-5: skye ba'i rgyu zhes bgyi ba ni 'jim pa las rdza ma 'byung ba lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-6: gsal ba'i rgyu zhes bgyi ba ni me mar gyis snang bar byed pa lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-8: rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin ni gcig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-9: gal te gcig yin na; skye ba'i rgyu'ang gsal ba'i rgyur 'gyur la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-10: gsal ba'i rgyu'ang skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ram /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-14: gal te skye ba'i rgyu gsal ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-15: gsal ba'i rgyu'ang skye ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur na lta /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-16: gcig gi rgyur gcig 'gyur zhes byar rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-18: gcig gi rgyur gcig mi 'gyur mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-19: gcig la gcig rgyur 'gyur ba ni mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-21: gsal ba'i rgyus gsal bar byed pa de gsal ba dang mthun pa yin nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-25: nga'i chos kyang mi rtag pa las mya ngan las 'da' ba thob mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-26: mi rtag pa ni ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-28: gsal ba'i rgyu las thob pas na rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-31: yongs su dag pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431a-32: skye ba'i rgyu las thob pas na mi rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-1: yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-2: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'ang rnam pa gnyis yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-3: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su gsung yang rnam pa gnyis su med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-4: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa gnyis su gsung ba med pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-5: khyod smra ba ltar sngon rgan bas mkhas pa las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-6: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa ni gnyis su med par gsung ngo zhes thos pa shin tu legs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-7: da ltar phyogs bcu na dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsung pa la tha dad pa med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-8: de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni gnyis su med par gsung ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-9: ji ltar na tha dad pa med pa zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-10: gang yod par smra ba de la yod par yang gsungs ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-11: gang med par smra ba la med par yang gsung bar don gcig pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rnam pa gnyis su gsungs pas gcig tu gsungs pa'i tshig gsal bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-14: ji ltar na gnyis su gsungs pas gcig tu gsungs pa gsal bar byed pa zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-16: mig dang gzugs zhes tshig gnyis las rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gcig byung ba nas yid dang chos kyi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:431b-19: smra ba'i tshig gi don legs par gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-0: @432a *// bdag cag ni gnyis su gsungs pa las gcig tu gsung ba gsal bar mdzad pa ma rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gsung ba brjod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-3: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ni gnyis kyang yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-5: de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa'i bar du gnyis kyang gnyis la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-11: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar rtogs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-14: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa zhes bgyi ba byis pa ma rabs thams cad la gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-16: de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa'i bar du rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-18: khyod kyis legs par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-21: bdag gis chos thos nas yang dag pa'i lta ba thob par gyur pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-24: dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-25: thugs rje chen pos bdag cag rab tu dbyung bar gsol lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432a-27: khyod kyis bshad de zhu na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-0: skra dang kha spu bregs la @432b khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung zhig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-1: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+yas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du skra dang kha spu 'dreg pa na rnam pa gnyis ltung bar gyur to; ;gang zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-5: gnas de nyid du dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-6: de'i tshe gzhan yang kun tu rgyu ba si ta zhes bgyi bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-7: goo ta mas gsungs pa'i mya ngan 'da' ba de ji rtag gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-9: kun tu rgyu ba si tas gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-11: ji nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa la mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bgyi'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-13: kun tu rgyu ba si tas gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-15: 'jig rten na ma mchis pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-17: ma byung ba la ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-19: 'jim pa las ma bgyis pa'i snga rol na rdza ma ma mchis pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-20: 'gags te ma mchis pa la'ang ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-22: rdza ma zhig nas ma mchis pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-23: gcig la gcig ma mchis pas ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-25: ba lang la rta ma mchis la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-26: rta la ba lang ma mchis pa lta bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-27: gtan ma mchis pa la mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:432b-30: ri bong gi rva lta bu'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-0: ji ste nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas mya ngan las 'das pa @433a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-2: mya ngan las 'da' ba ni ma mchis pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-3: ji ste ma mchis pa lags na ci'i slad du rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-6: yongs su dag pa mchis par gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-9: 'di ltar mya ngan las 'da' ba ni snga nas med pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-10: 'jim pa'i tshe rdza ma med pa lta bu ma yin 'gags te med pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-11: rdza ma zhig nas med pa lta bu'ang ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-14: ri bong gi rva lta bu'ang ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-15: gcig la gcig med pa dang ni mthun no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-16: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar ba lang la rta med mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-17: ba lang yang med ces byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-18: rta la ba lang med mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-19: rta'ang med ces byar mi rung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-20: mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-21: nyon mongs pa la mya ngan las 'da' ba med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-22: mya ngan las 'da' ba la nyon mongs pa med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-23: de bas na gcig la gcig med pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-24: ba si tas yang gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-26: gal te gcig la gcig ma mchis pa la mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bgyi na ni gcig la gcig ma mchis pa la ni rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-29: yongs su dag pa ma mchis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433a-30: goo ta mas ci'i slad du mya ngan las 'da' ba la rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-0: yongs su dag @433b pa mchis zhes gsung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-2: khyod smra ba ltar gcig la gcig med pa ni med pa rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-4: rta ni snga na med la phyis yod pas na sngon med pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-5: yod nas kyang med par 'gyur bas na zhig pas med pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-6: gcig la gcig med pa mi khyod smra ba bzhin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-8: med pa rnam pa gsum po ni mya ngan las 'das par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-9: de bas na mya ngan las 'da' ba ni rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-14: 'jig rten gyi nad ni gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-18: nad rnam pa gsum la'ang sman rnam pa gsum gyis 'tsho ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-19: mkhris pa'i nad la ni mar gyis 'tsho'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-20: rlung la ni 'bru mar phan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-21: bad kan la ni sbrang rtsi phan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-22: de ltar sman rnam pa gsum yang nad rnam pa gsum la phan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-24: rlung gi nang na 'bru mar med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-25: 'bru mar gyi nang na rlung med pa nas sbrang rtsi'i nang na bad kan med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-26: bad kan gyi nang na sbrang rtsi med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-28: sems can thams cad la'ang nad rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-33: de ltar nad rnam pa gsum po la'ang sman rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:433b-34: 'dod chags kyi nad la ni mi sdug pa yang dag par bsgom par bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-0: @434a *// zhe sdang gi nad la ni byams pa yang dag par bsgom par bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-1: gti mug gi nad la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yang dag par bsgom par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-3: 'dod chags bsal ba'i phyir 'dod chags ma yin pa yang dag par bsgom par bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-4: zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir zhe sdang ma yin pa yang dag par bsgom par bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-5: gti mug bsal ba'i phyir gti mug ma yin pa yang dag par bsgom par bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-6: nad rnam pa gsum gyi nang na sman rnam pa gsum med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-7: sman rnam pa gsum gyi nang na yang nad rnam pa gsum med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-9: nad rnam pa gsum gyi nang na sman rnam pa gsum med pas mi rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-12: yongs su dag pa med pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-13: sman rnam pa gsum gyi nang na nad rnam pa gsum med pas na rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-16: yongs su dag pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-19: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-20: mi rtag pa bstan du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-21: de la rtag pa ni gang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-22: mi rtag pa ni gang; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-24: gzugs ni mi rtag pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434a-25: rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-0: rnam par grol ba'i gzugs ni rtag pa @434b nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-1: rnam par grol ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rtag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-3: de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag par yang dag par bsgoms na des ni rtag pa'i chos thob par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-7: mi rtag pa'i chos ni bdag gis rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-9: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i chos ji lta bur rtogs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-12: bdag gis ni bdag gi gzugs mi rtag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-13: rnam par grol ba na rtag par rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-15: rigs kyi bu khyod ni lus 'di'i drin legs par glan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-17: ba si ta 'di dgra bcom pa thob kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-18: khyod kyis chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed byin cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-19: tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du chos gos dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-21: de nas ba si tas chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs nas kun shes koondi n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:434b-22: bdag ni lus ngan pa 'dis dge ba'i 'bras bu thob kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-0: tshegs la mi gzigs par bdag gi slad du @435a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du gshegs te 'di skad ces gsungs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-2: bdag lta bu sdig pa can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rus smos shing nga ma khyod smras pa mthol tshangs su gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-3: gdug pa can gyi lus 'di dang ring du gnas par mi 'tshal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-4: mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa koonda n+yi sangs rgyas gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-7: dge slong ba si ta shin tu ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pa'i sems skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-8: bdag ni shin tu glen pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung smos na nga ma khyod smras pa nongs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-10: sbrul gdug pa dang 'dra ba'i lus 'di dang ring du 'grogs par mi 'tshal te mya ngan las 'da'o zhes mchi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-12: dge slong ba si ta ni sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas da 'dir bstan pa'i lung bzhin du gnas par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-13: de ltar lung bzhin du gnas pas yang dag pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-14: de bas na khyod kyis de'i lus la mchod pa gyis shig ///
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-15: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435a-16: bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-0: @435b de nas koondi n+yas bcom ldan 'das las de skad ces thos nas phyir de'i lus gang na bar song ste mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-1: de'i tshe ba si tas lus bsregs pa na rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-2: mu stegs can gyi rnams de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas skad chen pos 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-3: ba si ta ni dge sbyong goo ta ma'i sngags dang sgyu rtsal thob kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-4: ring por mi thogs par dge sbyong goo ta ma bas lhag par nges so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-5: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na kun tu rgyu sa ni zhes bya bas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-6: goo ta ma; bdag ces bgyi ba mchis sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas cang mi gsung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-9: 'o na ma mchis pa lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ngo; ;de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du zhus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-13: gal te sems can thams cad la bdag ces bgyi ba mchis te thams cad la khyab la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-14: gcig gam byas pa lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-16: ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ni la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:435b-18: khyod smra ba'i bdag ces bya ba thams cad la khyab pa yin nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-0: bdag 'ba' zhig de skad du smra ba ma lags @436a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-1: kyi; mkhas pa shes rab can thams cad kyang de skad du smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-4: ji ste bdag ces bya ba de thams cad du khyab pa zhig yin na ni rgyud lngar skye ba dag kyang dus gcig tu rnam par smin pa myong ba'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-5: ji ste rgyud lngar skyes pa dus gcig tu rnam par smin pa myong ba zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-6: kun tu rgyu khyod la sogs pa ci'i phyir sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mi byed par sems can dmyal ba las bzlog pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos byed cing lhar skye ba'i lus myong bar 'dod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-9: bdag gi chos la bdag ces bgyi ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-10: byas pa'i lus kyi bdag dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-11: rtag pa'i lus kyi bdag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-12: de la byas pa'i lus kyi bdag gi phyir sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-13: sems can dmyal bar mi mchi ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-14: dge ba'i chos la nan tan bgyid pas mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba 'tshal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-16: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba'i bdag ces bya ba de thams cad du khyab la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-17: bdag ces bya ba de byas pa'i lus la yod na ni de mi rtag pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436a-18: gal te byas pa'i lus la med na thams cad la khyab ces byar rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-0: bdag gis @436b rnam par bzhag pa'i bdag ces bgyi ba de byas pa'i nang na'ang mchis la rtag ces kyang bgyi ba lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-2: khang pa la me shor na khang pa 'tshig kyang khyim bdag ni phyir byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-3: khang khyim 'tshig pa'i phyir khyim bdag 'tshig go zhes bgyir mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-4: bdag gi chos kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-5: byas pa'i lus 'di mi rtag pa lags mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-6: mi rtag pa'i dus na bdag ces bgyi ba phyir 'byung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-7: de bas na bdag gi bdag ces bgyi ba ni khyab pa'ang lags la rtag pa'ang lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-9: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar bdag ces bya ba khyab pa'ang yin la rtag pa'ang yin zhes bya ba de mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-11: khyab pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-13: mi rtag pa'o; ;gzhan yang rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-16: de bas na ji ste khyod smra ba ltar thams cad la yod pa zhig yin na ni rtag pa'ang yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-20: khyod smra ba ltar khang pa 'tshig kyang khyim bdag phyir byung bas mi rtag pa'ang yin no zhes bya ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-22: khang pa'ang khyim bdag ma yin la khyim bdag kyang khang pa ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:436b-23: 'tshig pa'ang gzhan la byung ba'ang gzhan pas na bdag ces bya ba ni de ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-5: gzugs med pa ni bdag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-6: bdag ni gzugs med pa yin ni ci'i phyir gzugs mi rtag pa'i dus na bdag phyir 'byung ngo zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-8: ci khyod kyi yid la gal te sems can thams cad la bdag ces bya ba de gcig ste mthun par sems na de ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i chos gnyis ka dang 'gal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-10: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi pha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-13: bu mo zhes bya ba yod do; ;ji ste bdag ces bya ba gcig yin na pha'ang bu yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-19: pha rol yang tshu rol yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-20: tshul rol yang pha rol yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-21: de bas na sems can thams cad kyi bdag ces bya ba gcig ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-22: mthun no zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gnyis ka dang 'gal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-24: sems can thams cad la bdag ces bgyi ba gcig ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-25: mthun no zhes bdag mi smra'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-26: so so'i mi re re la bdag re re yod do zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437a-28: gal te mi re re la bdag re re yod ces smra na bdag ces bya ba mang por 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-2: khyod sngar smra ba ltar bdag ces bya ba thams cad la khyab bo zhes bya ba de gal te thams cad la khyab pa zhig yin na ni sems can thams cad kyi las kyi 'bras bu'ang mthun pa'i rigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-3: lhas byin mthong ba'i dus na sangs rgyas sbyin yang mthong la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-4: lhas byin byas pa'i dus na sangs rgyas sbyin yang byas pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-5: lhas byin thos pa'i dus na sangs rgyas sbyin yang thos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-6: chos thams cad kyang de lta bur 'gyur bas lhas byin gyis mthong ba'i dus na sangs rgyas sbyin gyis mthong ba ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-7: de bas na bdag ces bya ba de thams cad la khyab bo zhes smra ba'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-8: ji ste ma khyab na de ni mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-11: bdag ces bgyi ba ni sems can thams cad la khyab pa lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-12: chos dang chos ma lags pa ni thams cad la khyab pa ma lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-13: de bas na sangs rgyas sbyin gyis byas pa'ang gzhan la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-14: lhas byin gyis byas pa'ang gzhan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-17: sangs rgyas sbyin gyis mthong ba'i dus na lhas byin gyis kyang mthong ba'i rigs so zhe'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-18: sangs rgyas sbyin gyis thos pa'i dus na lhas byin gyis kyang thos pa'i rigs so zhes gsung pa'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:437b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-0: chos dang chos ma yin pa las kyis byas pa @438a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-4: las kyis bgyis ba lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-7: gal te chos dang chos ma yin pa las kyis byas pa yin na lta de nyid mthun pa'i chos yin na de la tha dad ces byar rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-9: sangs rgyas sbyin gyis byas pa'i las kyi nang na lhas byin gyi bdag ces bya ba yod pa'i rigs la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-10: lhas byin gyis byas pa'i las kyi nang na'ang sangs rgyas sbyin gyi bdag ces bya ba'ang yod pa'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-11: de bas na sangs rgyas sbyin gyis byas pa'i dus na lhas byin gyis kyang byas par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-12: chos dang chos ma yin pa'ang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-14: de ltar sems can thams cad kyi chos dang chos ma yin pa de lta bu zhig yin na ni las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang tha dad pa'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-17: sa bon ni nam du'ang bdag ni bram zer 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu 'ba' zhig bya'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-20: dmangs rigs kyi 'bras bu mi 'dod do snyam bye brag mi 'byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438a-22: sa bon las 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni rigs bzhi po'i bar du gcod par mi 'gyur la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-0: chos dang @438b chos ma yin pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-1: bdag ces bya ba de sangs rgyas sbyin gyis byas pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur bar ni bya'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-2: lhas byin gyis byas pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur bar mi bya'o zhe'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-3: lhas byin gyi 'bras bur 'gyur bar bya'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-4: sangs rgyas sbyin gyis 'bras bur 'gyur bar mi bya'i snyam bye brag mi 'byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-10: khang pa gcig gi nang du me mar kha brgya stong bus na me mar snying po tha dad mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-11: snang ba la khyad par ma mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-12: me mar gyi snying po tha dad pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa'i dpe'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-13: snang bar bgyid pa la khyad par ma mchis pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag ces bgyi ba'i dpe'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-15: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar me mar gyi snang ba bdag ces bya ba'i dpe yin no zhes bya ba de mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-17: khang pa'ang gzhan la me mar yang gzhan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-18: me mar gyi snang ba me mar gyi snying po la'ang yod la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-19: khang pa la'ang yod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-20: khyod smra ba ltar bdag ces bya ba de de lta bu zhig yin na ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis ka la'ang bdag ces bya ba yod pa'i rigs la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:438b-21: bdag ces bya ba'i nang na'ang chos dang chos ma yin pa yod pa'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-0: ji ste chos dang chos ma @439a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-1: yin pa la bdag ces bya ba med na ni thams cad la khyab ces bya ba'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-2: ji ste gnyis ka la yod pa zhig yin na ni me mar gyi snying po dang snang ba gnyis ka dper byar rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-4: ji khyod kyi yid la me mar gyi snying po dang snang ba yang dag par so so bar sems na ci'i phyir me mar gyi snying po bzang po'i dus na snang ba'ang gsal la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-5: me mar gyi snying po zad pa'i dus na snang ba med par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-6: de bas na chos dang chos ma yin pa'i dpe me mar gyi snying po las blangs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-7: bdag ces bya ba'i dpe snang ba la khyad par med pa la blangs pa mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-11: bdag ces bya ba dngos po gsum gcig tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-13: goo ta ma khyod kyis me mar las dpe blangs pa de bkra shis pa ma lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-14: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-15: me mar las dpe blangs pa bkra shis pa lags na bdag gis sngar gsol ba lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-16: bkra shis min na ci'i slad du'ang de skad gsung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-19: ngas dpar brjod pa ni bkra shis pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439a-20: bkra shis pa ma yin no zhes mi gsung gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-0: khyod kyi yid dang sbyar te me mar gyi snying po'i pha rol na snang ba @439b yod dam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-1: snying po nyid snang ba yin zhes dper brjod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-2: khyod sems ma snyoms pas chos dang chos ma yin pa'i dpe mar me'i snying po las blangs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-3: bdag ces bya ba'i dpe snang ba las blangs pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-4: de'i phyir snying po las snang ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-5: snying po'i pha rol na snang ba yod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-6: chos la bdag yod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-7: bdag la chos yod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-8: chos ma yin pa bdag ces pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-9: bdag kyang chos ma yin zhes smra bas khyod kyi mtha' gcig ni 'dod la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-10: mtha' gcig ni mi 'dod pa mi rung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-11: de bas na dpe de ni khyod la bkra shis pa ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-12: de bas na ngas khyod la phyir bstan pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-14: dpe de ni dper mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-15: dper mi rung bas na nga la ni bkra shis pa yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-16: khyod la ni bkra rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-18: 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba dag shis pas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-19: khyod la'ang bkra mi shis so snyam sems pa mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-21: 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba dag bdag gi mtshon cha bdag la gnod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-22: bdag gis byas pa pha rol pos spyod pa yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-23: khyed dpe smra ba'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-24: nga la ni bkra shis pa yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-25: khyod la ni bkra shis pa ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-27: goo ta mas sngar bdag la khyod ni ma snyoms so zhes gsungs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-28: da ni khyod gsung ba'ang ma snyoms so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:439b-29: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-1: bkra shis pa ni bdag gir mdzad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-2: bkra mi shis pa ni kho bo la bdar bas gzhung des na yang dag par ma snyoms so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-5: nga'i ma snyoms pas khyod kyi ma snyoms pa bcom ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-6: khyod ni snyoms kyi nga ni ma snyoms pas bkra shis pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-7: nga'i ma snyoms pas khyod kyi ma snyoms pa bcom nas khyod snyoms par gyur pa de nyid nga'ang snyoms pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-9: 'phags pa rnams dang mthun par snyoms pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-12: bdag ni rtag tu snyoms na ci'i slad du khyod kyis ma snyoms pa bcom mo zhes gsung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-13: sems can thams cad la bdag ces bgyi ba snyoms par mchis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-14: ci'i slad du bdag la ma snyoms so zhes gsung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-15: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sems can dmyal bar ltung ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-17: byol song gi skye gnas su ltung ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-18: mi dang lhar 'gyur ro zhes smra; ji ste bdag ces bya ba rgyud lnga khyab pa zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-19: ci'i phyir rgyud lnga myong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-20: khyod kyang pha ma gnyis dang phrad pa las bur 'gyur ro zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-21: ci ste bu snga nas yod pa zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-22: ci'i phyir 'dus shing phrad pa las bur 'gyur ro zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440a-23: de bas na mi gcig pu la rgyud lnga char gyi lus yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-0: ji ste rgyud lngar @440b snga nas lus yod pa zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-1: ci'i phyir lus kyi phyir las byed dgos par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-2: de bas na ma snyoms na yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-3: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la bdag ces bya ba byed pa po yin no zhes bya ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-5: ji ste bdag ces bya ba byed pa po yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-6: ci'i phyir sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba bdag gis byed cing so so'i skye bo dag yang dag par sdug bsngal myong bar byed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-7: de bas na bdag ces bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-8: ji ste sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-9: rgyu las ma skyes so zhes smra na chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-10: rgyu las ma skyes pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-11: ci'i phyir bdag la byed pa po yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-13: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal dang bde ba ni yang dag par rgyu dang rkyen las gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-14: de ltar sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba ni mya ngan dang dga' ba byed par gyur pas mya ngan gyi dus na dga' ba med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-15: dga' ba'i dus na mya ngan med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-17: bar 'ga' ni mya ngan byed pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-18: mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ci'i phyir rtag pa yin zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-19: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba'i bdag ces bya ba rtag pa yin no zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-20: ci ste rtag pa zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:440b-21: ci'i phyir dus rnam pa bcur mi 'dra zhing tha dad par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-0: rtag pa'i chos ni thog ma nur nur po'i dus @441a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-1: nas rgas pa'i dus kyi bar du yod pa'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-2: nam mkha' ni rtag pa'i chos yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-3: de la dus gcig kyang med na dus bcu yod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-5: bdag ces bya ba ni nur nur po'i dus ma yin pa nas rgas pa'i dus kyi bar du ma yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-6: ci'i phyir dus rnam pa bcur mi mthun te; tha dad pa yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-8: ji ste bdag ces bya ba byed pa po yin na ni bdag ces bya ba la dar ba'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-10: sems can la'ang dar ba'i dus dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-12: ji ste bdag ces bya ba de de lta bu zhig yin na ci'i phyir rtag ces bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-14: bdag ces bya ba byed pa po yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-15: ci'i phyir mir 'dra ba la dbang po rnon po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-16: dbang po rtul po yod par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-18: ji ste bdag ces bya ba byed pa po yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-19: bdag ces bya bas lus kyi las dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-20: ngag gi las kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-21: ji ste ngag gi las kyang bdag ces bya bas byas pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-22: ci'i phyir ngag gis bdag med do zhes smra zhing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-23: ci'i phyir yod dam med ces the tshom du gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441a-24: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la mig gi pha rol na mthong ba yod do snyam smra na'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-0: gal te @441b mig gi pha rol na mthong ba gzhan zhig yod na mig 'di'ang dgos pa med par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-1: lus kyi dbang po'i bar du dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-2: ci khyod kyi yid la bdag ces bya bas mthong ba'ang mig gi rkyen gyis mthong ngo zhes bya ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-5: mi zhig me tog su ma nas grong khyer chen po 'tshig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-7: me'i rkyen gyis 'tshig go zhes smra ba ltar /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-8: khyod kyi bdag ces bya bas mthong ngo zhes smra ba'ang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-12: zor ba thogs te rtsva rnga ba dang 'dra ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-13: bdag kyang dbang po lnga'i rkyen gyis mthong ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-17: zor ba dang mi so so bas de ci'i phyir zor ba thogs nas byed pa yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-18: dbang po'i pha rol na bdag ces bya ba gzhan med na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-19: ci'i phyir bdag ces bya ba dbang po'i rkyen gyis bya ba yod do zhes smra; rigs kyi bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-20: ci khyod kyi yid la zor ba thogs nas brnga bar 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-21: bdag ces bya ba'ang de dang 'dra'o zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-22: bdag ces bya ba la lag pa yod dam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-23: 'on te lag pa med pa yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-24: ji ste lag pa yod na ci'i phyir bdag gis zor ba mi thogs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:441b-25: ji ste lag pa med na ci'i phyir bdag ces bya ba byed pa po yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-1: rtsva rnga ba ni zor ba yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-4: ji ste bdag dang mi ma yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-5: zor ba'ang mi dgos par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-7: mi la las rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-10: zor ba thogs pa ni gcod pa'i las 'ba' zhig byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-11: sems can gyis chos mthong ba'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-12: mig gis gzugs mthong ba'ang 'dus shing tshogs pa las 'byung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-13: ji ste rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las mthong na mkhas pa shes rab can gyis bdag yod ces ci'i phyir smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-15: ci khyod kyi yid la lus kyis byas nas bdag ces bya bas myong bar 'gyur ro snyam sems na de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-17: 'jig rten na lhas byin gyis las byas pa la sangs rgyas sbyin gyis rnam par smin pa myong bar ma mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-18: ji ste lus kyis byas pa ma yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-19: bdag ces bya ba rkyen gyis dbang gis myong ba ma yin no zhes smra na khyod la sogs pa ci'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen las rnam par grol ba 'tshol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-20: khyod kyi lus snga nas yod la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-21: rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ma yin na rnam par grol nas kyang rgyu dang rkyen mi dgos par lus kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442a-22: lus ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-2: bdag ces bgyi ba la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-3: shes pa dang bcas pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-5: shes pa med pa'i bdag gis ni lus thob par bgyid do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-6: shes pa dang bcas pa'i bdag gis ni lus spong bar bgyid do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-8: rdza ma so ma btang ba bsregs na kha dog rnying pa ma mchis par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-9: de slar skye mi srid do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-10: mkhas pa shes rab can gyi nyon mongs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste ma mchis par bgyis pa'i 'og tu nam du'ang slar skye mi srid do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-13: shes pa zhes bya ba ye shes kyis shes sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-15: ji ste ye shes kyis shes pa zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-16: ci'i phyir bdag gis shes so zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-17: ji ste bdag gis shes pa zhig yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-18: ci'i phyir thabs mkhas pas ye shes 'tshol dgos par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-19: ci khyod kyi yid la bdag ces bya bas ye shes kyi dbang gis shes so zhes smra na'ang me tog gi dpe mi rung ba dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-22: shing tsher ma can yang rang bzhin gyis 'dzugs pa yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-23: shing gi tsher ma thogs te 'dzugs so zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-24: ye shes kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-25: ye shes nyid kyis shes pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:442b-26: ci'i phyir bdag gis ye shes thogs te shes par byed do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-1: bu khyod nyid kyi chos las bdag ces bya ba rnam par grel lo zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-2: shes pa med pa'i bdag gis thob bam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-3: shes pa dang bcas pa'i bdag gis thob /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-4: ji ste shes pa med pas thob na da dung nyon mongs pa dang bcas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-5: ji ste shes pa dang bcas pas thob na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-6: da dung yang shes pa'i dbang po lnga dang bcas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-8: dbang po lnga las shes pa gzhan med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-9: ji ste dbang po rnams dang bcas na ci'i phyir rnam par grol ba zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-10: ji ste bdag ces bya ba de rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag la dbang po lnga dang bral lo zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-11: yang ci'i phyir lam rgyud lnga'ang khyab bo zhes smra zhing ci'i phyir rnam par grol ba 'dod pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la nan tan bya'o zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-14: mi zhig nam mkha' la tsher ma 'byin pa dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-15: bdag ces bya ba rnam par dag pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-16: ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad gcad par bya'o zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-17: ci khyod kyi yid la rgyu dang rkyen ma yin pa las rnam par grol lo zhe na'ang byol song thams cad kyang ci'i phyir rnam par ma grol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443a-20: gal te bdag ces bgyi ba ma mchis na dran par bgyid pa su lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-0: bcom ldan @443b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-1: ji ste bdag ces bya ba yod na ci'i phyir brjod pa yod par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-3: ji ste dran pa la bdag ces bya na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-4: ci'i phyir sdig pa dran zhing mi dran pa dran /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-7: gal te bdag ces bgyi ba ma mchis na mthong ba ni su /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-8: thos par bgyid pa ni su lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-11: nang gi dbang po drug dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-12: phyi rol gyi yul drug ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-13: phyi nang phrad pa las rnam par shes pa drug skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-14: rnam par shes pa drug po ni rten cing 'brel pa las ming du btags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-17: me gcig pu'ang shing gi dbang gis ming khyad thob ste shing gi me dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-18: rtsva'i dbang gis rtsva'i me dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-19: phub ma'i dbang gis phub ma'i me dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-20: lci ba'i dbang gis lci ba'i me zhes 'dogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-21: sems can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-25: 'dod pa'i dbang gis mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-27: de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa de ni mig gi nang na med pa nas 'dod pa'i bar du med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-28: rkyen bzhi phrad pa las rnam par shes pa skye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:443b-29: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-0: de ltar rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba 'dus pa las @444a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-2: mkhas pa shes rab can ni mthong ba dag la bdag ces mi smra ba nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-3: reg bya'i bar du bdag ces mi smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-5: de bas na ngas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-6: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-7: ji ltar sgyu ma dang 'dra zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-8: sngon med pa las da yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-9: yod nas kyang med par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-21: 'u su'i 'bras bu la sogs pa bsdus na la du zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-22: bsdus pa de dag ma gtogs par la du zhes bya ba gud na med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-23: phyi nang gi skye mched drug la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-28: phyi nang gi skye mched ma gtogs par logs shig na sems can dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-31: skyes bu zhes bya ba med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-34: bdag ces bgyi ba ma mchis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-40: bdag mya ngan byed ces brjod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444a-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-1: bdag gis thos pa la bdag ces bya na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-2: ci'i phyir 'jig rten na khyod kyis nyes pa bya bas bdag gis ma mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-5: dper na tshogs bzhi 'dus na dmag ces bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-6: de ltar tshogs pa bzhi po'ang gcig ces byar mi rung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-8: nga'i dmag pha rol po bas rgyal lo zhes brjod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-9: phyi nang gi skye mched 'dus nas byed pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-10: gcig ma yin mod kyi bdag gis byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-17: goo ta ma khyod gsung ba ltar phyi nang 'dus so zhes bgyi ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-19: bdag gis myong ngo zhes brjod cing smra ba su lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-21: sred pa dang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis las skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-22: las las srid pa skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-23: srid pa las tshad med pa'i sems las byung ba skyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-24: sems kyis rnam par rtog pa bskyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-25: rnam par rtog pas rlung bskyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:444b-26: rlung sems la reg nas rkan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-0: sems can gyi 'du shes phyin ci log las sgra byung bas bdag @445a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-4: bdag gis thos so zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-7: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la dril bu btags na rlung gi dbang gis sgra 'byung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-9: rlung chung na sgra'ang chung ste byed pa ni med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-13: lcags bsregs pa chu'i nang du bcug na sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-14: de la yang dag par na byed pa zhes bya ba med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-16: bus pa ma rabs kyis ni dngos po 'di lta bu dag rnam par rtog kyang bye brag mi phyed pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-20: bdag gis myong ngo zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-23: bdag dang bdag gi ba mchis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-24: ci'i slad du rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-27: yongs su dag pa ma mchis so zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-29: ngas ni phyi nang gi skye mched drug dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-30: rnam par shes pa drug la rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-33: yongs su dag pa'o zhes ma gsungs kyi; ngas ni phyi nang gi skye mched drug dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-34: rnam par shes pa drug 'gags pa la rtag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445a-35: de ltar rtag pas na bdag ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-0: rtag pa dang bdag yin @445b pa'i phyir bde ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-1: rtag pa dang bdag dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-3: so so'i skye bo dag ni sdug bsngal mi 'dod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-4: sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa yongs su bcad nas spong ba'i dbang du gyur pas bdag ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-5: de bas na ngas ni rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-8: yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-11: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag la bstan du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-12: bdag gis ji lta bgyis na rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-15: yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-18: 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad ni thog ma med pa nas nga rgyal chen po dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-19: nga rgyal chen po bskyed pa'i phyir nga rgyal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-20: nga rgyal gyis las su 'gyur ba byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-21: de bas na nga rgyal gyi 'bras bu mngon par smin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-22: nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su ma spangs pas rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-25: yongs su dag pa ma thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-26: gal te so so'i skye bo dag nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'dod na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-27: nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:445b-29: bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-2: bdag la nga rgyal mchis pas nga rgyal gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ma smros te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-4: zhes smras nas nga ma khyod kyang smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-5: da ni bdag gis nga rgyal chen po yongs su spangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-6: de bas na yang dag pa'i sems kyis chos 'tshal na ji ltar rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-9: yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-12: shin tu brtags par nyon la legs par yid la byos shig dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-13: khyod la rnam par bkrol te bshad par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-15: gal te bdag kyang ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-17: sems can yang ma yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-18: chos de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-22: yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig kyang thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-24: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur shes shing rtogs na yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig thob bo zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-27: gzugs zhes bgyi ba gzhan ma lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446a-29: sems can ma lags pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du de ltar rtogs pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-1: bdag ni rab tu 'byung zhing lam la nan tan byed par mos na gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-4: dge slong du gyur te de nyid du yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-5: de'i tshe mu stegs can de dag gi nang na kun tu rgyu 'od srung gi rigs can zhig 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-8: lus dang srog gnyis tha dad pa lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-10: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang cang mi gsung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-11: kun tu rgyus yang gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-13: mi zhig tshe 'phos nas lus phyi ma ma blangs pa'i bar du lus kyang tha dad la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-14: srog kyang tha dad ces mi bgyi'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-15: ji ste tha dad pa zhig lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-17: ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-20: ngas ni lus dang srog gnyis ka rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba las skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-21: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin pa las ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-22: lus dang srog ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:446b-23: kun tu rgyus yang gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-0: bdag gis ni 'jig rten na chos @447a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-1: kha cig rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma lags par mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-3: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi chos gang dag rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin par mthong /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-6: zhugs chen po shor ba na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-7: me lce rlung gis btab nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-8: gnas gzhan dag kyang 'tshig par 'gyur ba de rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma lags nga zhes bgyi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-11: ngas ni mi de'ang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba las skyes te /
