K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-12: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin pa las ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-15: me lce chad de 'tshig pa ni shing ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-16: mdag me las byung ba ma lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-17: ci'i slad du rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba lags zhes gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-20: shing dang mdag me ni med mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-21: 'on kyang rlung gi dbang gis me lce chad de //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-22: rlung gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis me lce med par ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-25: mi zhig tshe 'phos nas lus phyi ma ma blangs kyi bar du tshe len pa'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa gang lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-0: kun tu @447b rgyu ma rig pa dang sred pa ni de'i rgyu de'i rkyen du 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-1: ma rig pa dang sred pa gnyis kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis 'tsho ba gnas par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-3: rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir lus nyid srog yin la srog nyid kyang lus yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-4: rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyir lus kyang gzhan la srog kyang gzhan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-5: mkhas pa shes rab can ni phyogs gcig tu lus kyang tha dad la srog kyang tha dad do zhes mi smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-7: bcom ldan 'das bdag la rnam par grol zhing bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-8: rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par mdzad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-10: kun tu rgyu rgyu'ang phung po lnga yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-11: 'bras bu'ang phung po lnga yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-13: gal te sems can dag me ma bus na dud pa med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-16: bdag gis ni 'tshal to rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-18: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur shes shing rtogs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-21: zhugs zhes bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-24: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-25: lha dang mi'i gnas su shin tu 'bar ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:447b-26: dud pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu smin pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-1: btsog pas na dud pa zhes bgyi ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-2: sems can gang nyon mongs pa ma byas na de la nyon mongs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-3: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas me ma bus na dud pa med do zhes gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-5: bdag ni yang dag par lta ba lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-6: thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-8: kun tu rgyu 'di rab tu byung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-9: de nas kondi n+yas sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun la dad pa gsol nas rab tu phyung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-10: bsnyen par rdzogs nas zhag lnga lon pa dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-11: mu stegs can gyi 'khor gyi nang na gzhan yang kun tu rgyu pu na zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-12: goo ta ma khyod kyis 'jig rten na rtag pa'i chos gzigs pas rtag ces gsung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-13: de skad ces gsungs pa bden nam rdzun nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-15: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448a-17: mi rtag pa'ang ma yin pa lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-0: mtha' mchis sam mtha' ma mchis pa @448b lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-2: mtha' ma mchis kyang ma mchis pa lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-4: mtha' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-5: lus kyang lags srog kyang lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-6: lus dang srog tha dad pa lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'gro ba lta bu'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-8: 'gro ba lta bu ma lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-9: 'gro ba lta bu lags kyang lags la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-10: 'gro ba lta bu ma lags kyang ma lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-12: 'gro ba lta bu ma lags pa'ang ma lags sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-15: ngas ni 'jig rten na rtag pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-21: mi rtag pa'ang ma yin pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-27: mtha' med pa'ang ma yin pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-30: lus dang srog tha dad pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'gro ba lta bu'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-33: 'gro ba lta bu'ang yin la mi 'gro ba lta bu'ang yin pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:448b-35: 'gro ba lta bu ma yin pa'ang ma yin par ma gsungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-2: skyon ci zhig gzigs na de skad ces mi gsung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-4: de la gang zhig 'jig rten ni rtag ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-5: 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun no zhes smra na de ni lta ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-6: lta bas lta ba'i gnas ni 'du byed du lta bas lta ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-13: kun nas dkris par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-15: byis pa so so'i skye bo ni lta bas kun tu dkris pas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-19: 'chi ba dang ma bral te rgyud drug tu 'khor nas sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-20: 'gro ba lta bu ma yin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-21: mi 'gro ba lta bu ma yin pa'i bar du de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-23: lta ba de la de lta bu'i skyon yod par mthong bas de bas na ma chags te gzhan la'ang mi ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-26: de lta bu'i skyon gzigs te ma chags mi ston na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-32: chags par lta ba ni 'khor ba'i chos zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'khor ba'i chos dang bral bas ma chags pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mthong ba dang ston pa zhes @449b bya'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-12: de bas na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par phye ste ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-13: ngas de lta bu dag gzigs pas lta ba thams cad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-16: nga rgyal thams cad yongs su spangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-17: de bas na bdag ni yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing bla na med pa'i rab tu zhi bas rtag pa'i sku thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-18: rtag pa'i sku 'di ni shar phyogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-23: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis rtag pa'i sku shar phyogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-29: ngas khyod la ci dang ci dris pa de dang de'i lan yid bzhin du smros shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-31: 'di khyod kyis yid la ji snyam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-32: khyod kyi mdun du me chen po zhig bus na me 'bar ba'i tshe khyod kyang 'bar bas shes mod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:449b-34: me shi ba'i tshe khyod kyang shi bar shes mod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-1: zhig gis khyod la me'i phung po 'di 'bar ba gang nas 'ongs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-2: shi ba na gar song zhes 'dri na de la khyod ji skad ces bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-5: gal te de skad ces 'dri ba zhig mchis na de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-6: me 'bar ba ni rkyen mang po la ltos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-8: rkyen gsar gyis ma bsnan pas na me zad pa zhes bgyi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-9: gal te gzhan yang me shi nas gang phyogs su song zhes 'dri na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-10: de la ji skad ces bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-13: de la bdag gis rkyen zad nas me shi'ang phyogs su song ba ma mchis so zhes bgyi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-16: gal te mi rtag pa'i gzugs yod pa nas mi rtag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du yod na sred pa'i rkyen gyis 'bar ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-17: 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni srid pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po myong ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-18: de bas na 'bar ba'i dus na me 'di ni shar phyogs sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-21: byang phyogs zhes brjod du rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-22: da ltar gyi sred pa 'gags te srid pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu me 'bar na de la ni shar phyogs sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450a-25: byang phyogs zhes brjod du med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @450b ni mi rtag pa'i gzugs med pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-1: mi rtag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-2: de bas na sku ni rtag pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-3: gal te sku rtag pa yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-6: byang phyogs zhes brjod du med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-8: bdag gis dpe zhig gsol bar 'tshal na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas gsan par ci gnang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-13: bsams pa bzhin du smros shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-16: grong khyer chen po zhig gi phyi rol na shing s'a la'i tshal gyi nang na shing gcig cig sngar skyes te lo brgya lon no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-17: de'i tshe na tshal gyi bdag po de dus dus su chu chu zhing las bgyid do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-18: shing de'i shun pa rul na shun pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-20: yal ga kun sa la ltung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-21: nang gi snying po 'ba' zhig lus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-23: ji tsam du rul par gyur pa thams cad zad nas yang dag pa'i chos 'ba' zhig lus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-25: bdag rab tu dbyung bar gsol lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:450b-28: de ma thag tu dge slong du gyur te zag pa zad nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-0: gzhan yang kun tu rgyu rnam par dag pa zhes bya @451a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-3: so so'i skye bo dag chos gang ma rtogs na 'jig rten rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-5: rtag pa'ang lags la mi rtag pa'ang lags pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-6: rtag pa'ang ma lags la mi rtag pa'ang ma lags pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-8: mi 'gro ba'ang ma lags pa'i bar du lta bar gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-12: rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi shes pas na 'jig rten rtag pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-14: mi 'gro ba lta bu'ang ma yin pa'i bar du lta bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-17: sems can gyis chos gang dag rtogs na 'jig rten rtag pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-19: mi 'gro ba lta bu'ang ma yin pa'i bar du mi lta bar 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-23: rnam par shes pa'i bar du shes na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-26: mi 'gro ba lta bu'ang ma yin pa'i bar du mi lta bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451a-29: 'jig rten rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bdag la rgyas par phye ste bshad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis @451b bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-2: gang zhig gis rnying pa ni spangs nas las gsar ma byas na gang zag des ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-7: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur mthong /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-11: rnying pa ni ma rig pa dang sred pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-12: gsar pa ni len pa dang srid pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-13: de la gang zhig gis ma rig pa dang sred pa yongs su spangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-14: len pa dang srid pa mi bgyid na gang zag de ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa yang dag par rtogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-15: bdag gis ni yang dag pa'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-16: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-17: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rab tu dbyung ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-19: kun tu rgyu 'di rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du dge 'dun la gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas nas rab tu phyung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-22: de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:451b-23: zag pa kun zad de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-0: gzhan yang kun tu rgyu be'u zhes bya bas 'di skad @452a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-3: bdag zhu ba zhu na ci gnang ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-9: bdag ni khyod dang mdza' bo yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-10: bdag cag gnyis kyi don yang gnyis su med na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-11: bdag gis dris pa ci'i phyir cang mi gsung bar bzhugs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs la 'di snyam du dgongs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-13: kun tu rgyu 'di rang bzhin gyis mnyen te des la shin tu drang bas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-14: nga dang bshes te dri ba 'dri ba'ang klan ka 'tshol ba'i phyir ma yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-15: ci dang ci dris pa de dang de'i lan gdab bo snyam du dgongs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;kye be'u /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-18: ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-19: de dang de'i lan gdab par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-22: 'jig rten na dge ba mchis sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-27: kun tu rgyu be'us gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-29: bdag cag la bstan cing bshad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-30: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bdag gis rtogs par mdzad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-0: ngas ni don de dag ston pa la @452b shin tu rgyas par mkhyen mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-1: da khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-3: 'dod pa ni mi dge ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-4: rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa ni dge ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-6: gti mug kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-7: srog gcod pa ni mi dge ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-8: srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa ni dge ba nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-9: ngan par lta ba'i bar du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-11: ngas ni khyod la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-13: mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'ang bstan cing bshad pa yin no; ;gal te nga'i nye gnas su gyur pa gang zhig dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa gsum nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-15: mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'i bar du bye brag phyed de nan tan du byed na gang zag des ni 'dod chags dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-17: gti mug med par 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-18: zag pa thams cad zad pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-19: srid pa thams cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:452b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-14: dge slong ma 'ga' tsam 'dod chags dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-18: srid pa thams cad zad pa mchis sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-21: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge slong ma gcig gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-30: srid pa thams cad zad pa'i dge slong ma ni grangs med do //
