K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-37: the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-38: the tshom gyi dra ba yongs su chod pa mchis sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-0: sangs rgyas kyi bstan @453b pa la de lta bu'i dge bsnyen gcig gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-5: tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dge nas kun nas nyon mongs pa tha ma lnga po bcad de lan gcig phyir mi ldog pa thob nas the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te the tshom gyi dra ba yongs su bcad pa'i dge bsnyen ni grangs med do; ;be'us gsol [?]/
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-10: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen ma 'ga' tsam tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-11: the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-12: the tshom gyi dra ba chod pa mchis sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-14: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen ma de lta bu gcig gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-19: tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:453b-20: kun nas nyon mongs pa tha ma lnga po chod nas lan gcig phyir mi ldog pa thob nas the tshom gyi pha rol tu phyin te the tshom gyi dra ba chod pa'i dge bsnyen ma ni grangs med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-0: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson zhing tshangs par @454a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-1: spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-2: the tshom gyi dra ba yongs su bcad pa'i dge slong pha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-5: dge bsnyen ma lta zhog la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen 'ga' tsam yang 'dod pa lnga la longs mi spyod cing the tshom gyi dra ba chod pa mchis sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-9: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dge bsnyen de lta bu ni gcig gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum bcad nas rgyun du zhugs pa thob nas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-15: lan gcig phyir ldog pa thob pa'i dge bsnyen yang grangs med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-16: dge bsnyen ji lta ba bzhin du dge bsnyen ma'ang rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-19: bdag dpe zhig gsol bar dad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-25: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo kun tu khyab par char chen po 'bebs pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi char yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454a-27: dge bsnyen ma la mnyam par phab bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-1: gal te mu stegs can dag rab tu byung bar gsol na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba du'i bar du brtag 'tshal /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-4: zla ba bzhi'i bar du brtag dgos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-5: gcig tu nges pa ni ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-7: gal te gcig tu ma nges na thugs rje chen pos bdag rab tu dbyung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-9: kun tu rgyu be'u 'di rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-10: de nas koondi n+yas sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun la gsol ba dang zhu ba'i las byas nas rab tu phyung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-11: de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to; ;'bras bu thob nas yang 'di snyam du sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-12: gang shes rab kyis slob pa'i sgo nas thob par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis de thob pas sangs rgyas mthong bar zad do snyam nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-13: bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag btsal te bsti stang byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;shes rab gang bslab pa las thob par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis thob lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:454b-15: bdag gis bslab pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba bstan du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-4: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brtson 'grus su nan tan bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-6: dge slong gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod na chos rnam pa gnyis po la brtson 'grus su nan tan bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-7: gang zhig gis lan gcig phyir ldog pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-8: lan gcig phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-9: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod na'ang chos rnam pa gnyis po la nan tan bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-11: dge slong gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-13: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-16: rtsod pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-18: mthar phyin pa'i ye shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-19: so sor yang dag par shes pa bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-20: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-22: mi skye ba'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa'ang chos gnyis la nan tan bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-24: gang zhig gis sa bcu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-25: ma skyes pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-26: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-27: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-31: byang chub sems dpas spyod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455a-32: nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-0: ye @455b shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-3: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-6: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-7: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-9: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa 'dod pa'ang chos rnam pa gnyis po la nan tan bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-10: be'us de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyir byung nas shing s'a la'i tshal du chos gnyis po la nan tan byas pas ring por ma thogs par dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-11: de'i tshe na dge slong grangs med pa zhig sangs rgyas gang na bar 'dong ba las be'us mthong nas btsun pa gar 'dong zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-12: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa; bdag cag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mchi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-15: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar gshegs na be'u'i mchid nas chos rnam pa gnyis la nan tan bgyis na bslab pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab thob ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin dran pa'i slad du mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsol cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-17: de'i tshe dge slong de rnams sangs rgyas gang na ba der phyin nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:455b-18: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-0: dge slong be'u yi mchid nas bdag ni bslab pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi @456a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-1: bka' drin gzo ba'i slad du mya ngan las 'da'o zhes mchi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-3: dge slong de'u dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-4: de'i lus la khyed mchod pa gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-5: de'i tshe dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du rus bu gang na ba der song nas mchod pa chen po byas so ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-6: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-7: bam po lnga bcu gsum pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-8: de'i tshe kun tu rgyu tshem bu can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-9: goo ta ma gsung ba ltar skye ba grangs med pa'i bar du dge ba dang mi dge ba bgyis pa'ang phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su'ang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus thob par 'gyur ro zhes bgyis pa de mi rung ngo; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-10: goo ta ma gsung ba ltar nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las lus thob par gyur to zhes bgyi ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-11: ji ste nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las lus thob par gyur na lus snga'am nyon mongs pa snga /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-12: ji ste nyon mongs pa snga na ci la gnas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-14: ci ste lus snga na nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las thob ces bgyir rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-15: de bas na nyon mongs pa snga zhes bgyir yang mi rung la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-16: lus snga zhes bgyir yang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-17: dus gcig go zhes bgyir yang mi rung //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456a-18: snga phyi dus gcig ces bgyir yang chos ma mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-0: @456b de bas na bdag ni chos thams cad rang bzhin du zad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-1: rgyu dang rkyen las ni ma yin no zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-2: gzhan yang goo ta ma sra ba ni sa'i rang bzhin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-3: gsher ba ni chu'i rang bzhin tsha ba ni me'i rang bzhin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-4: g-yo ba ni rlung gi rang bzhin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-5: thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-6: chen po lnga'i rang bzhin ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis yod pa ma lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-7: ci ste 'jig rten na chos gcig tsam gyi rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen gyis mchis pa ma lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-8: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-9: rgyu dang rkyen gyis mchis pa ma lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-10: ji ste chos gcig tsam yang rgyu dang rkyen gyis mchis pa lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-11: ci'i slad du chen po lnga'i rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-13: sems can gyis dge ba'i lus dang mi dge ba'i lus kyis rnam par grol ba thob pa'ang rang bzhin lags kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-14: rgyu dang rkyen las ni ma lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-15: de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yod kyi rgyu dang rkyen las ni ma yin par bdag smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-18: 'jig rten ni dgos pa'i gnas gcig tu chad pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-21: shing 'di ni shing rta dang khyogs su 'os so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-23: khri dang khri'ur rung ngo zhes smra ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:456b-25: gser mgar gyis brdungs su byas te dpral ba la btags pa ni phreng ba zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-2: dpung pa la btags pa ni dpung rgyan zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-3: sor mo la btags pa ni sor gdub ces bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-4: dgos pa'i gnas nges pas na rang bzhin nges pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-6: sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-7: rgyud lnga'i rang bzhin yod pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-12: ji ste de lta bu lags na rgyu dang rkyen las 'gyur zhes bgyir rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-14: gzhan yang sems can thams cad rang bzhin so so ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-15: de bas na thams cad rang bzhin zhes bgyi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-17: rus sbal thang las skyes kyang chur 'gro ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-18: be'u 'brangs ma thag tu nu ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-19: nya mchil ba mid pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-20: sprul gdug pa byung ma thag tu sa za ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-21: de dag la sogs pa sus bstan /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-23: tsher ma rang bzhin gyis rno ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-24: bya'i 'dab ma rang bzhin gyis kha dog tha dad pa ltar 'jig rten gyi sems can yang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-31: rnam par grol ba thob pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-32: srid pa tha ma thob par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-33: de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin so so bar rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-34: gzhan yang goo ta ma gsung ba ltar 'dod chags dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457a-36: gti mug ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-0: gdug pa @457b gsum gyi rgyu dang rkyen ni yul lnga yin no zhes bgyi ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-1: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-3: sems can gnyid log ba'i tshe yul lnga mngon du mi spyod kyang 'dod chags dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-5: gti mug skyes te mngal na 'dug pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-6: mngal nas byung ma thag pa'ang yul lnga'i bzang po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-7: ngan pa bye brag mi phyed kyang 'dod chags dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-10: drang srong 'phags pa'i rnams dgon par gnas pa'ang yul lnga mngon du mi spyod kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-14: kha cig ni yul drug gi dbang gis 'dod mi chags pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-16: gti mi mug pa'ang yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-17: de bas na rgyu dang rkyen las chos thams cad skye'o zhes nges pa med kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-20: gzhan yang 'jig rten na kha cig ni dbang po lnga dang mi ldan yang longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing dbang du 'gyur ba'ang yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-21: kha cig ni dbang po dang ldan yang ngan cing dbul la dbang med de gzhan gyi bran byed pa'ang yod na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-22: ji ste rgyu dang rkyen las gyur na ci'i slad du de ltar gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-23: de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin ni so so ste rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:457b-25: gzhan yang 'jig rten na bus pa shed ma bye ba'ang yul lnga bye brag mi phyed mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-2: du ba'i tshe ni mi dga' bar shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-3: de bas na chos thams cad so so'i rang bzhin yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-5: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi chos la rnam pa gnyis te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-9: med pa ni ri bong gi rva'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-10: de ltar chos gnyis po'ang yod pa'ang rgyu dang rkyen ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-11: med pa'ang rgyu dang rkyen ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-12: de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin du zad kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-13: rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-15: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar chen po lnga'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bar chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-17: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi chos la chen po lnga rtag pa yin na ci'i phyir chos thams cad rtag pa ma yin no zhes smras /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-18: ji ste 'jig rten gyi dngos po mi rtag pa zhig yin na chen po lnga'i rang bzhin ci'i phyir mi rtag pa ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-19: ji ste chen po lnga rtag pa zhig yin na 'jig rten gyi dngos po'ang rtag pa yin pa'i rigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-20: de bas na khyod kyis chen po lnga'i rang bzhin yod pas rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-21: chos thams cad kyang chen po lnga dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-22: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar dgos pa'i gnas nges pa na rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba yang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458a-24: rgyu dang rkyen las ming khyer thob pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-0: @458b ji ste rgyu las ming khyer thob na don yang rgyu las ming khyer thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-1: ji ltar rgyu las ming khyer thob pa zhe na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-3: dpral bar btags pa ni phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-4: mgul du btags pa ni do shal zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-5: lag pa la btags pa ni gdu bu ces bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-6: shing rta la btags pa ni 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-7: shing dang rtsva las 'bar na shing dang rtsva'i me zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-8: rigs kyi bu; shing thog ma skyes pa na mda' dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-9: mdung gi rang bzhin med mod kyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-10: rgyu dang rkyen gyis bzos mda' dang mdung du byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-11: de bas na chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod ces bya ba'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-12: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar rus sbal thang las skyes kyang rang bzhin gyis chur 'gro ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-13: be'u 'brangs ma thag tu rang bzhin gyis nu'o zhes bya ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-15: chur 'gro ba rgyu dang rkyen ma yin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-16: gnyis ka rgyu dang rkyen ma yin par 'dra na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-17: ci'i phyir me'i nang du mi 'gro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-18: be'u 'brangs ma thag tu rang bzhin gyis nu ba rgyu dang rkyen ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-19: gnyis ka rgyu dang rkyen ma yin par 'dra bas ci'i phyir rva la mi nu //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-21: ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-22: bstan cing bslabs kyang skyed spogs med do zhes smra na yod du mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-24: da ltar bstan cing bslab pa las skyed spogs yod par snang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:458b-25: de bas na rang bzhin zhes bya ba med par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-1: ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin zhes bya ba yod na bram ze thams cad lus kyi las dag par bya ba'i phyir lug bsad de lha rjed pa'i mi rigs so; ;ji ste rjed pas dag par gyur na rang bzhin yang med par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-3: 'jig rten gyi smra ba'i chos la rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-7: ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod na ci'i phyir 'jig rten na rnam pa gsum du btags par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-8: rnam pa gsum du btags pa las na thams cad la rang bzhin med par mngon no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-10: ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod na chos thams cad la so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-11: ji ste gcig tu chad pa'i nges pa'i rang bzhin yod na bu ram gyi shing las ci'i phyir skom dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-16: ji ste rang bzhin gcig na ci'i phyir dngos po de dag byung bar gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-17: ji ste dngos po gcig po las de lta bu dag byung na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-18: chos thams cad la rang bzhin gcig tu nges te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-19: so so'i rang bzhin gcig tu mi rung bar rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-21: ji ste chos thams cad rang bzhin gcig tu nges na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459a-22: ci'i phyir 'phags pa dag bu ram shing gi skom dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-0: bu ram @459b gyi tshe btung du rung la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-1: chang gi tshe btung du mi rung zhing phyir yang kha ba'i chang du gyur pa na btung du rung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-2: de bas na nges pa'i rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-3: ji ste nges pa'i rang bzhin med na rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur ces byar ga la rung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-4: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba ji lta bur dpe bstan du rung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-5: ji ste dpe brjod du yod na chos thams cad la rang bzhin med par rig par bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-6: ji ste rang bzhin yod na ni dpe byar med par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-7: 'jig rten na mkhas pa shes rab can dpe ston te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-8: de bas na chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-9: rang bzhin gcig tu nges pa med par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-10: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar lus snga'am nyon mongs pa snga zhes bya ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-12: ji ste ngas lus snga'o zhes brjod na ni khyod kyis nga dang mthun no zhe'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-13: lus mi snga'o zhes brgal du'ang rung na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-15: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang nyon mongs pa ni gnyis ka snga phyi med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-17: de ltar dus gcig tu yod mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-18: 'on kyang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las lus yod par gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-19: lus kyi rgyu las nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-20: ji ste khyod kyi yid la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:459b-22: mi'i mig gnyis kyang dus gcig tu thob ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-0: gcig la gcig mi bltos pa ni g-yas pa g-yon pa @460a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-2: g-yon pa'ang g-yas pa la mi ltos pa dang 'dra bar nyon mongs pa dang lus kyang de dang 'dra bar sems na de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-5: 'jig rten na mig gis bltar snang ba me mar gyi snying po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-6: snang ba gnyis dus gcig tu yod mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-7: snying po'i rgyus snang bar gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-8: snying po med pa las snang ba ni ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-10: ci khyod kyi yid la lus mi snga bas rgyu med par sems na de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-12: ji ste lus snga bas rgyu dang rkyen med pa'i phyir med pa zhes bya ba na lta khyod kyang chos thams cad la rgyu dang rkyen med do zhes smra ba'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-13: ji ste bltar mi snang ba'i phyir de skad ces mi smra na'ang da ltar rdza ma la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar mngon sum du bltar snang na ci'i phyir de skad ces mi smra //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-14: ji ltar rdza ma dang 'dra bar lus snga ba'i rgyu dang rkyen kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-16: snang yang rung mi snang yang rung chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las byung gi rang bzhin med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-18: ji ste chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-19: rgyu dang rkyen med do zhes smra na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-20: khyod ci'i phyir chen po bzhi yod do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460a-21: chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid ni rgyu dang rkyen yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-0: chen po bzhi'i rgyu dang rkyen ni de lta bu yin @460b mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-1: chos thams cad kyang chen po bzhi'i rgyu dang rkyen du mthun no zhes smra ba'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-2: dper na 'jig rten gyi gtam du rab tu byung ba thams cad ni tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson pa yin pas gdol ba la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson pa yin no zhes brjod pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-3: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar chen po bzhi la nges pa'i rang bzhin yod do zhes smra ba ni ngas bltas na rang bzhin de ni 'gyur ba ste nges pa ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-4: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos la mar dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-6: sra rtsi la sa zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-7: khyod kyis sa zhes btags pa de ni ma nges te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-8: bar bar ni chu lta bur yang btub //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-9: bar bar ni sa lta bur yang btub ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-10: de bas na rang bzhin gyi sra ba'o zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-11: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi chos la tshon mo steng dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-16: dngul la me'o zhes bya ba de la rang bzhin bzhi yod de; 'bab pa'i tshe ni chu zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-17: g-yo ba'i tshe ni rlung zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-18: tsha ba'i tshe ni me zhes bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-19: sra ba'i tshe ni sa zhes bya ba na ci'i phyir de la nges par me'i rang bzhin no zhes gdags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-21: chu'i rang bzhin ni 'bab pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:460b-22: gal te chu 'khyags kyang de la sa zhes mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-0: dba' rlabs g-yo pa'i tshe rlung zhes mi @461a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-1: bya'o; ;de ltar g-yo ba la rlung zhes mi bya na 'khyags kyang chu ma yin zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-2: de ltar dngos po gnyis po'ang rgyu dang rkyen las gyur na ci'i phyir chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur ces smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-4: ji ste dbang po lnga rang bzhin gyis mthong ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-8: reg pa'ang rang bzhin yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-9: rgyu dang rkyen las ma gyur to zhes bya ba ni mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-12: rang bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba zhig yin na mig gi rang bzhin mthong ba'ang rtag tu mthong ba'i rigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-13: mthong ba dang mi mthong ba'i dus kyang med pa'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-14: de bas na rgyu dang rkyen gyis mthong gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-15: rgyu dang rkyen med pa las ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-16: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar 'dod chags skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-17: rnam par grol ba ni yul lnga'i rgyu las ma yin no zhes bya ba de yang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-21: rnam par grol ba yul lnga po'i rgyu las ma gyur mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-22: mi dge ba rnam par rtog pa'i phyir 'dod chags skye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-23: dge ba rnam par rtog pa'i phyir rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461a-25: nang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'dod chags skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-0: pha rol gyi rgyu dang rkyen @461b gyis skye zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-1: de bas na khyod chos thams cad la so so'i rang bzhin yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-3: rnam par grol ba'ang yul lnga'i rgyu las ma yin zhes bya ba de mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-4: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar dbang po rnams dang ldan pa rnams ni dbul phongs la dbang po'ang med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-5: dbang po dang mi ldan zhing nyams pa ni longs spyod che zhing dbang dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-6: de las bltas na rang bzhin yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-7: rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no zhes bya ba de mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-9: sems can ni las las 'bras bu rnam par smin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-10: de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang rnam pa gsum ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-11: mngon sum du smin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-16: dbang po dang ldan pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-17: mi ldan pa'ang so so'i las yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-18: rang bzhin yod na dbang po dang ldan pa ni longs spyod che ba'i rigs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-19: longs spyod che ba ni dbang po dang ldan pa'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-20: de de ltar ma gyur pas de bas na nges par rang bzhin med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-21: rgyu dang rkyen las gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-22: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar 'jig rten na byis pa shed ma bye ba yul lnga po bye brag mi phyed pas bar bar ni ngu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:461b-24: de bas na thams cad la rang bzhin yod de zhes bya ba de'ang mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-1: yod na dgod pa'ang rtag tu dgod /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-2: ngu ba'ang rtag tu ngu ba'i rigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-4: res 'ga' ni ngu ba'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-5: de ltar res 'ga' ni dgod; res 'ga' ni ngu ba las na thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-6: de bas na chos thams cad la rang bzhin yod de rgyu dang rkyen las ma yin no zhes bya ba'i mi rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-9: gal te chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yin na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-10: lus 'di rgyu dang rkyen gang las byung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-13: lus 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen ni nyon mongs pa dang las so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-16: lus 'di nyid nyon mongs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-17: las las gyur na nyon mongs pa dang las 'di gcad du rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-21: kun tu rgyus yang gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-22: bdag la rnam par phye ste bstan pas bdag gis thos nas gnas 'di nyid las ma g-yos par yongs su chod par mdzad du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462a-25: gal te mtha' gnyis shes la dbu ma la thogs pa med na gang zag des ni nyon mongs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-0: las yongs su chod par 'gyur @462b ro; ;kun tu rgyus gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-2: bdag gis ni shes shing rtogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-3: dam pa'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; ji ltar bur shes shing rtog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-8: gzugs kyi rnam par grol ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-9: dbu ma zhes bgyi ba ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-13: rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-17: mtha' gnyis shin tu rtogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-22: bdag rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pas dge slong du gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-24: de'i tshe khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa kun chod nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-25: de nas gzhan yang bram ze shin tu rgyas par zhes bya bas yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-27: bdag ci sems pa mkhyen nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-30: mya ngan las 'das pa ni rtag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:462b-32: yon po ni ngan par lta ba'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-3: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis de skad ces gsungs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-5: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la bsod snyoms byed pa ni rtag pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-6: mgron du pos pa ni mi rtag pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-8: drang po ni rgyal mtshan no snyam sems te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-9: de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa ni rtag pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-11: yon po ni ngan par lta ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-12: drang po ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-13: khyod kyis sngon sems pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-16: bdag gis bsams pa yang dag par mkhyen no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-17: 'phags pa'i lam brgyad kyis sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ram /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-18: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste lan ma btab bo; ;bram zes gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-20: bdag gis bsams pa mkhyen na ci'i slad du bdag gis zhus pa'i lan ma gnang nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+yas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-23: gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod dam mtha' med ces 'dri na de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid kyis cang mi gsung ste lan mi 'debs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-24: 'phags pa'i lam brgyad ni drang po'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463a-25: mya ngan las 'da' pa ni rtag pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-0: gal te 'phags pa'i lam brgyad la nan tan byas na rnam par grol @463b ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-1: ji ste nan tan ma byas na thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-4: mkhar chen po zhig ngos bzhi na thar pa'i khung dang lam med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-5: sgo gcig pu yod na de'i sgo srung mkhas pa shes rab dang ldan na gang gtang ba'i rigs pa ni gtong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-6: gang gtang ba'i mi rigs pa ni mi gtong ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-7: ji snyed rgyu ba grangs nyid mi shes kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-8: rgyu ba thams cad sgo de la rgyu bar nges par shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-11: mkhar ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dpe'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-12: sgo ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad kyi dpe'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-13: sgo srung ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-15: de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa dang mi zad pa'i lan ma gsungs mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-16: ji tsam du zad par 'gyur ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam brgyad nan tan byed pa las 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos ston pa la shin tu mkhas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-22: bdag kyang mkhar dang lam shes shing sgo srung lta bur dad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-26: bla na med pa rgya che ba'i sems bskyed pa legs so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:463b-29: bram ze 'di ni da gdod de ltar sems bskyed pa ma yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-1: na bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa snyed 'das pa'i snga rol na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-3: mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-7: skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-8: lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-9: sangs rgyas de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas bskal pa bzang po 'dir mngon par sangs rgyas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-10: chos kyi mtshan nyid khong du chud cing rtogs nas yun ring mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-11: sems can gyi phyir mu stegs can du ston te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-12: mi shes pa ltar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-13: de bas na koondi n+ya khyod bla na med pa'i sems bskyed pa legs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-14: legs so zhes ma zer cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-15: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya la dge slong dga' bo de ltar gang na 'dug ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-16: tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+yas gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-18: dge slong dga' bo ni de ltar shing s'a la'i tshal 'di nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi pha rol na bdud drug khri bzhi stong snyed kyis yongs su gtse zhing mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464a-19: bdud de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su sprul nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-0: @464b la la ni chos thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-1: la la ni chos thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba ma yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-2: la la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos thams cad rtag pa yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-3: la la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos thams cad mi rtag pa yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-4: la la ni phung po lnga bden pa yin no zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-5: la la ni sgyu ma yin no zhes smra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-6: de bzhin du skyed mched dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-9: la la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yod do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-10: la la ni rkyen bzhi 'ba' zhig yod do zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-11: la la ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-13: smig rgyu ba lta bu'o zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-14: la la ni thos pa'i rgyu las chos thob bo zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-15: la la ni bsams pa'i rgyu las chos thob bo zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-16: la la ni bsgoms pa'i rgyu las chos thob bo zhes smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-17: la la ni mi sdug pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i chos smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-18: la la ni dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i chos smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-19: la la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yang dag par rtog pa smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-20: la la ni yang dag pa'i spyod pa'i don gsum dang thabs mkhas pa bdun po smra /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:464b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas sa bcu pa'i bar du smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-4: la la ni mdo'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-5: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-6: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang; lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-7: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-10: skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-12: rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-13: rmad du byung ba'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-14: shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-15: gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde'ang smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-16: la la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-17: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-18: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-21: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-22: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-23: la la ni nang stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-25: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-27: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-28: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-29: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-30: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-31: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-32: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-33: mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-34: phung po stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-38: mi dge ba stong pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465a-39: lung du mi ston pa stong pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-1: mya ngan las 'das pa stong pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-4: don dam pa stong pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-5: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-6: chen po stong pa nyid kyang ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-7: la la ni mngon par shes pa ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-8: lus las chu dang me 'byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-9: lus kyi stod nas chu 'bab na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-11: lus kyi smad nas chu 'bab na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-13: mchan g-yas pa 'og tu phab na mchan g-yon nas chu 'byung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-14: mchan g-yon pa 'og tu phab na mchan g-yas nas chu 'byung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-15: mchan khung gcig nas 'brug bsgrags na mchan khung gcig nas char 'bab pa'ang ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-16: la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po'ang ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-17: la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog ma lhums nas bltams nas gom pa bdun bdun gshegs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-18: pho brang na 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-19: thog ma rab tu byung ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-21: byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-22: bdud kyi sde rnams phab nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-23: rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang ston to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-25: dge slong dga' bos de lta bu'i dngos po dag mthong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:465b-26: de yid la 'di snyam du rdzu 'phrul sngon ma mthong ba 'di dag sus byas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-0: sh'akya thub pas mdzad pa ma yin nam @466a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-3: smra'am ci bgyi ba'i gtol ma mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-4: dge slong dga' bo ni bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa'ang 'di snyam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa ni so sor mi mthun na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-5: bdag gis da gang gzung snyam sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-7: dge slong dga' bo ni da ltar sdug bsngal chen po myong ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa yid la dran yang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba ma mchis pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-9: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir ma mchis pa lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-10: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-12: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas skye ba gcig lon pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas skye ba tshad med pa snyed lon te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-14: sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod pas mchod pa sems shin tu brtan pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-15: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466a-17: yon tan dang ldan pa yun ring po nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-0: sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa @466b dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-1: byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-2: phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i gzungs thob pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-4: chos kyi bzod pa thob pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-5: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-6: ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thob pa 'di dag gis ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la nam du'ang the tshom mi 'byung zhing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-7: dkon mchog gsum mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-10: mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba rnam par 'byed cing ston pa la'ang shin tu mkhas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-11: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thos na yang ngo mtshar rmad du mi 'dzin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-12: stong pa nyid rnam pa mang po thos kyang sems mi zhum mi skrag pas chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyang mngon du rtogs par bgyid /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-13: mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'dzin cing don la'ang shin tu mkhas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-14: de ma lags pa sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed kyi mdo sde gsung rab bcu gnyis kyang 'dzin nus pa mchis na ci'i slad du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin mi nus snyam dgongs nas koondi n+ya la dge slong dga' bo ga re zhes bka' stsal /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-16: legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:466b-18: nga mngon par sangs rgyas nas lo sum cu lhag lon te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-1: po'i khab na bzhugs pa na de'i tshe de'i dus na ngas dge slong rnam la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-2: dge slong dag khyed su zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'dzin cing nga'i g-yog kyang byed la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-3: bdag gi don yang byed nus zhes bka' stsal pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-4: 'khor gyi nang na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koo nadi n+yas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-5: bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab bcu gnyis 'dzin cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-6: de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa'i g-yog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-7: bdag gi don kyang bgyid nus so zhes gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-8: de la ngas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-9: koo ndi n+ya khyod nyid kyang rgas 'khogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-10: g-yog sbyin dgos na khyod kyis nga'i g-yog ji ltar bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-11: de nas sh'a ri'i bus gsol ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-12: bdag gis ni gsung rab thams cad 'dzin cing mdzad pa thams cad kyi g-yog kyang bgyid la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-13: bdag gi don yang bgyid nus so zhes gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-14: de'i tshe sh'a ri'i bu la'ang khyod nyid kyang rgas 'khogs te g-yog dgos na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467a-15: nga'i g-yog ji ltar bya zhes bka' stsal pa nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'i bar du gsol nas ngas ma gnang ba ni de bzhin du rgyas par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-0: de'i tshe moonggal ya na 'khor de'i nang du 'dus @467b par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-1: de yid la 'di snyam du bsams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong lnga brgya bo gang yang g-yog tu ma gnang na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-4: thugs gang la dad snyam bsams te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dga' bo la dgyes pa ni ji ltar nyi ma thog ma shar na nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la snang ba dang 'dra bar sems kyis rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-6: koo ndi n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-8: bdag gis brtags na de bzhin gshegs pa ni zham ring du dga' bo dgyes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-9: de nas koo ndi n+ya dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang bcas te dga' bo gang na bar song nas dga' po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-10: dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring du bskos kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-14: bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i rgyal po'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-18: me lta bur byin che ba lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-19: bdag ni shin tu'ang zhan pas zham ring bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-21: dga' bo khyod nged kyis bsgo ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:467b-22: phan pa dang bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-3: bdag ni phan pa dang bde ba chen po'ang mi 'tshal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring yang rdo mi thogs so zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-5: de nas moonggal gyis dga' bo la smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas sngar dge 'dun gyi nang na zham ring ba btus na dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas zham ring du gsol kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-12: de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-13: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te bltas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khyod la dgyes par rtogs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-16: dga' bos de skad ces smras pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo btsugs nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-18: ji ste de lta bu zhig lags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-19: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gis gsol pa rnam gsum zhig gnang na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-20: bdag gis dge 'dun gyi bka' bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468a-24: bdag gis 'dod pa gsum ni ji ste de bzhin gshegs pas na bza' rnying pa bdag la stsal na bdag mi 'tshal du gnang ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-0: ji ste de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag gi der gshegs na @468b bdag mi mchi ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-1: bdag dus ma mchis par gang yang mchi bar gnang na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-2: bdag gis dge 'dun gyi bka' bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yog bgyi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-3: de nas koo ndi n+ya dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-4: dge slong lnga brgya po rnams phyir nga gang na bar lhags nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-5: bdag cag gis dge slong dga' bo la bsgo na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-6: smon pa rnam pa 'di gsum gnang na bdag gis dge 'dun gyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mchi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-8: ngas de'i tshe na dga' bo la shin tu legs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-9: legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-10: dge slong dga' bo ni shes rab dang ldan pas dpyas su 'gyur ba snga nas shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-12: gang zag dag khyod ni gos dang zas kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yog byed do zhes smra bar gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-13: de bas na na bza' rnying pa mi 'dod cing mgron du mi 'gro'o zhes smras pa yin no /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-14: koo ndi n+yas dge slong dga' bo ni shes rab dang ldan pas ji ste 'gro ba la dus dang tshod bzung na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-15: 'khor bzhi po la phan pa dang bde ba'i don rgyas par byed mi nus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-16: de bas na 'gro ba la dus med par gsol pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-18: ngas ni dge slong dga' bos gsol pa rnam pa gsum po yid bzhin du gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-19: de nas moonggal phyir dge slong dga' bo'i gran du song ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:468b-20: dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-0: khyod kyis gsol pa rnam pa gsum po kho bos @469a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-1: gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos thams cad gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-4: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-5: bdag gis g-yog bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-7: dga' bos nga'i g-yog lo nyi shu lhag cig byas te bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa brgyad dang ldan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-10: lo nyi shu lhag gi bar du nga'i g-yog byas kyang nga'i phyi bzhin mgron du mi 'gro ba yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-11: nga'i g-yog byas nas de tsam gyi bar du na bza' rnying pa mi 'dod pa yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-12: nga'i g-yog byas nas nga'i drung du 'ong ba na dus ma yin par mi 'ong ba yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-13: nga'i g-yog byed de nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang nga'i zham ring du rgyal po'i pho brang dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-14: rigs chen po btsun pa'i gnas su phyin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-15: bu mo bzang mo dang lha dang klu'i bu mo mthong yang 'dod pa'i sems mi skye ba yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-16: nga'i g-yog byas nas ngas gsungs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis bzung nas lan gcig thos nas phyir 'dri mi srid de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-17: ji ltar snod gcig gi nang na chu yod pa snod gcig gi nang du byo ba dang 'dra ba yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469a-18: 'dri ba gcig ma gtogs pa ni rgyal tshab be ro zhes bya bas sh'akya rigs bsad nas grong khyer ser skya ba shig pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-0: dga' bo de'i tshe shin tu mi dga' nas skad chen por ngus te nga gang na bar 'ong nas @469b nga la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang grong khyer 'dir bltams la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-3: sh'akya rigs su mthun na ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdangs yod pa'i 'od can du gyur la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-4: bdag ni mdangs ma mchis par gyur ces gsol nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-5: ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-7: nga ni stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nan tan mdzad pas khyod dang mi 'dra ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-8: de nas lo gsum 'das nas phyir nga la 'di skad ces zhus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-10: bdag sngon grong khyer ser skyar de bzhin gshegs pa la stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhus pa bden nam rdzun zhes zhus nas ngas dga' bo la de de bzhin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-13: nga'i g-yog byas nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i ye shes ma thob mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gang la bzhugs pa shes pa yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-15: nga'i g-yog byas nas smon lam gyi ye shes ma thob mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-16: sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phyin na dge sbyong gi 'bras bu mngon sum du thob pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-18: lha dang mi'i lus gang gis thob pa mngon sum du rtogs pa yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:469b-19: nga'i g-yog byas nas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-0: dge slong dga' bo ni de ltar @470a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos brgyad dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-2: de bas na dge slong dga' bo ni mang du thos pa'i mdzod yin no zhes grags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-4: dge slong dga' bo ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-7: dad pa'i dbang po shin tu brtan pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-9: lus la nad med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-11: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-13: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab tu ldan pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-14: thos pa las shes rab skye ba dang ldan pa yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-16: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nye gnas mya ngan med ces bya ba'ang 'di bzhin du chos brgyad dang ldan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi nye gnas tsa pa ka la dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyi nye gnas au pa shanta dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-19: sangs rgyas log par dad sel gyi nye gnas pa te zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-20: sangs rgyas gser thub bsod skyabs kyi nye gnas so te zhes bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-21: sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nye gnas ya ba mi ta zhes bya ba'ang thams cad chos brgyad dang ldan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470a-22: da ltar nga'i dga' bo'ang chos brgyad dang ldan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-0: de bas na dge slong dga' bo ni mang du thos pa'i mdzod @470b ces grags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-1: rigs kyi bu khyod smra ba ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' tshad med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-2: mtha' yas pa zhig 'dus mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang byams pa chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-4: snying rje chen pos byed dka' ba byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-6: snying rje'i dbang gis so so na las yod la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-8: bdag gi lus brgyan pa'i las byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-9: de bas na nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na mdo sde sde bcu gnyis rgyas par sgrogs mi nus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-10: ji ste byang chub sems dpas bar bar sgrogs na'ang gzhan dag yid mi ches so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-12: dge slong dga' bo ni nga'i gcung yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-13: lo nyi shu lhag gi bar du nga'i g-yog byas nas ci thos pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ni ji ltar snod gcig gi chu gcig gi nang du byo ba bzhin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-14: de bas na ngas dga' bo ga re zhes dris te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-15: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir bos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-16: dge slong dga' bos gang ma thos pa'i rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shin tu rgyas par ston te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:470b-17: dga' bos ci thos pa thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-0: dge slong dga' bo ni da ltar 'di nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi pha rol gnas gzhan zhig na bdud drug khri bzhi stong snyed kyis rnam par gtse zhing 'dug @471a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-1: gi ;khyod song la skad chen pos bdud rnams la legs par nyon cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gzungs chen po 'di yin no zhes bsgo zhig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-12: mi ma yin pa dang ;ri'i lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-16: khyim gyi lha la sogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-17: lha thams cad kyis gzungs kyi ming 'di thos pa tsam gyis bsti stang mi byed pa'am /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-18: gzungs kyi ming mi 'dzin pa gang yang med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-19: gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-20: bud med kyi lus spong zhing sngon gyi gnas dran par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-21: gal te tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-24: dku bag mi za ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-25: gnas dben pa la dga' ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-26: rnam pa 'di lnga ltar byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-27: dad pa'i sems kyis gzungs 'di klog gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-29: glegs bam du 'dri na gang zag des ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i las khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa bdun las 'das par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-2: pa ra ma aartha s'a dha ne /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-11: de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das las gzungs de ma nos nas dga' bo gang na bar song ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-12: bdud rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-13: bdud kyi 'khor khyod legs par nyon cig ngas bcom ldan 'das las mnos pa'i gzungs brjod par bya'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-14: bdud kyi rgyal pos gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-15: bdud kyi las yongs su spangs nas dga' bo'ang btang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nu dga' bo dang bcas te phyir sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas phyin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-17: dga' bos sangs rgyas la phyag btsal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-20: shing s'a la'i tshal gyi phyi rol na kun tu rgyu shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing 'khogs pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-21: mngon par shes pa lnga thob kyang nga rgyal ma btang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-22: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng gi ting nge 'dzin thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bzung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:471b-23: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'du shes so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-0: khyod song la shin tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bsgo @472a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-1: zhig ;de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ba ni me tog au dumba ra dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-2: do nub nam gyi gung la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-3: bya ba yod na dus la bab kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-4: phyis 'gyod pa'i sems skyes sa re zhes gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-5: dga' bo khyod kyis bsgo na gdon mi za bar nyan par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-7: khyod sngon skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du shin tu bzang po'i bur skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-8: dga' zhing 'dod pa'i bag chags da dung ma zad pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-9: de bas na khyod kyis bsgo ba'i tshig nyan par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-10: de nas dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du shin tu bzang po gang na bar song nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni me tog au dumba ra dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-14: do nub nam gyi gung la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-15: bya ba ci yod pa da dus la bab kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-17: shin tu bzang pos smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-20: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar 'gro'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-21: de nas dga' bo shin tu bzang po dang 'grogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-22: sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas shin tu bzang pos sangs rgyas la snyun gsol nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472a-24: bdag gis zhu ba zhu na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-0: bdag gis @472b bsams pa bzhin du bka' stsal du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-4: ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-5: ngas de dang de'i lan smra bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-8: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag 'di skad smra ba mchis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-9: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba myong ba ni thams cad kyang sngon gyi las lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-10: de bas na gal te tshul khrims bsrung ba la brtson zhing lus dang sems sdug bsngal bar gyur na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-11: sngon gyi las zad par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-12: sngon gyi las zad na sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-13: sdug bsngal zad na mya ngan las 'da'o zhes mchi ba'i don ji lta bu lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-17: bram ze dag de skad ces smra ba yod na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-18: de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang de'i drung du gshegs nas de la khyod 'di skad ces smra ba bden nam zhes dris te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-19: des bdag de skad ces smras pa bden no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-22: bdag gis mngon du mthong ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-23: sems can kha cig sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byed la longs spyod dang dbang du ldan pa yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-24: kha cig ni dge ba'i [?] las byed kyang dbul phongs te dbang dang mi ldan no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-25: kha cig ni las mang du byas kyang nor mi thob la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:472b-26: kha cig ni ma bsgrubs kyang rang thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:473a-1: pa'i sems dang ldan te srog mi gcod kyang tshe thung la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:473a-2: kha cig ni srog gcod pa la dga' yang tshe mthar phyin pa yod do //
