K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:477b-21: mthar phyin pa'i ye shes dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:477b-22: don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:477b-23: don dam pa'i stong ba nyid la shes rab tha mas yang dag par spyod na nyan thos kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:477b-24: shes rab 'bring gis yang dag par spyod na rang rgyal pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:477b-25: shes rab mchog gis yang dag par spyod na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:477b-26: chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag stong gis tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i yang dag pa'i 'du shes thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-0: byang chub sems dpa' khri lnga stong snyed kyis tshe gnyis kyis @478a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-2: byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sum khri lnga stong gis don dam pa'i bden pa thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-4: don dam pa'i bden pa ni don dam pa'i stong ba nyid ces kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-5: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-6: byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri lnga stong snyed kyis nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-7: nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-8: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-9: byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri lnga stong gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-10: phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-11: chos dbyings lta bu zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-12: byang chub sems dpa' drug khri lnga stong snyed kyis ni gzungs thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-13: gzungs de ni dran pa chen po'i sems zhes kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-14: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-15: byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong snyed kyis ni seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-16: seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-17: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478a-18: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong snyed kyis ni mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-0: mnyam pa'i ting nge @478b 'dzin de ni byams pa chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-1: snying rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-2: sems can grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-3: sems can grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-4: sems can grangs med pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni nyan thos su sems bskyed par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-5: mi dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag nyi shu snyed ni mngon du bud med kyi lus las skyes pa'i lus su gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-6: shin tu bzang po ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to; ;de'i tshe shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i chos shin tu zab mo thos nas chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-7: yongs su dag pa'i chos mthong nas dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ngan par lta ba yongs su spangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-8: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa shin tu brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa las rab tu 'byung bar gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-13: legs par 'ongs pa'i dge slong yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-14: 'phags pa rnams kyang dgyes pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la legs par zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:478b-15: shin tu bzang po rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas mos pa tshad med par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-1: spu rang byi nas dge slong du gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-2: chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi chu sems kyi dbye la bcus pas 'ching bas ma bcings te zag pa zad nas sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-3: shin tu bzang po dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas sangs rgyas la nye bar bsnyen te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-6: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-7: mya ngan dang dga' ba dus gcig tu gyur nas sngon gyi nyes pa 'gyod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-9: bdag gis gdug pa'i lus 'dis yun ring po nas bdag bslus pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-10: yun ring por ma rig pa ngan pa lta bu'i nang du nub pas khams gsum du 'khor zhing mu stegs can gyi chos kyis glags par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-13: shin tu gnod pa chen por gyur pa las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-14: nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin gyis dam pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479a-15: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i thugs rje chen po tshad ma mchis pa ni bskal pa'i bar du'ang bka' drin la lan mi lon no snyam sems so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-0: shin tu bzang pos de skad ces gsol nas ma chi ma blags @479b te; yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-2: bdag ni rgas 'khogs te sdug bsngal las ni rnam par ma grol gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-3: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis ni rab tu gtse bar gyur na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-5: thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshul khrims bstan te mgon dang skyabs mdzad cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-6: re zhig mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol lo; ;de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas ma gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-7: shin tu bzang pos gsol pa bzhin du ma gnang nas mya ngan gyis yid rab tu gdungs te skad chen pos 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-12: nga ni 'jigs pa chen pos bsnyen nas shin tu gdung ba mngon du gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-15: sems can gyis bsod nams zad pas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi mig ldongs so zhes smras nas rab tu cho nges rdung zhing skad kyang mi phyin pa tsam du dus nas lus khrag gis rgyas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-16: skad chen po phyung ste dus nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lus sa la brdabs pas der brgyal nas ring zhig lon pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-18: phyi sangs te du bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-20: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong mi bzod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:479b-21: sems rab tu gdung nas shin tu gcags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-1: btang ba dang 'dra ba'i lus gdug pa can 'di dang 'grogs mi 'tshal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-3: bcom ldan 'das ni slad kyis mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-4: de'i tshe shin tu bzang pos de skad ces gsol nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-5: cho nges rdung zhing de nyid du mya ngan las 'da' bar zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-6: de'i tshe brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i klung gang+g'a'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-9: 'jig rten du bcas pa'i lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-11: lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis skad mthun par 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nang gcig tu bor bas gnas ma mchis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-18: shin tu gcags so zhes smras nas thams cad dus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-19: gcig la gcig 'ju zhing brang du khu tshur gyis rdeg pas brgyal nas phyogs kyang bslad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-20: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g-yos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-21: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480a-22: khyed bus pa chung ngu ltar ma du bar so so nas du ba thong la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-1: khyed 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir bsam pa dag pa la nan tan bya zhing rjes su dran pa'i shes rab ma brjed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-2: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa las 'byung ba la brtson par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-3: khams gsum du lus myong ba ni sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo mtha' med pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-4: ma rig pa'i rje bo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-5: 'dod pa'i bdud kyi rgyal pos lus dang sems bkol ba'i bran du mi 'gyur bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-6: spyod pa'i khams la dmigs pas 'khor ba'i las byed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-9: gti mug gis skad cig skad cig tu rnam par gtses nas bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar gyur na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-10: mkhas pa shes rab can su zhig de la mi rtog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-11: khyed rnams 'di ltar rig par dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-14: yongs su dag pa thob kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-15: ngas 'dir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi chos dang mthun par mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:480b-16: de'ang so so'i skye bo dag lus glog lta bur shes par bya zhing gcags pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-0: 'khor ba'i 'od pa 'bab pa ni shin tu drag cing myur @481a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-1: la; 'du byed rnams ni 'khor bar 'khor ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-2: chos nyid kyis de bzhin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba ni shin tu za ba la bsam gyis mi khyab pas de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-4: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes pa ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-6: shin tu bzang po 'di sngon sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-7: sangs rgyas de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bskyed nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis rtag tu gcer bu pa mu stegs can gyi chos la rab tu byung ste spyad pa spyod cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-8: thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab kyis ngan par lta ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i ye shes la dgod par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-9: shin tu bzang po 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis mya ngan las 'da' kar nga dang phrad nas dam pa'i chos thos par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-10: dam pa'i chos thos nas kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-11: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas kyang mya ngan las 'da' bar zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481a-12: nga thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas tshe dang ldan pa cang shes koondi n+ya rab tu phyung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-0: tha ma mya ngan las 'da' gar shin tu bzang @481b po btul nas mdzad pa'i mthar phyin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-1: mdzad pa med pas nga yun du bzhugs kyang de las mdzad pa gzhan med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de skad ces gsungs nas shugs nar ces mdzad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-5: shin tu bzang po sangs rgyas kyi drin legs par glan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-6: khyed kyis de'i rus bu la mchod pa bya zhing mchod rten gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-7: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu mi dga' ste mchi ma blags nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-8: sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du spos kyi shing dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-9: mar gyis de'i rus bu bsregs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-10: shin tu bzang po'i rus bu bsregs pa nas me'i nang na 'od chen po btang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-11: cho 'phrul rnam pa bco brgyad mngon du bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-12: lus kyi stod nas chu 'bab na lus kyi smad nas me 'bar /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-13: mchan khung g-yas nas me 'bar na mchan khung g-yon nas chu 'bab /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-14: chung ngu las chen por gyur nas chen po las chung ngur gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-15: nam mkha' yang yongs su gang bar byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-16: de'i tshe 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-17: mu stegs can ngan par lta ba'i sems can dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas yang dag par lta ba la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-18: shin tu bzang pos cho 'phrul mngon par bstan nas phyir me'i nang du zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-19: der bsregs nas 'khor mang po rnams ring bsrel bsdus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:481b-20: mchod rten byas nas mchod pa byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-0: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las @482a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-2: tshe dang ldan pa cang shes koondi n+ya'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-4: nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di 'dzin pa la brtson par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-5: ngas ni bskal pa khrag khrig tshad med pa'i bar du shin tu thob dka' ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di bsgrubs nas da ltar bstan pa yin no; ;khyed rnams 'di ltar rig par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni phyogs bcu na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje'i gter rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sku tshe 'dir gtong bas mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482a-16: khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi drin la yang dag par lan glon zhing byang chub myur du thob par 'dod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-0: sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing gang nas gang du @482b skyes kyang yang dag par rjes su dran pa mi brjed par 'dod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-1: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-2: nyin mtshan du skyob par 'dod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-3: sems can thams cad kyis 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i chos thob par 'dod na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mdo sde 'di la brtson 'grus su nan tan bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-6: nga mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa na'ang mu stegs can aur tu lam pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-8: ting nge 'dzin brgyad slob pa la zhugs nas de'i bstan pa bzhin du byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-9: mngon par sangs rgyas nas de'i chos smad de mthar gyis shin tu bzang po'ang btul nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bzhag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i mes ngan par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsregs pa ni ji ltar shing lo skam po me chen po'i nang du bcug pa dang 'dra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-11: dga' bo nga'i gnyen du gyur pa sh'akya rigs la shin tu thugs brtse'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-12: nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyod kyis brtson 'grus su legs par ston cing chos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-13: nga'i nye gnas rnams dam pa'i chos bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-14: rtsed mo dang bag med par spyod yul rnams la 'jug pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:482b-15: ngan par lta ba'i chos la spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-0: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las ni rnam par ma grol na myur du rnam @483a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-1: par grol bar bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-2: rnyog ma lda'i 'dod pa la shin tu 'jigs pa bskyed de mgon med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-3: mi'i lus lan gcig stor nas phyir thob par dka' ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-4: tshe gcig tu bag bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-5: mi rtag pa'i gdon chen po las rnam par thar bar bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-6: sems can la snying rje ba bskyed de sems can gyi srog mi gcod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-7: chung ngu na grog sbur gyi bar du mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-8: lus kyi las yongs su dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams bzang por skye ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-9: ngag gi las yongs su dag pas nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-12: sems kyi sbrul gdul zhing byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-13: dge ba dang sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa lus kyi grib ma bzhin du 'brang bar 'du byed kyi las la shin tu brtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-14: dus gsum gyi 'bras bu yongs su 'khor pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-15: skye ba 'di chud gsan nas phyis 'gyod kyang mi phan par ston cing chongs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-16: nga mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab te khyod la bstan pa 'di dag yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-17: de'i tshe na dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483a-18: lus dang sems 'dar zhing g-yo ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-0: shin tu 'khrugs nas mya ngan gyis @483b gdungs te skad kyang ma phyin la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-1: brgyal ba tsam du 'khrugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar shi ba bzhin du gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-2: de nas ma 'gags pas dga' bo la spro ba bskyed de mya ngan ba sangs nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-3: khyod de ltar mya ngan ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-5: deng bzhugs kyang sang mi bzhugs so; ;khyod kyis ngas smras pa bzhin du zhu ba rnam pa bzhi po 'di zhus shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-6: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dge slong sgrub sde khyim sun 'byin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-7: 'dod ldan sdig to can dang ji ltar lhan cig tu gnas shing bstan pa bzhin du bgyi ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs na ston pa sangs rgyas kyis mdzad na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-9: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas ston pa sus bgyi ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas shing brten na mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu su la gnas shing ba rten pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi sde snod bsdu ba na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-13: mdo sde thams cad kyi mgo nan la ji skad bya ba zhus shig ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:483b-14: de'i tshe dga' bo'i rmi lam na ma 'gags pas smras pa lta bur zhu ba bzhi po zhus shig ces smras pa thos nas bags kyis sangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-0: zhu ba bzhi po bcom ldan @484a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-3: khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar mi dga' zhing shin tu mya ngan byed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-4: sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-5: chos nyid kyis 'di ltar gshegs pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-8: dga' bo khyod kyis zhu ba bzhi po 'di ni nang gi tha mar zhus pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-9: 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-10: de bas na legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-12: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-14: khyod 'dri ba ltar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dge slong drug sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-15: 'dod ldan sdig to can khyim sun 'byin pa dang ji lta bur lhan cig tu gnas shing bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur zhes dris pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-17: dge slong 'dod ldan rang bzhin gyis ma rungs pa nga mya ngan las 'das nas rang dul zhing nges par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-18: sdig to'i sems kyang spong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484a-19: dga' bo; de'i nu bo kun dga' bo 'dod pa dang ldan te ma rungs pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pas bstan cing bcos nas de'i dbang po dang shes rab ci lcogs @484b pas rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-2: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-3: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas rga shi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-5: smre sngags 'don pa'i bar du thams cad kyang ma rig pa 'dod pa'i thibs po'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-6: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis khams gsum du gang nas rgyud drug tu 'khor te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-7: sdug bsngal chen po'i rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-8: de ltar shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis dag pa brtags nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-9: srid pa'i skyon ma rig pa yongs su gcod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-10: rtsa ba 'gags pas ma rig pa 'gag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-11: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-14: smre sngags 'don pa'i bar du 'gag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-15: de ltar yang dag par spyod pa na sems gnas par gyur te; ting nge 'dzin du zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs kyis bsam gtan dang po thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-17: de nas mthar gyis bsam gtan bzhi'ang thob nas dran pa yang dag pa'i sems kyis de ltar nan tan byas nas 'bras bu bla ma'ang rang thob ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-18: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-20: de'i tshe na dge slong kun dga' bos da ltar bsam pa shin tu dag pas ngas bstan pa bzhin du brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:484b-21: ring po mi thogs par dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-1: las 'das nas khyod kyis ngas bstan pa bzhin du drug sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-3: dge slong de dag bsam pa dag pas rnam par dag pa'i dam pa'i chos 'di la brten te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-4: ring po mi thogs par 'bras bu mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-6: de bas na ma rig pa las khams gsum du 'khor ba'i shing chen po skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-8: yun ring por sdug bsngal gyis nyin mtshan du gdungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-9: mun pa nag po'i 'khor ba'i ka ba la 'khor zhing rnam par shes pa drug gi yal ga dang; ngan par rtog pa'i rtsa ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-10: ma rig pa'i dba' rlabs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-11: sems dang rnam par shes pa khol po lta bus yul drug la rgyu zhing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-12: sdug bsngal gyi sa bon btab nas phyir bzlog pa med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-13: rgyal po dang 'dra bar dbang che bas na ma rig pa ni rje bo lta bu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-14: skad cig skad cig tu gnon par byed par sems can gyis ma tshor bar 'khor ba na rgyun du 'khor bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-16: sems can thams cad ni ma rig pa 'di'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa la zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485a-17: bdag tu lta bas zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa rje bo lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis lus bkol te lus zhig kyang rang dbang du mi 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-0: ma rig pa'i sdug bsngal 'gags te khams gsum zad na de'i phyir @485b 'jig rten las 'da' ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-2: gang gis rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis mthar bdag med cing yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul la zhugs par rtogs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-3: des ni khams gsum gyi me chen po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsung ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-6: yang dag pa'i gsung gis khyod la gtams pa 'di khyod kyis legs par nan tan gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-7: dga' bo khyod kyis zhu ba ltar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te 'jig rten na mi bzhugs na ston pa sus dya zhes bya ba ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-9: tshul khrims ni khyod kyi ston pa chen po yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-10: de la gnas te nan tan byas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-13: dga' bo khyod zhu ba ltar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas ci la gnas shing brten ces bya ba ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-15: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas te sems brgyan nas gnas par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-16: lus la lus kyi rjes su brtags te nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs na lus la lus kyi rjes su dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-17: tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su dran par byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-18: tshor ba phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:485b-20: gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas par rtogs na tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-2: sems ni ming tsam du zad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-3: ming nyid dang yang bral bar rtogs na sems la sems kyi rjes su dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-4: chos la chos kyi rjes su brtags te dge ba'i chos su'ang mi dmigs /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-5: mi dge ba'i chos su'ang mi dmigs na chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-6: dga' bo khyod zhu ba ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-7: mdo sde thams cad kyi mgo nan la ji skad gdags zhes bya ba ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi mgo nan la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-10: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig na 'khor rnam bzhi dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-11: mdo sde 'di gsungs so zhes thogs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-12: de'i tshe dga' bos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-13: gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs kyang rung /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-15: sbyin bdag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa la gser dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-17: rin po che sna bdun dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486a-18: longs spyod kyi yo byad mang po phul nas ji lta bur su la bzhag par bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo @486b la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-1: gal te sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-2: sangs rgyas la ci phul ba thams cad dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-3: gal te sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas yon bdag dad pas sangs rgyas la bsngos shing phul ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-4: sangs rgyas kyi na bza' dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-5: rin po che sna bdun gyi ba dan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-6: gdugs su bya zhing mar bsung can dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-7: rin po che'i me tog nyos te sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-8: sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan du spyad du mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-9: gal te gzhan du spyad na sangs rgyas kyi dkor brkus pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-13: gal te skyes bu zhig gis gser dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-15: rin po che sna bdun dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-22: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad phul nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-25: gal te skyes bu zhig gis gser dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-27: rin po che sna bdun dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:486b-33: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la phul te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-1: bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te mchod pa byas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-3: de ltar skyes bu de gnyis kyis dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa bgyis na bsod nams gang gis mang du thob /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-5: skyes bu de gnyis kyis de ltar dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na bsod nams thob pa'i khyad par med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-7: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das kyang chos kyi sku ni rtag pa yin pas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na bsod nams 'dra ste khyad par med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-10: sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa la gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis gong du smos pa dang 'dra bar bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa bgyid pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-11: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis gong du smos pa dang 'dra bar bsti stang dang bcas pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung ril po la mchod pa bgyis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-13: skyes bu de gnyis gang gis bsod nams mang du thob /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-15: skyes bu de gnyis kyi bsod nams ni mnyam pas khyad par med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487a-17: dpag tu med par rgya che bas sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa'i bar du bsod nams mi zad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-2: sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-3: gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis gong du smos pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-4: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-5: gal te skyes bu zhig dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung phyed la mchod pa bgyis na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-7: skyes bu de gnyis gang gis bsod nams mang du thob /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-9: skyes bu de gnyis dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-10: bsod nams la khyad par med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-11: bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med dpag tu med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-13: gal te skyes bu zhig gis dad pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bzhi cha gcig gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-15: bcu drug gi cha gcig gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-19: klung gangg'a'i bye ma'i cha gcig tsam nas chung ngu na yungs kar tsam gcig la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-20: dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-21: rim gro dang bcas pas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas pa de'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-22: gal te sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-23: skyes bu de gnyis kyi bsod nams ni thams cad khyad par med par mnyam ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:487b-24: tshad med dpag tu med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-1: sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-3: gang zhig dad pa'i sems kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-4: bla mar byas; bkur stir byas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-6: skyes bu de gnyis kyi bsod nams thob pa ni gnyis su med /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-7: dbyer med par rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-9: nga mya ngan las 'das nas gnam gyi steng ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-11: sems can gyis nga'i sku gdung lag tu thob ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-12: mya ngan dang dga' ba bcas pas bsti stang du phyag 'tshal te dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-13: bsod nams tshad med dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-15: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mthong na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-16: des ni sangs rgyas mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-17: sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-18: chos mthong ba des ni dge 'dun mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-19: dge 'dun mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-20: dga' bo de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa gnas pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-21: sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs kyi gnas su 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488a-22: dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-0: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag cag gis cho ga gang dang sbyar te de bzhin gshegs @488b pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na sku gdung 'thob cing dad pas mchod par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-2: nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i thabs su bsregs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-4: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bsreg pa'i cho ga ji lta bu lags /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni shi nas zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-7: gdod lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du 'dzud do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-8: sgrom du bcug nas 'bru mar bsung can gyis sgrom gyi nang du bkang nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-9: kha legs par bcad de yang zhag bdun du 'jog go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-10: de nas sgrom nas phyung ste spos chus bkru'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-11: spos chus bkrus nas bdug spos kyis mchod cing gdugs la shing bal gyis lus kun dkri'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-12: shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du ras dkar po bzang po yug stong gis mthar chags su dkri'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-13: de ltar dkris nas sgrom gyi nang du 'bru mar bsung can gyis bkang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-14: rgyal po'i rus bu phyir sgrom gyi nang du bcug la sgrom gyi kha legs par bcad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-15: shing bsung can gyi rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du drangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-16: shing rta'i ngos bzhi'ang rgyan phyang sbyangs shing rin po che sna tshogs kyis kyang shing rta sbra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:488b-17: grangs med pa'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-0: rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs @489a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-3: spos bzang po sna tshogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-4: lha'i rol mos bskor zhing mchod pa bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-5: de nas shing bsung can gyi nang ri mo dang ldan pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-6: mar bsung can gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus bu bsreg go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-7: de ltar bsregs nas ring bsrel bsdus te grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten sgo bzhi bkod pa byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-8: ring bsrel de'i nang du bzhag la 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas bltar bzhug go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-9: dga' bo 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de bsod nams cung zad cig gis rgyal po'i thabs thob kyang srid pa las rnam par ma grol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-11: btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas su bcas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-12: ngan par lta ba dang gdug pa gsum du bcas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-13: nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa ba spu'i nyag ma tsam yang ma spangs pa shi nas 'jig rten du bcas pas de lta bu'i cho ga byed cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-14: mchod rten brtsigs nas thams cad rjes su yi rang zhing blta na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa lta ci smos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-17: bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med pa nas btsun mo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489a-19: 'dod pa la yongs su spangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-0: 'jig rten gyi chos la ba mo'am ser ba lta bur rtogs nas rtsol @489b dka' ba btsal te shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod dka' ba spyad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-2: phyogs bcu na dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzad pa yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-6: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa drug ma bsgrubs pa gang yang med la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-8: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-11: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-12: stong pa nyid bco brgyad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-13: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-15: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-16: ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-17: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-18: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku tshe dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-21: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-22: spyod dka' ba thams cad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-23: dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-24: sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang; sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:489b-28: smon lam chen po thams cad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-1: dang; de la sogs te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhun gyis grub ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-2: mi dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su bcad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-3: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su bcad /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-4: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad kyang yongs su bcad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-6: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis shin tu rtogs nas byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam pa bzhi btul te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur nas de lta bu'i dam pa'i chos thams cad la nan tan byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsung mthun par legs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-8: legs so zhes bka' stsal nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-9: mthun par chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi chu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-10: chos kyi sku'i spyi bor dbang bskur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-11: gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bsgrags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-12: de bas na nga ni da ltar lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-13: phyogs bcur rnam par sangs rgyas pa mthar phyin pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-14: lha dang mi'i nang na dpe zla med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-15: sems can thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490a-16: mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-1: skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-2: lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-3: 'jig rten la thugs brtse bar mdzad pa kun mdzad nas sems can gyi phyir mya ngan las 'das na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-4: 'jig rten gyi chos bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-5: dga' bo; nga mya ngan las 'das nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du zhog la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-6: gdod lcags kyi sgrom du chug cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-7: lcags kyi sgrom du bcug nas mar bsung can gyis long la kha legs par chod cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-8: sgrom yang rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu spras shing brgyan la sgrom 'khor bar rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-10: me tog gis mchod pa gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-11: de lta bur zhag bdun du mchod nas sgrom nas phyung la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-12: spos chus legs par khrus shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-13: de ltar spos chus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku legs par bkrus nas shing bal gyis sku khyab par dkris shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-14: de'i steng du rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkris shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-15: de ltar dkris nas phyir lcags kyi sgrom du chug la mar bsung can gyis bkang ste kha legs par chod cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:490b-16: de nas go shirsha tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-0: shing bsung can thams cad dang bcas su rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i @491a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-2: rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan te sreg pa'i gnas su drongs shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-3: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-4: rin po che'i gdugs grangs med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-5: rin po che'i gos grangs med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-6: grangs med pa'i lha'i rol mo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-7: grangs med pa'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-8: spos kyis nam mkha' yang gang ba tsam du mchod pa gyis la ngus shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-11: 'khor thams cad kyis spos kyi shing tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-13: mar bsung can gyis bsregs la ngus shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-14: de ltar bsregs nas lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-16: 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-17: rin po che sna bdun gyi bum par bcug ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-18: grong khyer chen po'i lam gyi bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-19: ring bsrel mchod na sems can dag bsod nams chen po thob cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-20: srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal spangs nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-23: sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung gi rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas nas gzhan yang mchod rten gsum bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-27: dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491a-28: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-0: 'jig rten du bcas pas @491b skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa na sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du stobs bcu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-6: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-8: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-9: tshangs pa'i dbyangs rnam pa brgyad kyis khams gsum du bsgrags pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-10: kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis lam rgyud drug snang ba mdzad nas sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-11: la la ni 'bras bu bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-12: theg pa gnyis la spyod par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-13: la la ni zag pa med pa 'dus ma byas pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-14: la la ni mi 'gog pa mi skye ba'i byang chub kyi sa non par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-15: la la ni tshad med pa'i gzungs rnams thob par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-16: la la ni spyan lnga dang mngon par shes pa drug thob par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-17: la la ni ngan song gsum las thar bar gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-18: la la ni mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-19: la la ni lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:491b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'i shugs rnam par dag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i chos kyi gzung bsam gyis @492a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-1: mi khyab pas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'jig rten du bcas pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-2: lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam pa bzhis rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas te ring bsrel la mchod na bsod nams chen po thob cing so so'i skye bo dag khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar cing yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba la 'jug par 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-3: de bas na sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-5: 'khor thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i drin chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-6: byams pa tshad ma mchis pa rjes su bzung ba'i slad du rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten bgyid cing ring bsrel la mchod pa bgyid pa ni 'os na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-8: mchod rten rnam pa gsum po bgyis pas sems can rnams la sman pa ci mchis na mchod rten bgyis shing mchod pa bgyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; rang sangs rgyas ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos shin tu zab mo rtogs nas srid pa thams cad las rnam par grol te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-10: nyes pa'i skyon thams cad bral nas lha dang mi'i bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492a-11: de bas na mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu 'gro ba mang po @492b 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-2: dgra bcom pa ni skye ba'i phyogs zad de srid pa phyi ma mi len la tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-3: de bas na mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams thob pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu de mang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-4: des kyang 'gro ba rnam par grol bar byed do; ;dga' bo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa las rnam par ma grol mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-6: bsod nams kyi shugs kyis gling bzhi la dbang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-7: dge ba bcu'i las kyis sems can gyi srid byed pas sems can de dag gi bkur sti'i gnas yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-8: de bas na 'khor rnam bzhis mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-11: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas bdag cag 'khor rnam bzhis gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel thob par 'gyur ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:492b-15: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'khor rnam bzhis gal te rtsa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang du nga bsregs na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-0: grong khyer de'i mi dag rgyal po'i las kyi chad pa dang @493a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-1: rtsod pa tshad med pa 'byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-2: thams cad kyis bsod nams mnyam par mi thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-4: gal te 'khor rnam bzhi'i grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu nga bsregs na 'jig rten pa dag bsod nams mnyam par thob bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-7: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhen pa'i 'og tu 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-8: rin po che'i bum par stsal nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gang du brtsig na thams cad dad pa'i sems skye zhing mchod par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-10: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te bsregs nas 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-11: rin po che sna bdun gyi bum par chug la rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang du lam gyi bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten bang rim bcu gsum dang ldan pa; phang lo dang bcas pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan cing spras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-12: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchog tu bya ba'i ba dan gyis shin tu brgyan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-13: ngos bzhi'i bu shu'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-14: thams cad du rgyan gyis rab tu spras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493a-15: mchod rten de rim pa gcig cing yang ngos bzhir sgo re re btod pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-0: skar khung thad kar 'bab pa'i nang @493b du rin po che chen po'i bum pa bcug ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni rim pa bcu gcig dang ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-4: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-6: dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten ni rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-7: de'ang rin po che sna tshogs kyis spra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-9: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten yang rin po che sna bdun las byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-10: rim pa dang bcas pa ni ma yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-12: khams gsum gyi srid pa'i sdug bsngal las ma grol ba'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-13: de'i tshe ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-14: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te zhugs la bzhen nas lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-16: 'khor rnam bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ji ltar bgos na thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-17: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-18: nga mya ngan las 'das nas lha dang mi la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel bsdus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-19: shin tu mnyam pa'i sems kyis khams gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-20: rgyu drug thams cad la'ang bgos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-21: mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:493b-22: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-0: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa @494a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-1: las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi phyed gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-3: de bas na khyod ring bsrel gyi phyed 'dod do zhes ma zer cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-5: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don snyoms par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-7: ngas khyod la 'gram pa g-yas pa'i tshems mche ba gcig sbyin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-8: khyod kyis lha'i 'jig rten du mchod rten byos la mchod cig dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-9: khyod kyis bsod nams zad mi shes pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-10: de'i tshe lha dang mi thams cad cho nges 'debs shing ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-12: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' ba la lha dang mi la sogs pa khyed mya ngan ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-14: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang ring bsrel rtag tu mchod du yod la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-15: gzhan yang bla na med pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog mdo sde dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-18: de bas na dkon mchog gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494a-19: bden pa bzhi rtag tu 'jig rten na yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-0: sems can dag @494b dad pas mchod pa'i gnas yod pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-2: ring bsrel la mchod pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog mchod pa yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-3: sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos kyi sku mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-4: chos mthong ba des ni 'phags pa mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-5: 'phags pa mthong ba des ni bden pa bzhi mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-6: bden pa bzhi mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-7: de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa gnas pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-8: 'jig rten gyi gnas dang rten du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-10: khyed sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par 'gyur ba'i mya ngan chen po ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-11: nga ni mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-19: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis las the tshom du gyur pa yod na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-21: 'dri ba 'di ni tha mar 'dri ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-22: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'gyod pa med par bya'o zhes lan gsum gyi bar du bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-23: de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi la sogs pa mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:494b-24: skad brnangs nas yi chad pa tsam du yid la gcags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-0: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis mchi ma phyis @495a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-1: nas cang mi smra ste zhu ba'ang med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-3: 'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad ni tshul khrims dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-6: bden pa bzhi mngon sum du rtogs te the tshom med par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-7: de tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po la the tshom med par thugs kyis mkhyen nas legs so; ;shin tu legs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-8: 'khor bzhi po khyed dkon mchog gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-9: bden pa bzhi shin tu rtogs te the tshom med pa ni ji ltar chu dang pas dri ma bkrus pa dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-10: khyed kyang brtson 'grus kyis shig dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-11: myur du 'byung ba'i lam thob par 'gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-12: brgyal ba tsam du mya ngan ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-13: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs bzhin du gser lta bu la phyag gis na bza' sbyar ma bzhag nas gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i seng ge'i thong ga dpal be'u phyung ste 'khor mang po rnams la bstan nas lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-14: mi dang; 'khor mang po rnams la nga'i sku kha dog gser btso ma lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495a-15: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo; bam po lnga bcu lnga pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-0: thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la mig mi 'dzum pas bltas pas rab @495b tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge slong dag bsam gtan gsum pa la reg pa dang 'dra bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-1: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po la bstan nas; mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i 'od zer tshad med dpag tu med pa khrag khrig brgyad stong snyed bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis non te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-2: de ltar 'od bkye nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyed kyi phyir bskal pa bgrang yas pa'i bar du shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-4: lus kyi yan lag lag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-5: rkang pa'ang gtubs nas shin tu spyod dka' ba thams cad spyad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-6: snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi dbang gi rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-7: rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig pa'i gser btso ma'i kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-8: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa tshad med pa'i 'od zer gyis thams cad du snang bar byas pa thob ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-10: sku mthong ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par ma grol ba med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:495b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-1: pa shin tu dka' ba ni me tog au dumba ra dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-3: khyed kyis nang gi tha mar nga'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ba 'di la don med par mi bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-4: sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rnyog pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-5: da ni gdul ba'i mdzad ba mdzad nas nga mya ngan 'dar nye'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-6: khyed la sogs pa sems rtse gcig tu nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la shin tu ltos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-7: khyed kyang yongs su dag pa'i las la nan tan byas na 'bras bu 'di thob par 'gyur ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-8: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yang dang yang lan gsum gyi bar du bka' stsal nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-9: gser btso ma lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po rnams la mngon du bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-10: de nas rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri las bzhengs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-11: steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-12: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-13: khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496a-14: de bzhin du mthar gyis shing ta la gcig srid du 'phags nas da ni mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-0: khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams bsam pa shin tu dags pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces lan bdun gyi bar du @496b bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-1: de nas nam mkha' las babs te seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas yang 'khor mang po rnams la nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-2: khyed la sogs pa bsam pa shin tu dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-3: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri las bzhengs nas steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la gcig srid du 'phags nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-4: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-6: de bzhin du shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas lan bdun gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-7: khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-8: de nas nam mkha' las phyir babs nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:496b-9: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das yang seng ge'i khri las bzhengs nas steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la gcig gi srid du 'phags nas 'khor mang po rnams la @497a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-2: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /

K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-5: khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces lan bdun gyi bar du bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-6: de nas yang nam mkha' las babs nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te; yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-7: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-8: khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu mngon par bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-10: 'khor mang po rnams la mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-11: de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-12: lan gsum gyi bar du nam mkha' las phyir babs nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497a-13: de bzhin du yang dang yang lan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar du 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-0: nga yongs su mya @497b ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-1: nga'i sku rdo rje lta bur brtan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-2: mi 'jig pa gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu 'jig pa med pa la ltos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-3: me tog au dumba ra ltar shin tu mthong dka' ba yin gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-4: khyed la sogs pas shes par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-5: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-6: khyed las sogs pa sems rtse gcig tu nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la shin tu ltos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-8: mi zhig tsha bas gdungs te shin tu skom pa chu grang mo 'thungs na ngoms par 'gyur ba las gzhan mi sems pa dang 'dra bar khyed la sogs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-9: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-10: khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas shin tu ltos shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-11: 'di ni nang gi tha mar mthong ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-12: mthong ba 'di las phyin chad mthong ba'i dus med kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-13: khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams phyin chad 'gyod pa med par lta bas ngoms par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-15: nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams srid ba gsum la myur du 'da' ba'i phyir rgyas par nan tan du spyod pa la le lo med par bag yod gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:497b-16: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-0: 'khor rnam pa bzhi la sogs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i @498a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-1: 'od kyis reg nas sangs rgyas la lta ba thams cad kyi ngan song gsum dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-6: mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang ste rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-7: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i sku phyung ste yang dang yang ltos shig ces /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-8: 'khor mang po'i rnams la bka' stsal nas slar chos gos sbyar ma sku la gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-9: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-10: bstan pa gzhag pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-12: nga ni da dus la bab ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-13: sku kun tu gtse zhing na'o zhes bka' stsal nas bsam gtan dang po la 'jug cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kun brtags te zhi zhing 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-14: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de skad gsungs ma thag tu bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-15: bsam gtan dang po las byung nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498a-16: bsam gtan gnyis pa las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-0: @498b bsam gtan gsum pa las byung nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-1: bsam gtan bzhi pa las byung nas nam mkha' yas skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-2: nam mkha' yas skye mched steng las byung nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-3: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched steng las byung nas cung zad med min skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-4: cung zad med min skye mched steng las byung nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-5: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng las byung nas 'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-6: 'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung nas phyir yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-7: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng las byung nas phyir yang cung zad med min skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-8: cung zad med min skye mched steng las byung nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched steng la zhugs pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-9: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched steng las byung nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched steng la zhugs pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:498b-10: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched steng las byung nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-0: bsam gtan bzhi pa las byung nas bsam gtan @499a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-2: bsam gtan gsum pa las byung nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-3: bsam gtan gnyis pa las byung nas bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-4: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar yan man du bsam gtan du zhugs nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-5: ngas shin tu zab pa'i shes rab kyis khams gsum gyi rgyud drug gi sems can thams cad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-8: sa chen po la gnas pa'i srog chags thams cad la brtags na khams gsum 'di dag ni rang bzhin dang bral ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-10: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang 'dra bas gdags su med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-11: rnam par shes pa med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-12: srid pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-14: mtho dman gyi 'du shes med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-20: rnam par grol ba med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-28: 'jig rten ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-29: mya ngan las 'da' ba dang 'khor ba dmigs su med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499a-30: gnyis ka'i mtha' mnyam pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-3: nges par dmigs su med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-4: mi gnas pa'i chos las chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi bya ba byed pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-5: mtshan ma thams cad yongs su bcad nas ci'ang med pa ste; chos kyi mtshan nyid ni de dag yin no //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-6: gang gis de ltar shes na 'jig rten las 'da' ba zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-7: gang gis de ltar mi shes pa de ni 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-8: de bas na khyed la sogs pa ma rig pa yongs su bcad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-9: 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' dgag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-11: yang 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-12: bsam gtan dang po las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-13: bsam gtan gsum pa las byung nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-14: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched steng las byung nas cung zad med min skye mched steng la zhugs so; ;cung zad med min skye mched steng las byung nas 'gog pa zad pa'i 'du shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-15: 'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung nas phyir yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:499b-16: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng las byung nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched steng la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-1: yas skye mched steng las byung nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-2: bsam gtan bzhi pa las byung nas bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs so; ;bsam gtan gsum pa las byung nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-3: bsam gtan gnyis pa las byung nas bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-4: de ltar na yan man du 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-5: ngas shes rab chen pos khams gsum na gnas pa ji tsam srog yod pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-8: chos thams cad la brtags na thams cad mthar phyin pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-9: rnam par bcings pa med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-10: rnam par grol ba med pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-14: khams gsum las 'das pa'ang ma yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-15: srid pa kun tu 'jug pa'ang ma yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-16: thog ma nas rnam par dag pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-21: mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-23: rnam par rtog pa zad pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-24: rtog pa thams cad zhi pa ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-25: de ltar chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500a-26: chos 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong na rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-0: bus ba ma rabs kyis mi mthong bas na ma rig @500b pa zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal nas phyir yang 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-2: bsam gtan dang po las byung nas 'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-3: 'gog pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba nas bsam gtan dang po la 'jug pa'i bar du de bzhin du yan man 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-4: yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-5: ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos thams cad la brtags na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-6: ma rig pa'i thog ma'i mtha' ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-7: phyogs bcur btsal kyang dmigs su med pa ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-8: de'i rgyur 'gyur ba yal ga dang lo ma'ang rnam par grol ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-9: ma rig pa rnam par grol bas rga shi'i bar du'ang rnam par grol lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-10: de bas na nga ni rtag tu rab tu zhi ba'i snang ba la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-11: de'i tshe dga' bo mya ngan gyis shin tu yid gdungs te; myos 'khrugs nas mi dran pa ni ji ltar chang gis myos pa dang 'dra ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-12: 'khor rnam bzhi'ang mi mthong mi shes la /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:500b-14: mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi shes mi rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-0: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du 'phar ba'i bsam gtan la zhugs te chos kyi dbyings la thug gi bar du brtags nas @501a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-1: 'khor mang po rnams la lan gsum du chos bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin du yang dang yang lan nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan du zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-3: dga' bos mi shes pas sangs rgyas lan gcig bsam gtan du 'jug pa na lan gcig dris te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-4: de bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-5: mya ngan las ma 'das zhes ma 'gags pa la dris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-6: de bzhin du ma 'gags pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan du zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-7: mya ngan las ma 'das so zhes lan nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-8: de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad 'khrug cing myos pas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-10: mya ngan las ma 'das mi shes mi rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-11: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das lan gsum gyi bar du bsam gtan du zhugs nas lan gsum gyi bar du 'khor rnams la chos bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-12: rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la glo g-yas pa phab nas gzims te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-13: dbu ni byang phyogs su bstan /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-14: zhabs ni lho phyogs su bstan /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-15: zhal ni nub phyogs su gzigs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-16: rgyab ni shar phyogs su bstan nas gzims so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501a-17: rin po che sna bdun gyi khri'ang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-0: snga la'i shing zung @501b bzhi ya brgyad yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-1: nub phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-2: shar phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyab /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-3: byang phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu rol /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-4: lho phyogs kyi zung gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs rol lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shing s'a la'i drung na rin po che'i khri la gzims nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-6: cang mi gsung zhing nam gyi dgung la yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas s'a la'i shing shar dang nub kyi zung gnyis kyang shing gcig tu gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-8: lho dang byang gi zung gnyis kyang shing gcig tu gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-9: rin po che'i khri la gdugs lta bur gyur nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-10: de'i tshe shing de nyid kyang ngang pa'i gshog pa ltar skya bor gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-16: shing nyid kyang gas nas mthar gyis bskams te lhag ma ma lus par chag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-17: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig klung gang+g'a'i bye ma snyed kyi sa chen po shin tu g-yos nas skad chen po rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:501b-20: 'jig rten stongs so zhes mi rtag pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-2: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri btang zung dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-3: ri btang zung chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-4: ri kho ra khor yug dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-5: ri kho ra khor yug chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-11: sa chen po la gnas pa'i ri thams cad dus gcig tu sgra byung nas thams cad rdib ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-12: skad chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su grags pa las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-15: nang gcig tu 'jig rten la mgon med par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-16: shes rab kyi nyi ma nub nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ri 'gyel to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-17: sems can thams cad kyi byams pa'i yab yang dag par 'das te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-18: mchod pa bya ba'i lha'ang mi mthong bar gyur to zhes grags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-19: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po'ang 'khrug cing khol te rnyog par gyur /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-20: dpa' rlabs drag po las skad rnam pa sna tshogs grags pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das nas sems can gyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa dang sdug bsngal ni srid pa'i gangs chen mtshor 'khor zhing 'bab par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502a-24: yang dag pa'i lam stor na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-0: nam zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhes grags @502b par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-9: khron pa thams cad kyang 'bo zhing chu bskams par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-10: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-11: nam mkha'i khams kyang mun pa chen por gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-12: nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-13: de ma thag tu rlung nag po g-yos nas skad chen po phyung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-14: rdul dang bye mas 'tshubs par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-15: de'i tshe sa chen po las skyes pa'i shing gel ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-17: rtsi shing la sogs pa'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-20: yal ga thams cad kyang chag nas sa la lhags te lhag ma tsam yang ma lus par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-21: de nas de ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha thams cad kyang steng gi nam mkha' la shin tu mi dga' bas dus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-22: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rab tu g-yos nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-23: lha'i spos brgya stong grangs med pa char bzhin du phab nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab lhun po tsam du spungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:502b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-0: steng gi nam mkha' la gzhan @503a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-1: yang grangs med pa'i lha'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-5: lha'i nor bu rin po che char bzhin du phab pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-6: rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs mar gyur nas ngos bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng bas shin tu brgyan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-7: me tog gi 'od dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-8: steng gi nam mkha' la gzhan yang lha'i rol mo rnga dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-10: glu rnam pa mang po las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-13: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pas 'jig rten stongs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-14: sems can gyi mig ldongs pas nyon mongs pa'i srin mo dar te sdug bsngal gyi 'du byed rgyun mi 'chad pas na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyun du 'khor ro zhes grags so //
