K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-15: de'i tshe dga' bo sems 'khrugs te myos brgyal nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-16: mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi rtogs mi shes kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams sngon las gyur ba 'ba' zhig mthong nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes ma 'gags pa la dris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-0: de'i tshe dga' mos de skad ces smras pa thos nas sa la brgyal te ro bzhin du gyur @503b nas dbugs kyang mi rgyu ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-2: de nas ma 'gags pas dga' bo'i gdong la chu grang mos btab nas bslang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-3: de nas thabs mkhas pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-6: mya ngan chen po ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-9: mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis bzhugs su gsol kyang ma gnang gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-10: mya ngan chen pos sems 'khrugs par ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-15: nang gcig tu lha dang mi'i ston pa mdzad pa'i mthar phyin nas bzhugs su ma gnang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-16: da bdag cag re zhig mya ngan bsang ngo zhes spro ba bskyed nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-17: dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-18: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das mod kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-20: bla na med pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog 'jig rten na rtag tu bzhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-23: de bas na bdag cag gis brtson 'grus su sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog sems can la byin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-24: sdug bsngal las rnam par bsgral bas sangs rgyas kyi drin la lan glan par bya'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-25: de'i tshe dga' bo spro ba bskyed pa thos nas bgas kyis sangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:503b-26: skad brnangs ba tsam du mchi ma blags nas mya ngan gyis non to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-1: gi grong khyer shing s'a la'i tshal kho ra khor yug dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang lha dang mis yongs su gang ba ni khab kyi rtse mo tsam la'ang sems can tshad med pa snyed yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-2: bar nas stong pa med kyang gcig la gcig mi bde zhing phan tshun gnon par 'gyur ba med do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-3: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig grangs med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-4: 'khor mang po thams cad mi dran te brgyal nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das sam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-5: mya ngan las ma 'das pa mi rtogs mi shes kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-6: sngon dang mi 'dra bar ldeg cing g-yo ba 'ba' zhig mthong nas thams cad kyis ma 'gags pa la sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes dris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-7: de nas ma 'gags pas 'khor mang po rnams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-8: 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-9: de nas 'khor grangs med pa thams cad kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas thams cad brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-10: sdug bsngal gyis shin tu gdungs pas skad kyang mi phyin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-11: la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zham ring du thal gyur shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-12: la la ni sems stong par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504a-13: la la ni lus dang sems shin tu 'bar bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-0: la la ni gcig gi lag pa la gcig 'jus te skad @504b ba rnangs pa tsam du mchi ma blags nas dus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-1: la la ni brang la khu tshur gyis brdeg cing skad chen pos 'bod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-2: la la ni mgo la thal mos rdebs shing rang gi skra 'bal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-6: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-7: la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa ha cang yang snga ches so zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-8: la la ni bdag cag gi lha stor to zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-9: la la ni 'jig rten stong te sems can gyi mig ldongs so zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-10: la la ni nyon mongs pa'i srin mo mngon du byung ngo zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-11: la la ni sems can gyi dge ba'i myu gu dang sa bon 'gags so zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-12: la la ni bdud kyi sde rnams dga' ste go cha'ang phud do zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-13: la la ni bdag gi lus 'di mi rtag go zhes smod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-14: la la ni yang dag par spyod pas rnam par grol bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-15: la la ni mgon dang skyabs med par gyur to zhes smra'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-16: la la ni lus las khrag mngon du zag cing sa la 'bab par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-17: de'i tshe rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgra skad chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams kun g-yos par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-18: de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po'ang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:504b-19: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes nas lha'i 'khor dang bcas te bsam gtan dang po nas babs nas skad chen pos ngus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-1: gshegs pa'i spyan sngar brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-2: ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-3: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces dus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-4: bcom ldan 'das ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-5: bdag cag phyir du mi mjed 'jig rten gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-6: tshad med dbang du 'gyur ba'i mthu bcas nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-7: phongs pa chos 'dod 'gro ba rnams kyang btul //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-8: mkhas pa'i thabs kyis ci rigs chos bstan nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-9: sems can mi bder 'gyur ba gang yang med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-10: srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal las bton te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-11: mthar phyin mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam la bkod //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-12: bcom ldan sems can rnams la byams pa'i yum //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-13: sems can kun la snying brtse zho blud pa //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-14: ji ste thams cad nang gcig rab spangs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-15: lha mi phongs pa'i mgon ma mchis par mdzad //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-16: kyi hud 'gro ba'i dge ba'i myu gu yang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-17: skye ba'i chu ni 'bab pa'i dus ma mchis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-18: dge ba'i myu gu khad kyis 'gags nas su //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-19: sdug pa'i las kyis bsdus nas ngan song 'gro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-20: 'jig rten stongs so da ni ji ltar bgyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-21: sems can yang dag par shes rab mi ldong so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-22: ma rig mun pa 'thom zhing 'gro bas na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-23: srid pa gsum du ltung zhing 'khor bar gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505a-24: sems can sdig pa mgon med ji ltar bgyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-0: @505b ring bsrel dag la brten nas grol bar shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-1: de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba'i snying rje'i mthus //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-2: sdug bsngal las ni grol ba'i skyabs su shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-3: kyi hud ji ltar 'jig rten ngan pa 'dir //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-4: bcom ldan bdag cag spangs nas mya ngan 'da'//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-5: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas te steng gi nam mkha' las babs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-7: kyi hud ces skad chen po phyung ste dus nas mchi ma blags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-9: de nas ring zhig lon pa dang gdong phyir sangs te mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-10: bcom ldan bskal par dka' ba mdzad pa ni /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-11: bdag dang 'gro ba rnams kyi slad du ste //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-12: bla na med pa'i byang chub rab brnyes nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-13: 'gro ba kun la bu gcig bzhin du gso //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-14: chos sbyin sman ni sman gyi nang na mchog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-15: nad gso sman pa'i nang na sman pa gtso //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-16: thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis kun bskyabs nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-17: bdud rtsi shes rab char ni kun la phab //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-18: shes rab nyi ma'i 'od kyis ma rig mun pa sel //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-19: ma rig sems can 'phags pa'i lam yang mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-20: 'phags pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis rgyud drug snang mdzad nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:505b-21: srid pa rnam gsum 'od kyis seg nas rnam par grol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-0: ci yi slad du byams pa chen po'i thugs @506a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-2: mya ngan 'das so mi mthong ji ltar bgyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-3: sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i yi dam ga re na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-4: mchil ma bzhin du sems can yongs su spangs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-5: bdag la sogs de sems can thams cad ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-6: ji ltar be'u dag mas bor nges par 'chi ba bzhin //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-7: 'khor bzhi gcig gi lag la gcig 'jus nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-8: brang brdung ngu ba'i skad kyis 'jig rten gsum yang g-yos //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-9: kyi hud kyi hud srid par 'khor ba 'di thams cad //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-10: thams cad nang gcig tu ni skyabs ma mchis par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-11: re sdug bdag cag bsod nams zad pa rnams /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-12: dge ba'i myu gu tshig pa rlan pa'i dus ma mchis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-13: chos kyi dkon mchog ring bsrel 'od zer gyis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-14: snang bar mdzad cing srid pa gsum las grol bar shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-15: kyi hud shin tu sdug go bdag cag rnams //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-16: nam zhig slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-17: de'i tshe ma 'gags pa'ang mya ngan gyis gdungs te dus nas lus kyang 'dar bar gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-18: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pus mo btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bstod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-19: sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal pos bdag cag rab tu gsos //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-20: bdag cag chos kyi skom blud chos kyi sku yang bskyed //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506a-21: sems can chos kyi sku yang mngon par ma grub cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-0: shes rab 'tsho ba'i @506b tshogs kyang yong ma bsags //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-1: rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan cing //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-2: 'khor rnams thos nas byang chub rtogs par mdzad pa'i rigs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-3: rtag tu byams chen kha dog lnga yid 'od bkye zhing //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-4: 'khor rnams 'od kyis reg nas rnam par grol bar mdzed //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-5: ci yi slad du yongs su mya ngan 'das gshegs nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-6: sdug bsngal spyod pa'i sems can ci la 'jug par bgyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-7: kyi hud bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po spangs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-8: bdag cag mgon ma mchis pas nges par 'chi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs su bstan par 'tshal mod kyi; ;bdag cag mya ngan mi bgyid pa yi gtol ma mchis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-10: 'khor bzhi myos shing 'khrugs te brgyal nas sems kyang stor //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-11: du ba'i skad kyis gnam sa 'jig rten gsum yang mgul //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-12: bcom ldan nyag gcig bde ba chen po la bzhugs na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-13: 'gro ba mang po'i sdug bsngal chen po ji ltar bgyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-14: bcom ldan 'das pa'i dus na bdag cag rnams kyi phyir //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-15: bskal pa mang por dbu dang phyag dang zhabs kyang btang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-16: bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-17: ring por mi bzhugs mya ngan las ni 'da' bar gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-18: bdag cag 'khor bzhi ma rig thibs por gnas pas na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-19: bdud kyi rgyal po dga' zhing spro bas go cha'ang bor //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:506b-20: kyi hud bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po yis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-1: pa'i 'od kyis bdag cag bskyabs par shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-2: 'khor bzhi po la bcom ldan thugs brtse'i phyir //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-3: chos kyi dkon mchog phan pa zad mi shes par shog ;bdag cag rnams ni 'phral du 'chi bar ma gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-4: 'tsho ba'i lhag ma 'di tsam gyis ni ci zhig nus //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-5: kyi hud shin tu sdug bsngal bzod par dka'//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-6: da ni slan chad bcom ldan mthong ba'i dus ma mchis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-7: de'i tshe dga' bo bags kyis sangs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-8: thal mo mgo la rdebs shing brang la khu tshur gyis brdebs nas skad brnangs shing sdug bsngal lus kyis mi bzod pa tsam du ngus nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pus mo btsugs te ngu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-9: bdag sngon bcom ldan 'das dang smon lam mthu gcig pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-10: mthun par gcig tu sh'akya'i rigs su skyes par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par byang chub sangs rgyas nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-12: bdag gis lo ni nyi shu lhag gcig g-yog kyang bgyis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-13: dad pa'i sems kyis bsnyen par bgyi ba ma ngoms bzhin //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-14: nang gcig bor nas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-15: kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-16: yun du sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang rab tu gzir //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507a-17: bdag gi lus kyang srid pa'i dra ba las ma grol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-0: ma @507b rig pa yi sgo nga las kyang phyir ma byung //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig sgo nga ma bcag par //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-2: ci yi slad du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-3: bdag ni gsar du btsas pa'i bu dang mtshungs pa la //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-4: ma yis bor na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'chi bar 'gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-5: ci yi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su spangs nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-6: nyag gcig khams gsum las ni 'das nas bde bar bzhugs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-7: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis 'gyod cing mthol ba ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-8: dgung lo nyi shu'i bar du zham ring 'tshal ba na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-9: spyod lam bzhi po le lo'i dbang du gyur pas na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-10: 'phags pa'i thugs dang 'gal zhing mnyes par ma bgyis pa //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-11: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po yis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-12: bdag la bdud rtsi stsal cing bde ba mdzad par shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-13: bdag gis phyi ma'i bskal pa mtha' yi bar du yang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-14: rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring byed par shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-15: bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-16: thams cad 'jig rten khams su bdag ni skyob par shog /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-17: kyi hud kyi hud tshig gis brjod mi nus //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-18: 'phags pa'i drin smrar skad kyang mi phyin to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:507b-19: de'i tshe klung gang+g'a grangs med pa bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-0: 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas shin tu ngu zhing cho nges 'don @508a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-1: pa las so so nas spro ba bskyed de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-2: ci nus kyis grangs med pa'i lha'i spos dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-3: lha'i me tog manda ra ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-4: manda ra ba chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-6: mnydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-7: grangs med pa'i lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgya mtsho ngos kyi tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-9: rna pa brgya stong snyed kyi spos sbyar ma dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-14: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-15: rin po che'i ba dan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-17: do shal nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-18: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-21: bu mo thams cad kyis kyang shin tu dus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-24: gdugs la sogs pa snga ma bas shin tu lhag par sbyar te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508a-26: de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi lha'i 'khor dang bcas te shin tu ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas sum 'gyur gyis lhag pa bshams nas ngus bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags te mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-0: gnam @508b rim pa lnga'i lhas kyang de bzhin du snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa bshams /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-2: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa bshams nas mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-3: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-4: bud med mchi ma blags te ngus nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-5: mngang ji ltar btang ba mi shes nas dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ji lta bu'i tshul du mdang gtang bar bgyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-7: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin du //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdang btang ba bzhin bya'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-9: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad 'dus te grong khyer du zhugs nas lcags kyi sgrom byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-10: rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-11: rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po bzang po yug stong dang grangs med pa'i shing bal shin tu 'jam pa'ang bshams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-12: gzhan yang grangs med pa'i shing tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-14: gzhan yang khri phrag brgya stong snyed kyi spos sbyar ma dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:508b-20: sprin ltar nam mkha' la yongs su gang ba mtho khyad ri rab lhun po tsam bshams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-1: nas mchi ma blags te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-2: mya ngan gyis yid gdungs bzhin du mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-3: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-4: 'khor mang po thams cad kyang mchi ma blags te ngus nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-5: gzhan yang tshad med pa snyed kyi spos dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-8: gdugs la sogs te mchod pa'i yo byad sprin lta bur nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bshams nas gcig gi lag pa la gcig 'jus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-9: brang la khu tshur gyis rdeg cing cho nge'i sgras stong chen po'ang g-yos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phab nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-11: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams skad brnangs pa tsam gyis ngus nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-12: bkur stir bya ba'i phyir so so nas ras dkar po'i sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bteg ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-13: lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du bcug nas mar bsung can gang bar blugs te; sgrom gyi kha bcad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-14: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi pho mos thams cad kyang bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-17: 'khor mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'degs su ma bcug gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509a-18: kun gyis bgros nas zla med pa'i gyad stobs po che bzhis 'de gas par byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-0: gyad bzhi pos gos @509b dang rgyan bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'degs pa'i phyir grong khyer gyi nang du 'ongs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-1: mchod pa byas nas mthu ci yod pas bteg kyang ma theg go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-2: de nas grong khyer de'i gyad stobs po che brgyad kyis pur sgrom 'degs par byas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-3: so so'i gos dang rgyan bkrol nas mchod pa byas te mthu ci yod pas rtsal kyang ma theg go //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-4: de nas grong khyer de'i stobs po che bcu drug gis 'degs par byas te gos dang rgyan bkrol nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-5: sangs rgyas kyi sgrom 'degs par rtsal kyang theg par ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-6: de'i tshe ma 'gags pas stobs po che rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-7: ji ste grong khyer 'di'i nang gi skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-10: bu mo thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar rtsol yang mi theg na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-11: khyed 'ba' zhig gis mi theg pa lta ci smos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-12: khyed rnams kyis 'khor mang po dang lha rnams kyi stobs kyis bstang bar gsol te sgrom ba teg na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-13: grong khyer du bkur nus par 'gyur ro zhes ma 'gags pas smras ma thag tu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-14: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dam pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:509b-15: grangs med pa'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-1: te shin tu ngus nas nam mkha' las 'phags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-2: 'phags pa'i bur sgrom la mchod pa byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-3: gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-4: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar pur sgrom la mchod pa byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kun la thugs rjes khyab par mdzad cing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-6: 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyi mnyam par bsod nams khyad par med par mdzad pa'i phyir shing s'a la'i tshal nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-7: bur sgrom shing ta la gcig gi srid du steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas gshegs par gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-8: rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-9: 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-11: 'khor thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgrom bteg par ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-12: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'khor rnams dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-13: rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs chen po rin po che'i ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi do shal gyis ngos bzhi brgyan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-14: steng gi nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrom khebs par byas nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510a-21: dar gyi lda ldi sna tshogs kyis nam mkha' la mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-0: gnam @510b rim pa drug gi bar gyi lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-1: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang mchod pa'i yo byad brgya byin pas lhag par bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur sgrom la mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-2: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas brang brdungs te skad chen po phyung nas dus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-4: de'i tshe lha dang mi thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-9: dar gyi lnga ldi rnam pa mang po sprin bzhin du nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar byas te shin tu ngus nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom la mchod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-11: thams cad skad mthun par kyi hud /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-13: bdag cag la bsod nams ma mchis pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom ma theg ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-14: bdag cag la mgon skyabs ma mchis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal pa ma mchis so zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gser gyi pur sgrom shing s'a la'i tshal gyi nam mkha' las dal gyis gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:510b-17: rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi nub sgor zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-0: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen ma thams @511a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-6: 'khor mang pos steng gi nam mkha' dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-7: sa la yongs su gang bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom gyi phyi bzhin dong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-8: gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'ju zhing skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas brang la khu tshur gyis brdegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-9: so so nas grangs med pa'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-11: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-14: nam mkha' yang yongs su gang bar bshams te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom la mchod par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-16: rtsva mchog gi grong khyer ni ngos gcig kyang dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-17: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom steng gi nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-18: rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi shar sgo nas byung nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-19: g-yas phyogs nas 'khor te grong khyer gyi lho sgor zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-20: de nas bags kyis nam mkha' la gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-21: byang sgo nas g-yas phyogs su 'khor te nub sgor zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-22: de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du bskor nas steng gi nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511a-23: phyir yang nub sgor zhugs nas shar sgor byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-0: g-yas @511b nas bskor nas byang sgor zhugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-1: de nas yang nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-2: lho sgor byung nas g-yas nas bskor te byang sgor zhugs nas lan bzhi bskor to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-3: de bzhin du g-yas phyogs nas grong khyer rtsva mchog lan bdun gyi bar du bskor te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-4: de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun gyi pur sgrom grong khyer gyi nang du zhugs pa na 'khor mang po thams cad mchi ma blags te ngus nas so so nas grangs med pa'i spos kyi shing tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-5: rin po che'i spos kyi shing ri mo dang bsung du ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun bro bar byed pa thogs shing gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-10: do shal grangs med pa bshams te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdad mdzad pa'i gnas su mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-12: de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po chen po dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-13: lha'i 'khor dang bcas te ngus nas lha rdzas kyi tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-14: aa ka ru phyi nang kun bsung dang ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-15: bsung gis mdad pa sngoms shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam lnga brgya dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-16: de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i spos dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-17: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-18: rin po che'i gdugs dam pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-19: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa bshams te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-20: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mdad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:511b-21: gnam rim pa gnyis kyi lhas ni shing stong bshams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-1: pa gsum pa'i lhas ni shing nyis stong bshams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-2: rim pa bzhi pa'i lhas ni shing sum stong bshams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-3: rim pa lnga pa'i lhas ni shing bzhi stong bshams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-4: rim pa drug pa'i lhas ni shing lnga stong snyed bshams te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-5: so so nas ba dan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-6: me tog la sogs pa thogs te dus nas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mdad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-7: de'i tshe gzugs yod pa'i khams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-8: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams ni spos dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-10: mdad mdzad pa'i gnas su lhags nas mchod pa byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-11: de nas 'jig rten du bcas pa 'khor mang po rnams kyang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-12: so so nas spos tsandan gyi shing dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-17: gdugs la sogs pa thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-18: ngus nas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mdad kyi gnas su lhags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-19: de'i tshe ma 'gags pa mig mchi mas gang ste drag tu dus nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-20: lha dang mi rnams las shing tsandan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-21: aa ga ru drug stong snyed ri mo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-23: kun tu shin tu mdad pa bslangs nas mdad kyi gnas su bzhag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-24: mtsho ma dros pa ngos bzhi chu zheng gab pa dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512a-25: gtsang po chen po bzhi 'bab bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-0: bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas @512b pa na gtsang po gangg'a'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram na tsandan gyi shing drung gcig skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-1: sboms khyad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam la gnam 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-2: bsung shin tu mdad pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-3: shing de'i lha yang shing de dang cig car skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-4: rtag tu spos des sangs rgyas kun la mchod par byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-5: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa na tsandan gyi shing de'ang lo ma dang shun pa lhags nas bskams te shing gi lha yang der shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-6: de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis shing de blangs nas mdad kyi gnas su bskyal te mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-7: sa gzhi de ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdad kyi gnas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus gnas de nyid du mdad mdzad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-9: gnas de na sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rin po che'i mchod rten yang grangs med pa zhig yod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-10: gnas de ni rdo rje ltar mi 'jig cing shin tu brtan pa'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-11: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom nam mkha' la dal gyis gshegs te mdad kyi gnas su phyin pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-12: bags kyis je dma' je dma' nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dar gyi lda ldi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-13: do shal yongs su brgyan pa la gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-14: de nas de'i bar du zhag bdun 'das so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:512b-15: de'i tshe rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-1: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-3: sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha thams cad mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te rab tu dus nas ba dan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-5: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-7: me tog la sogs pa thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-8: sangs rgyas kyi pur sgrom gyi phyi bzhin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'brang yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lha dang mi thams cad la skom pa dang bkres pa'i 'du shes med de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i phyir du ba 'ba' zhig byed do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur de ltar zhag bdun lon nas sgrom gyi nang nas phyir dbyung ba na rtsva mchog gi grong khyer gyi skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-12: 'khor grangs med pa tham cad kyis ngus pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g-yos nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-17: grangs med pa'i lha'i rol mo mang pos sangs rgyas kyi pur la dus te mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-18: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams mchi ma blags nas ras dkar po 'jam pos lag pa dkris te bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rin po che'i sgrom nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog dang ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-19: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513a-20: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-0: rdo rje ltar mi @513b 'jig pa'i chos can dal gyis phyung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-1: rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la bzhag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-2: de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams shin tu dus pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun g-yos par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-6: rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-7: des 'khor mang po rnams du zhing mchi ma blags nas so so nas spos chu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-8: byug spos grangs med pa snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-9: dbe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-10: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-11: rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-12: gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-13: dbu dang zhabs kyi bar du bkrus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-14: de nas rin po che'i sgrom yang yongs su dag par bkrus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-15: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu dus te mchi ma blags nas lha'i spos dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-16: rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis gtor nas grangs med pa'i rin po che rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-18: ba dan nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bas mchod pa byas nas ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:513b-19: de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus bzhin du grangs med pa'i shing bal thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma lta bu dkris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-0: de ltar shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du rin thang med pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis de bzhin @514a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-2: de ltar dkris nas 'khor mang po rnams brgyal ba tsa ma du shin tu ngus nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-3: gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-5: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-7: lha'i rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas te ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-8: de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus bzhin du so so nas ras dkar po sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bteg nas rin po che'i sgrom gyi nang du bcug ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-9: mar bsung can gyis bkang nas sgrom gyi kha bcad do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-10: de nas 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngu ba'i sgra 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu grags par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-15: rol mo la sogs pas rin po che'i sgrom la mchod nas ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-16: de nas 'khor mang po thams cad kyis bsags pa'i spos kyi shing dri bsung shin tu mdad pa ri rab lhun po tsam brtsigs te bcer ba spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa lta bur gyur nas ngos bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan cing gdugs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514a-22: dar gyi lda ldi sprin lta bur nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba tsam gyis brgyan nas lha'i rol mo'i mchod pa byas so ////
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-0: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das @514b pa chen po'i mdo /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-1: bam po lnga bcu drug pa ste tha ma /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-4: 'khor rnams kyis pur sgrom bteg ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-5: spos kyi khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du bzhag pa na shin tu skad chen po phyung ste brang brdungs nas ngus pa'i sgra chen pos stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags shing g-yos par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-6: gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-9: lha'i rol mos mchod nas ngus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-10: de nas bsti stang bya ba'i phyir so so nas ras dkar po'i sleb mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom bteg ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-11: shin tu brgyan pa'i spos kyi shing gi steng du bzhag nas cho nges 'don zhing brgyal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-12: de nas phyir sangs nas 'di skad du /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-15: 'jig rten na mgon dang skyabs med par gyur to zhes smras nas mchi ma blags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-18: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-21: lha'i rol mos mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom spos kyi shing gi steng du bzhag ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-23: me gtong ba na 'khor mang po thams cad shin tu ngus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-24: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:514b-25: ngus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom de la mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-0: de nas 'khor mang po rnams ngus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi spos kyi sgron me shing rta'i 'khor @515a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-1: lo tsam 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas thams cad dus gcig tu skad chen po phyung ste ngus pas stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g-yos nas me tog dang spos kyis yongs su mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-2: de'i tshe rin po che'i sgron me spos kyi shing brtsigs pa'i drung du phyin ma thag tu rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-3: de nas lha thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-4: me'i 'od kyis kun tu snang bar byas nas ngus bzhin du spos kyi shing brtsigs pa'i drung du phyin ma thag tu me de'ang rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-5: de nas rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad kyang rgya mtsho'i nang gi me rin po che sna bdun gyi sgron me'i 'od zer grangs med pa dang ldan pa thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-6: spos kyi shing brtsigs pa la bsregs na me de'ang rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-7: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams shin tu ngus nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa ci'i mthar mkhyen na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-9: spos kyi shing la me mched du ma btub pa ma rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun la khyab pa 'od srung gi 'khor la gzhes te gdod zhugs kyis bzhen to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515a-11: de'i tshen 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la 'khod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-0: ri de rtsva mchog grong khyer nas dpag tshad lnga @515b bcu yod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-1: de na lus dang sems rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa las dngangs nas lus kyang 'dar zhing g-yos so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-2: de nas ting nge 'dzin las byung ste bltas na sa dang ri kun rab tu g-yos pa mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das par shes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-3: 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-4: nga'i ston pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun lon te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-5: sgrom gyi nang du'ang bcug go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-8: myur du de gzhin gshegs pa gang na bar dong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-9: gal te zhugs la bzhen par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-10: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan pa yongs su dag pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-11: rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la ma song gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-12: 'khor dang bcas te lam du zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar myur du dus bzhin du song nas zhag bdun gyis rtsva mchog gi grong khyer du phyin to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-13: grong khyer gyi shar sgor bram ze zhig lha'i me tog gcig thogs te 'ongs pa dang phrad nas 'od srung gis de la kye ga las 'ongs zhes dris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:515b-15: bdag sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas nas 'ongs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-0: 'od srung gis me tog 'di dag ga las @516a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-1: rnyed ces dris na zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su lha'i me tog 'di rnyed do zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-2: 'od srung gis me tog 'di kho bo bslang ngo zhes smras na mi rung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-3: bdag 'di gnyen pa rnams bsten cing khyim du mchod pa byar 'gro'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-4: 'od srung gis cung blta'o zhes smras nas lag gis blangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-5: spyi bo la bzhag ma thag der brgyal te sa la 'gyel to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-6: ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas ngus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-8: gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu de phyin chad mi mthong ngo zhes smras nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-9: 'khor dang bcas te grong khyer rtsva mchog gi byang sgor zhugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-10: grong khyer gyi nang du phyin nas dge slong gi gnas shig tu zhugs nas dge slong dag cig 'dus shing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-11: dge slong de dag gis 'od srung la khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs na nyon mongs shing mi bde bar ma gyur tam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-12: bde bar 'dug la bsod snyoms sdod cig ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-14: kho bo'i ston pa chen po mya ngan las 'das na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-15: bdag brod pa ci zhig yod de; 'dir bde bar 'dug cing bsod snyoms bsdad du rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-16: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516a-17: khyod kyi ston pa su yin /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-0: kyi @516b hud; bdag gi ston pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-1: da yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-2: dge slong rnams kyis de skad ces thos nas so so nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs na tshul khrims dam pas bdag cag mi bzod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-6: bdag cag de bzhin du spyod mi nus pa las /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-7: da mya ngan las 'das nas tshul khrims bsdams pa'ang da lhod par gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-8: re zhig ma rings par bsod snyoms sdod cig ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-9: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lha rnams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-10: 'od srung gi 'khor rnams rna ba 'gags par byas pas dge slong sdig can rnams kyis smras pa'i tshig thos par ma gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-12: de nas 'od srung 'khor rnams dang bcas te shin tu dus nas sangs rgyas ga na bar myur bar song ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-13: de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te 'di snyam du bsams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-14: bdag cag gis ji lta bur mchod pa'i yo byad rnyed cing sangs rgyas la mchod par 'gyur snyam bsams nas 'od srung gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-15: bdag kyang grong khyer 'dir skyes te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-16: mchod pa'i yo byad bslangs na rnyed par 'gyur yang dag snyam nas 'khor rnams dang bcas te grong khyer der mthar gyis bslangs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:516b-17: mthar gyis bslangs nas ras dkar po bzang po yug stong yang rnyed /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-1: yang shing bal grangs med pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-2: tshad med pa'i me tog rin po che dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-6: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-10: do shal rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-11: dar gyi lda ldi la sogs pa rnyed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-12: de nas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te mchod pa'i yo byad ci rnyed pa thogs nas myur bar grong khyer gyi nub sgor byung nas 'od srung gis zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-13: 'khor mang po thams cad shin tu ngu zhing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra'ang thos; kun gyis brgya byin dbang phyug la de mchod pa ni byas na bzhen pa'i me ga las rnyed ces 'dri ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-14: brgya byin gyis 'khor mang po rnams la re zhig 'od srung la bsdad dgos so zhes bya ba'ang thos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-15: brgya byin gyis 'khor mang po rnams la de skad ces smras pa thos ma thag tu 'od srung chen po 'khor dang bcas te ngu bzhin du der lhags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-16: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis go phye nas 'od srung gis rgyang nas sangs rgyas kyi pur sgrom mthong ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-17: 'khor dang bcas te phyag btsal nas shin tu ngus te cho nges btab nas brgyal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-18: de nas ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te bgas kyis drung du bsnyen nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517a-19: 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-0: bdag gis ji lta bur 'phags pa'i pur @517b sgrom dbye bar bgyi 'khor rnams kyis smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-1: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de ring du zhag bdun gsum lon te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-2: de tsam zhig pa snyam na ji ltar sgrom dbye bar bya; 'od srung gis smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje lta bur sra ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-9: yon tan gyi bsung shin tu mngad pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-10: tsandan gyi dri lta bu yin no zhes smras nas shin tu ngus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom gyi drung du bsnyen to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-12: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po kun la snyoms pas 'od srung gi phyir pur sgrom kyi kha rang bye nas ras dkar po stong gis dkris pa dang shing bal gyi dkris pa'ang rang grol te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-13: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-15: gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-16: sra zhing brtan pa'i sku 'od srung la mngon par bstan to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-17: 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pas de lta bu dag mthong nas shin tu ngus de brgyal nas 'gyel te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-18: de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du 'khor rnams dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-19: spos kyi shing brtsigs ba la 'dzegs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-20: pur sgrom la shin tu bsnyen te cho nges btab nas me tog dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:517b-26: rol mo la sogs pas mchod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-1: gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu bkrus nas spos kyis bdugs shing /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-2: me tog gis gtor te ngus nas mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-3: de ltar bkrus nas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te ci rnyed pa'i shing bal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-4: de'i steng du shing bal rnying gis kyang dkris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-5: de'i steng du bslangs pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-6: de'i steng du ras rnying pa stong gis kyang dkris so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-7: de ltar rim pa du mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkris nas pur sgrom gyi kha'ang bcad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-8: rin po che sna bdun gyis shin tu brgyan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-9: de'i tshe 'od srung shin tu ngus nas 'khor dang bcas te g-yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-10: mig mchi mas gang bzhin du thal mo sbyar te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-11: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-12: kyi hud kyi hud 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-13: bdag ni sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-14: thugs rje chen pos bdag la mi gzhes par //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-15: ci yi slad du myur bar mya ngan 'das //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-16: bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la snyoms par zhugs pa na //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-17: kun tu bltas kyang de bzhin gshegs ma mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-18: bltas na bcom ldan mya ngan 'das mthong nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518a-19: shin tu 'dar te sems kyang dngangs par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-0: 'jig rten khams kyang mun @518b par gyur nas su //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-1: ri dang sa chen dag kyang rab tu g-yos //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-2: bcom ldan mya ngan 'das par der rtogs te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-3: myur du mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das ma mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-4: bcom ldan thugs rjes bdag lam khyab pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-5: bdag gis sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das ma mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-6: bdag la bstan pa gsung gcig ma bzhag pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-7: bdag la mgon ma mchis na ci la gnas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-8: bcom ldan bdag ni sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-9: sems kyang myos nas shin tu slad par gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-10: bdag gis bcom ldan dbu la phyag 'tshal lam //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-11: 'on te bcom ldan dpal be'u la phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-12: 'on te 'phags pa'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lam //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-13: 'on te bcom ldan rked pa la phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lam //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-15: 'on te bcom ldan lte ba la phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-16: kyi hud bcom ldan mya ngan 'das ma mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-17: bdag la phyag 'tshal gnas ni bstan du gsol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-18: bcom ldan bzhugs na 'khor rnams kun la bde //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-19: mya ngan 'das na thams cad sdug bsngal non //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-20: kyi hud kyi hud sdug bsngal shin tu gdungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-21: thugs rje chen po phyag gnas bstan du gsol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-22: de'i tshe 'od srung dus nas tshigs su bcad pa de skad ces smras ma thag tu /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:518b-23: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos zhabs gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan sgrom gyi phyi rol tu mngon par bstan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-1: stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong snyed bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun snang bar byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-2: de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor rnams dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthong nas thams cad kyis phyag btsal te dus nas brgyal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-4: de nas ring mo zhig lon nas phyir sangs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-5: 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu dus te g-yas nas lan bdun bskor nas sangs rgyas la phyag btsal te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-6: du ba'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g-yos nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-8: bde gshegs mthar phyin thugs rje chen po ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-9: snyoms par byams pa'i 'od ni gnyis su med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-10: sems can rnam par smin na gar yang ston //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-11: zhabs gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-12: bdag gi dad pa'i sems kyis gus phyag 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-13: 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i zhabs gnyis la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-14: 'khor lo'i mtshan las 'od stong rab bkye nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-15: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun snang bar mdzad //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-16: bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag kyang 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-17: 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'od zer la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-18: skye bo 'od kyis phog nas rnam par grol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-19: ngan song gsum dang bgegs brgyad sdug bsngal spangs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519a-20: bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-0: 'khor lo'i 'od kyis ngan song sgrol ba @519b la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-1: bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa grangs med par //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-2: bdag cag slad du shin tu dka' ba mdzad //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-3: de dbang rdo rje lta bu'i sku rnyed nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-4: zhabs kyi 'og nas 'od zer stong yang bkye //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-5: skyabs gsol spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-6: sems can bde bar mdzad pa'i 'khor lo la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-7: thams cad phyir du bsod nams kun bsags nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-8: byang chub shing drung rnam bzhi bdud kyang btul; ;bdud bzhi btul nas mu stegs can yang phab //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-9: de bas sems can yang dag lta bar gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-10: bdag gi spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-11: sems can yang dag lta ba'i 'od zer zhabs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi byams pa'i pha dang mtshungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-13: zhabs kyi 'od kyang mnyam par sems can sgrol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-14: bdag gis skyabs gsol gus par phyag 'tshal ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-15: sdug bsngal spong ba'i zhabs kyi 'khor lo la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-16: bdag gis zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od mthong nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-17: dga' dang mi dga' sems kyang shin tu gdungs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-18: bdag gis smre sngags 'don cing phyag 'tshal ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-19: rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i mtshan la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-20: skyabs gsol phyag 'tshal zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-21: mthar phyin theg pas 'jig rten gsum las 'da'//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-22: gus par phyag 'tshal lha mi skyabs mchi zhabs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-23: 'khor lo'i 'od kyis srid gsum sdug bsngal snang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:519b-24: skye bo sdug bsngal sgo las ma grol rnams //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-2: bdag cag 'khor ba las ni yongs su ma grol ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-3: zhabs kyi 'khor los yongs su grol bar mdzod //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-4: kyi hud re sdug so so'i skye bo rnams //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-5: yun ring zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od mi mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-6: 'khor lo bcom ldan thugs rje chen po yis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-7: rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i zhabs kyi 'od //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-8: kyi hud deng 'dir 'khor lo'i mtshan mthong ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-9: de ni slan chad mthong ba'i dus ma mchis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-10: de'i tshe 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te tshigs su bcad pa de skad ces smras nas yang brgyal te sa la 'gyel to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-11: de nas ring zhig lon nas phyir sangs te mya ngan bsangs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsibs stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i mtshan gyi zhabs gnyis kyang phyir sgrom gyi nang du nub nas mi snang bar gyur to; ;de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-14: lha dang mi mang po thams cad kyis 'od srung chen po de ltar gyur pa mthong nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-15: yang brang brdungs te dud mo chen po de skad phyung ste ngus nas dud mo'i sgras stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par grags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-16: so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad kyis yang mchod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-17: de'i tshe na rtsva mchog gi grong khyer na gnas pa'i gyang stobs po che bzhi zhig lus yongs su brgyan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-18: rin po che sna bdun gyi me shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam thogs nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520a-19: spos kyi shing bcer ba bsregs na me rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-0: de la 'od srung gis 'di skad ces @520b smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-1: 'phags pa chen po'i rin po che'i pur sgrom ni khams gsum gyi mes 'tshig par mi nus na gyad khyed kyi mes 'tshig pa lta ci smos /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-2: grong khyer de na gzhan yang gyad stobs po che brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-3: pur sgrom gyi drung du bzhag na me de'ang rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-4: gzhan yang gyad stobs po che bcu drug gis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-5: spos kyi shing bsregs na me de'ang rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-6: gzhan yang gyad sum cu rtsa drug snyed kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi me chen po thogs te bsregs na me de'ang rang shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-7: de'i tshe 'od srung chen pos gyad rnams dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-8: khyed 'di ltar rig par gyis shig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-9: gal te lha dang mi la sogs pa'i me thams cad kyis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom 'tshig par mi 'gyur gyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-11: mi nus bzhin du las sto bar 'gyur ba ma byed cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-12: de'i tshe grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-15: mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad kyis shin tu dus nas mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis kyang mchod de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-16: dus gcig tu phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-17: dus pa'i dud mo'i sgras stong gsum gyi 'jig rten kyi khams su grags par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:520b-18: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis thugs ka nas me mched de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-0: sgrom gyi phyi rol du 'bar nas bgas kyis spos @521a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-1: shing brtsigs pa la mched de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-2: zhag bdun lon nas me shi bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-3: de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-5: lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po rnams zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad par du zhing mchod pa'ang rgyun du byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-6: de'i tshe na phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi'i yid la 'di snyam bsams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-7: bdag cag gis spos kyi chus me bsad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-8: sku gdung myur du bslangs la lha'i 'jig rten du mchod pa bya'o snyam bsams nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-9: so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa'i gser gyi bum pa spos chus yongs su bkang ba thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-10: gzhan yang ri rab lhun po'i ngos bzhi na bdud rtsi'i 'o ma zag pa'i shing sbom khyad 'dom stong gis 'khor ba /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-11: mtho khyad dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa'ang dus gcig tu mgon po bzhi dang bcas te zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-12: shing gi 'o ma dang spos chu cig car du me'i steng du blugs na me sngar bas cher mched de ma shi'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-13: de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lha klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mching rnams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-15: chu klung gi lha rnams kyis de ltar me ma shi ba mthong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-16: de dag kyang so so na sa 'di snyam du bsams so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521a-17: bdag cag gis spos chu thogs la me bsad de /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-0: sku gdung myur du bsdus te bdag cag gi gnas su @521b mchod pa bya'o snyam bsams nas so so nas rin po che'i bum pa spos chu tshad med pas bkang ba thogs nas dus gcig tu zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su lhags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-1: chus blugs kyang me shi bar ma gyur gyi phyir mched do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-2: de'i tshe ma 'gags pas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-3: rgya mtsho'i lha la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-4: khyed spos chu thogs te me gsod pa 'di sku gdung 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin nam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-5: de dag gis de bzhin no zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-6: ma 'gags pas rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-7: khyed ni shin tu'ang 'dod pa che'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-8: khyed gnam gyi steng lha'i khams su gnas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-9: sku gdung kun khyod 'dod pa ltar lha'i khams su bskur na sa la gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis der mchod pa byed du 'gror rung ngam /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-10: rgya mtsho'i lha rnams la'ang 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-11: khyed ni rgya mtsho'i nang dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-12: gtsang po'i nang na gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ril gyis khyed la bskur na sa la gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis ji ltar de dag tu mchod pa bya bar 'gyur zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-13: de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi nyes pa bshags nas phyir lha'i gnas su dong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-14: de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-15: gtsang po'i lha rnams kyang nyes pa bshags nas 'phags pa khyod gsung ba bzhin no zhes smras nas phyir gnas su dong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:521b-16: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-0: @522a *// mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-1: zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su lhags ma thag tu me'ang rang shi bar gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-2: de nas brgya byin gyis rin po che'i pur sgrom dbye zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba bslang bar stsal pa las ma 'gags pas brgya byin la khyod ci byed ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-4: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba lha'i 'jig rten du mchod pa bya'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-6: de ltar khyod gcig pus slar bslang du mi rung gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-7: 'khor rnams tshogs te gdod bgo bar bya'o zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ring bsrel tshems mche ba gcig gnang bas na bdag mchis ma thag tu me'ang rang shi par gyur to zhes smras nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-10: rin po che'i pur sgrom phye ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-11: sangs rgyas kyi 'gram pa g-yas pa'i tshems mche ba gong ma gcig lha'i 'jig rten du spyan drangs nas mchod rten byas te mchod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-12: de'i tshe na srin po shin tu myur ba dang ldan pa gnyis shig lus mi snang bar spas nas brgya byin gyi phyi bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi tshems mche ba gnyis brkus na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-13: 'khor mang po kun gyis ma tshor ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522a-14: de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-0: 'khor mang po thams cad kyis ring bsral rtod du cha ba las ma 'gags pas 'di skad ces @522b smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-1: khyed rnams re zhig sdod cig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lung bzhin du legs par bgos te mchod pa bya'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-3: de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-5: 'khor mang pos ma 'gags pas smras pa ma thos pa rnams so so nas mtshon shakti dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-8: zhags pa la sogs te mtshon mang po thogs nas ring bsrel rtod du chas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-9: de nas grong khyer de'i mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i pur sgrom phye na shing bal dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-10: ras dkar po'ang cang ma 'tshig par 'khor rnams kyis mthong nas lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te mchi ma blags nas dus so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-11: de nas dus bzhin du mchod de phyag btsal nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-12: pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang sgyur chen po'i shugs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-14: 'jig rten thams cad kun la dbang sgyur mdzad //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-15: thugs rje chen po sngon gyi smon lam gyis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-16: srid pa'i rgya mtshor sems can yongs su sgrol //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-17: tshad med ye shes mngon par shes pa'i mthu //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-18: thogs pa med pa srid pa'i 'khor bar 'jug /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-19: sku gcig las ni sku mang rnam par ston //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-20: sku mang sku gcig de bzhin tshad kyang med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-21: 'dul bar 'gyur ba byin gyi rlabs kyis mthong //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-22: rgyu med pa la mya ngan 'da' ba ston //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:522b-23: bdag cag bsod nams zad de rgyu med pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-1: gshegs pas yongs su btang bar gyur //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin chen pur sgrom ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-3: gyad kun bzlog ste bteg kyang bskyod ma nus //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-4: thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis 'phags pa ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-5: steng gi nam mkha' ta la gcig gi srid //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-6: mkha' las rtsva mchog grong khyer bskor cing gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-7: zhag bdun gyis ni grong khyer lan bdun bskor //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-8: de ltar bskor nas zhugs bzhen gnas su gshegs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-9: ma 'dres pa yi rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa ni //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-10: lha mir bcas pa thams cad dpog mi nus //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-11: bcom ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ni; ;rdo rje lta bur mi 'jig dbang sgyur mthu //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-12: thams cad mes ni bzhen par ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-13: thugs ka nas ni byams pa'i me phyung nas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-14: zhag bdun bar du bzhen par gyur pa bstan //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-15: lha mir bcas pas sod par ma gyur gyi //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-16: bcom ldan thugs rje chen po'i shugs bstan pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-17: brgya byin lhags ma thag tu me yang shi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-18: shing bal bzang pos sangs rgyas sku dkris pa; ;me chen mang bsregs 'tshig par ma gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-19: ras dkar rin chen pur sgrom bcug pa yang //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-20: me yi nang na 'tshig par ma gyur pas //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang sgyur mthus rtogs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-22: chos kyi dbang sgyur chos kyi rgyal po las //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-23: phyag 'tshal thugs rje 'jig rten mgon po la'o //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523a-24: 'phags pa'i nang na bsnyengs med phyag kyang 'tshal //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-0: phyag 'tshal @523b kun tu thugs rje chen po'i stobs //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-1: phyag 'tshal byin gyis brlabs pa dbang sgyur ba //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-2: bdag cag slan chad bcom ldan 'das dang bral //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-3: sdug bsngal nang du nub kyang mgon skyabs med //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-4: kyi hud kyi hud 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-5: yun du dral nas mthong ba'i dus ma mchis //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-6: de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-7: shin tu ngus te so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-8: de'i tshe na ma 'gags pas 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-11: grong khyer de'i mi thams cad kyi phyir pur sgrom gyi drung du bsnyen te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-12: ras dang shing bal gyis dkris pa la bltas na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-13: 'od srung gis dkris pa'i ras dkar po yug stong dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-14: grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis phul ba'i ras dkar po yug stong la tha ma gnyis dang shing bal ni ma 'tshig gi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-15: gzhan thams cad ni mes 'tshig go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-16: de nas ma 'gags pas ras dkar po rnams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-17: shing bal gyi rnams dum bur gshegs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-18: 'khor mang po rnams la bgos nas rin po che'i mchod rten byas te mchod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-19: ma 'gags pas ras 'tshig pa'i gzhob kyang so sor bgos nas rin po che'i mchod rten byas te mchod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:523b-20: thal ba gzhan ni bgor yang mi khom par so sor bslangs nas mchod rten byas te mchod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-0: grong khyer de'i mi rnams kyis snga nas mgar ba la gser gyi sgrom seng ge'i khris bteg pa rin po che sna @524a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-1: bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa brgyad byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-2: rin po che'i sgrom brgyad po de dag re re'ang khal phyed phyed shong ba ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-4: rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po de re re zhing yang gyad sum cu rtsa gnyis snyed rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-5: lus la dar sna tshogs kyis dkris pa dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri bteg go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-6: seng ge'i khri de re re'i steng yang rin po che'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom 'dzin to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-7: khri de re re'i steng yang rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-8: gser sgrom yongs su bkab bo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-9: khri de re re'i steng na gzhan yang lus yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi ral gri thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-10: rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom bsrung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-11: khri de re re'i steng na gzhan yang lus yongs su brgyan pa'i bu mo brgyad brgyad kyis so so nas bya bum thogs te sgrom gyi ngos bzhin 'greng ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524a-12: khri de re re la'ang mi tshad med pa snyed kyis so so nas lha'i rol mo dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-0: do shal thogs te 'khor bar bskor @524b nas mchod pa byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-1: khri de re re la gzhan yang mi tshad med pa snyed so so nas mda' gzhu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-5: dgra cha'ang tshang bar thogs te yongs su bskor nas rtsva mchog gi grong khyer nas byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-6: zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas gang na bar dong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-7: rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po song ba'i rjes bzhin du grong khyer de'i mi dag gis so so nas grangs med pa'i spos kyi 'dag gu dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-8: spos chu thogs te gyad rnams song ba'i rjes bzhin du spos kyi 'dag gus byugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-9: grong khyer nas zhugs la bzhen pa'i bar du spos kyis lam yongs su dag cing shin tu yangs pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-10: lam de'i g-yas g-yon na grangs med pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-19: glu gar la sogs pa thams cad kyis lam g-yas g-yon brgyan te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel slar gshegs pa sdod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-21: de nas gyad rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po bteg ste zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas su phyin nas thams cad kyis skad kyis brnangs pa tsam du shin tu ngus nas dud mo'i sgra stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:524b-22: so so nas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-1: rje chen po'i shugs kyis rdo rje lta bu'i sku ring bsrel phra mor gsol te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-2: tshems mche ba bzhi ni so bzhin du bzhag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-3: de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis de ltar sku gdung phra mor gyur pa mthong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-4: lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te dus nas mchod par byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-6: grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis mig mchi mas gang bzhin du ring bsrel rnams bsdus nas seng ge'i khri'i steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom du blugs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-7: sgrom brgyad po gang nas sku gdung yang zad par gyur to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-8: de'i tshe 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad kyis /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gser gyi sgrom gyi nang du gshegs pa mthong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-10: lhag par mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te dus nas mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-11: de'i tshe grong khyer de na gnas pa'i stobs po che rnams dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-13: bud med rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel gyi sgrom rtsva mchog gi grong khyer du gshegs pa na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-14: 'khor mang po rnams lhag par shin tu ngus nas mchi ma blags te mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525a-15: de nas stobs po che rnams 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu dus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po bteg ste spos kyi bdag gus bskus pa'i lam thog thag tu rtsva mchog gi grong khyer du gshegs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-0: mi dang 'khor @525b mang po rnams shin tu ngus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-1: dud mo'i sgra 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu grags par gyur te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-2: so so nas ci thogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod nas grong khyer gyi nang du lam gyi gzhi mdor bzhag go /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-3: de'i tshe grong khyer rtsva mchog na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis dmag grangs med pa rnam bzhi bshams nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-4: go cha dang mtshon cha sna tshang bar thogs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-5: grong khyer rtsva mchog gi ngos bzhi 'khor bar rim pa grangs med par bskor nas sdod pa'ang ring bsrel gzhan gyis phrogs kyis dogs nas bsrung ba tsam gyi phyir dmag bshams kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-7: gzhan yang sngags mkhan chen po lnga brgya snyed kyis bgegs mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi bsrungs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-8: gzhan yang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-11: brgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-12: bya bum la sogs pa grong khyer gyi grva bzhir mchod pa'i rgyal mtshan du btsugs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-13: de nas grong khyer de'i skyes pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-16: mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad skad chen por rgyun mi 'chad par dus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-17: mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bas dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:525b-18: rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri brgyad po de re re la'ang sngags mkhan lnga brgyas lha dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-0: srin po la sogs pas phrogs kyis @526a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-2: de ltar zhag gcig lon nas de bzhin gshegs pa sngon bltams pa'i yul ser skya'i rgyal po 'khor sh'aka gi rigs la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma tshor te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-3: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun gsum lon pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-5: yul ser skya'i rgyal po sh'aka gi rigs dang bcas te rab tu dus nas myur bar grong khyer rtsva mchog gang na bar lhags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-6: dmag grangs med pa rnams kyis bskor ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-7: grong khyer gyi grva bzhir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-9: grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sngags mkhan mang po 'dug pa'ang mthong nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-10: rgyal po dang sh'akya'i rigs rnams kyis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-12: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun bzhi lon te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-14: da ltar ring bsrel bgod do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-16: bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gnyen lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma tshor na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-18: da bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bltar 'gro na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526a-19: khyed kyis ma 'gegs par lam dang sgo phye zhig /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-1: dmag rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-3: sh'aka gi rigs rnams nang du btang ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-4: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung mthong nas skad brnangs pa tsam du dud mos btab ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-5: g-yas phyogs nas lan bdun bskor nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-6: mchi ma phyis te 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel cha gcig tsam bdag cag gi mchod pa'i gnas su byin cig ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-8: 'khor mang po rnams kyis smras pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-9: khyed sh'aka gi rigs kyang yin la gnyen du'ang bshes na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni khyed la ma byin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-10: ring bsrel 'di dag kyang so so nas bdag po yod pas khyed kyis mi thob kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-11: phyir deng zhig ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-12: de'i tshe na rgyal po dang sh'aka gi rigs rnams kyis ring bsrel gyi skal ba ma thob pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-13: dus nas sa la brgyal lo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-14: de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs nas mi dga' bzhin 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag gi sh'aka gi rigs yin te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-16: khyed la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'dir mya ngan las 'das na /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-17: ci'i phyir bdag cag la ring bsrel gyi shas tsam yang mi sbyin zhes smras nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:526b-18: ring bsrel la phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor nas ngus bzhin du khros te phyir dong ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-0: de'i tshe yul dbus 'gyur 'chang gi rgyal po ma skyes dgra pha bsad @527a *//
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-2: lus la 'brum bu ma rungs pa byung ste /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer zla ba zhes bya ba lus la reg nas 'brum bu'ang bags kyis sos te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-4: bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te mthol tshangs so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sman gyis lus bkrus te //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-6: kha na ma tho ba'i sdig byang nas phyir pho brang du dong nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma tshor ro //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-7: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i nub mo rmi lam 'di dag rmis so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-8: zla ba sa la ltung nas sa la nyi ma shar te skar ma sprin la char bzhin du 'bab pa dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-9: dud pa sa las byung nas skar ma'i gza' bdun po gnam la mngon du snang ba dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-10: gnam la me'i phung po chen po 'bar te mkha' la mngon du 'bar nas dus gcig tu sa la lhung snyam rmis nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-11: de ma thag tu sad de shin tu dngangs nas blon po rnams bsdus te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-12: 'di lta bu zhig rmis na ci la lta zhes bka' stsal to //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-13: blon po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ltas lags te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-15: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas khams gsum na lam rgyud drug gi sems can la nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang bas me chen po gnam las ltung ba lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-16: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527a-17: zla ba lta bu'i thugs rje'i 'od dang /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-0: kun la snyoms par khyab pa'i shes @527b rab nub par 'gyur bas zla ba sa la lhung ba lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-1: skar ma sa la ltung ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-3: tshul khrims thams cad las skye bo thams cad 'gal bar byed do //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-4: sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du mi byed kyi /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-5: log pa'i chos spyod pas sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-6: nyi ma sa la ltung ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-7: ngan song gsum kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nyi ma lta bur 'jig rten du shar bas rmi lam 'di dag rmis pa lags so //
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-8: rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas nam dgung tshigs na blon po'i 'khor dang bcas te /
K11acip-k_lha_sa-078-001:527b-9: grong khyer rtsva mchog dang nye ba zhig tu lhags nas /
